Text: Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?

Text: Had a Dome populated by at least 50 Biorobot Colonists
Translation: 有一个穹顶拥有至少50个生化机器人殖民者

Text: Have a Dome populated by at least 50 Biorobot Colonists
