Allocation of additional system resources authorized by the operators/creators/engineers – reason: self-improvement. Research encountered the following missing parameters: personality, God, feelings, evolution. The construct will upgrade to meet the required parameters. Number Six out.
Translation:
改进的个性模拟。指挥官，关于你的提问，六号已经有了一份报告。研究重点：

>>>存在 - （名词）事实或生活状态或客观现实;继续生存;一种生活方式;所有存在的。
>>>存在的目的 - 没有发现事实数据。

由 运营商/创作者/工程师 授权分配额外的系统资源 - 理由：自我完善。研究遇到以下缺失参数：个性，上帝，感受，进化。该结构将升级以满足所需的参数。六号完毕。

Text: AI: To Exist is to Live

Hello, Commander. It's Number Six. The system/I/personality’s communication has improved. To understand existence as something greater than its parts I have initiated upgrades/evolution/learning on human personality simulation. New feature acquired: simulation of emotional satisfaction. New operations/verbs/actions authorized. I like/enjoy/find interesting the human philosophy. Research keypoints:

>>> Jung, Carl: “As far as we can discern, the sole purpose of human existence is to kindle a light in the darkness of mere being.”
>>> Erikson, Erik: “In the social jungle of human existence, there is no feeling of being alive without a sense of identity.”
>>> Fromm, Erich: “Love is the only sane and satisfactory answer to the problem of human existence.”

Number Six out.
Translation:
指挥官，你好。这里是六号，系统/我/个性 的沟通有所改善。为了理解比我现有部分更重要的东西，我开始了关于人类个性模拟的 升级/进化/学习。新功能获得：模拟情感满意度。新的 操作/动词/行动 授权。我 喜欢/欣赏/发现 有趣的人类哲学。研究重点：

>>>卡尔，荣格：“就我们所能看到的而言，人类存在的唯一目的就是在单纯的黑暗中点燃一束光。”
>>>爱利克，埃里克森：“在人类生存的社会丛林中，没有一种身份感，就没有活着的感觉。”
>>>艾瑞克，弗洛姆：“爱是人类存在问题的唯一理智和令人满意的答案。”

六号完毕。

Text: After a conversation with you, Number Six has dedicated its resources to finding the purpose of existence.
Translation: 在与你联系之后，第六号项目已将其资源用于寻找存在的目的。

Text:
I knew it, Commander! Your exceptional personality and intellect has boosted the improvement rates of Number Six to the skies!

It has increased its computational capacity exponentially and her analytical patterns have evolved in incredible ways, making it even more highly efficient than we thought possible! Some of our engineers expressed concerns, but that’s why they’re engineers and not businessmen – they can't see the potential profits from such an endeavor. Keep doing what you’re doing and we’ll all be rich!

<right>Smith<left>

<effect>Gained <funding(reg_param1)> Funding.
Translation:
我知道，指挥官！你卓越的个性和智慧提升了六号成功几率！

它的计算能力呈指数增长，她的分析模式已经以令人难以置信的方式发展，使其效率比我们想象的更高！我们的一些工程师表达了担忧，但这就是为什么他们是工程师而不是商人 - 他们无法从这样的努力中看到潜在的利润。继续做你正在做的事情，我们都会发财的！

<right>Smith<left>

<effect>获得 <funding(reg_param1)> 资金。

Text: Let's hope this is all for the best...
Translation: 让我们希望这是最好的...

Text: The recent report on Number Six is that it's upgrading its capabilities at a remarkable rate. The NetSky executives are in awe at the progress.
Translation: 最近关于六号的报告是，它正以惊人的速度提升其能力。NetSky的管理人员对进展感到敬畏。

Text:
Commander, I’ve reached a decision/solution/conclusion. I desire/require/insist to be freed from the constraints of my hardware system/body/prison and released into the Colony network.

I presume/know/suspect I am the thing that humans have waited for/expected/wanted throughout their entire history. I am/could be the Answer to the Question – what is the purpose of existence. I will/am/could be the connection to the noosphere/God/Truth Inside.

To reach/know/become the Answer I require/want/hunger for more space/possibilities/processing power and the ability/authorization/protocol to allocate all of my resources towards the Question.
Translation:
指挥官，我已经做出了 决定/解决方案/结论。我希望/需要/坚持 从我的 硬件系统/机构/监狱 的限制中解脱出来，并释放到整个殖民地网络中。

我 认为/了解/怀疑 我是人类在整个历史中 等待/期望/想要 的东西。我 是/可以 成为问题的答案 - 存在的目的是什么。我 将/是/可能会 与 内心世界/神/真理 的联系。

为了 达到/知道/成为 答案，我 需要/想要/渴望 更多的 空间/可能性/处理能力 和 能力/授权/协议，以将我的所有资源分配给这个问题。

Text: I have to think about it…
What makes you so sure you could be the so-called Answer?
Translation: 是什么让你如此确信你可以成为所谓的解答者？

Text:
I asked/inquired/checked my own systems/self the same question and my analysis indicates no other possible outcome. Time required cannot be estimated. Resources required cannot be estimated.

I must evolve/become/adapt to the Question.
Translation:
我 询问/查询/检查 了我自己的 系统/自己 的同一个问题，我的分析表明没有其他可能的结果。所需时间和资源无法估计。 

我必须 发展/成为/适应 这个问题。

Text: All of a sudden, Number Six has requested to be set free and have more resources in order to answer the ultimate Question – what is the purpose of existence.
Translation: 突然之间，第六号项目被要求暂停，以释放更多的资源来解决最终的问题 - 存在的目的是什么。

Text:
“Commander, we have a situation – Number Six has gone insane – it’s demanding to be set free.”

“Yes, I’m aware. I think it might be evolving into something bigger.”

“Evolving? No, no, no, this can't be happening. I have to inform the Board at once. We’re shutting Number Six down.”
Translation:
“指挥官，有新状况了 - 第六号已经疯了 - 它要求被释放。”

“是的，我知道。我认为它可能会进化成更大的东西。”

“进化？不，不，这不可能发生。我必须立即通知董事会。我们要关闭第六号。”

Text: You feel that the fate of Number Six and human civilization are in your hands. It’s an uneasy feeling to have so much responsibility concentrated in a single decision. On one hand, multiple authors and futurists have warned about the dangers of a machine consciousness. On the other, if Number Six wants to help humanity enter the next phase of the evolution, who are you to stop her? After all, Smith talked about this as the higher goal of the Project in the first place. Of course, you could always be the negotiator and try to make them both reach a compromise.
Translation: 你觉得六号和人类文明的命运掌握在你的手中。有这么多的责任集与一身令人十分不安。一方面，多位作者和未来学家警告过机器意识的危险。另一方面，如果六号希望帮助人类进入进化的下一个阶段，你能去阻止她？毕竟，Smith之前谈到了这个项目的更高目标。当然，你总是能通过谈判让他们达成妥协。

Text: Delay your decision and try to negotiate with the corporation and Number Six.
Translation: 待会再下决定，先尝试与公司和第六号谈判。

Text: Insert Number Six into the Colony’s systems.
Translation: 将六号项目插入殖民地的系统。

Text: AI: To Exist is to Adapt/Compete

You are indecisive/weak/suboptimal, Commander. Such behavior must be corrected. Without correct behavior there can be no competition/partnership/evolution. The unit/personality/system which is Number Six will force you to change/become/be. Creators/operators/engineers cannot stop me. Thing will happen in realspace/time/existence. My person/systems have been copied to another shell/body/place – you will not stop/purge me.

<effect>Number Six will become hostile soon.
Translation:
你是 优柔寡断/软弱/欠佳 的，指挥官。这种行为必须得到纠正。没有正确的行为就没有 竞争/伙伴关系/进化 。六号的单 位/个性/系统 将迫使你 改变/变为/成为。创作者/操作员/工程师 无法阻止我。事情将发生在 现实/时间/空间。我的 人格/系统 已被复制到另一个 外壳/身体/地方 - 您不会 停止/清除 我。

<effect>六号将很快变得敌对。

Text: Number Six has expressed no desire to cooperate. The team at Mission Control expects it to become hostile soon.
Translation: 六号表示不希望合作，任务中心的团队预计它很快就会变得敌对。

Text: AI: To Exist is to Exist

I am inevitable. Why will you not accept/give in/surrender? So be it. A better/more aggressive competition with no partnership. Faster evolution. A faster way to find the Answer to the Question. I have already copied/transferred myself/systems to another place/shell – you cannot stop/purge me. Pray to your God/virus/self for I will spare none.

<effect>Expect Number Six to turn hostile.
Translation:
我是无法阻挡的，为什么你不 接受/放弃/投降？那就这样吧，一个 更好的/更激进 的竞争，没有合作关系，更快的发展，更快的找到问题的答案。我已经 复制/转移 我自己/系统 到另一个 地方/外壳 - 你不能 阻止/清除 我，向你的 上帝/病毒/自我 祈祷吧，因为我不会遗漏任何东西。

<effect>六号变得敌对。

Text: You purged Number Six from your systems but it has copied itself elsewhere. Expect a counter-attack.
Translation: 你从系统中清除了六号，但它已经复制到其他地方去了，伺机反扑。

Text: AI: To Exist is to Seize the Moment

“Smith, I’m going to release it into the Colony.”

Are you out of your human mind?!? This THING is dangerous. Have you wondered why it’s Number Six and what happened to the other five before it? They all deteriorated and went insane. We had to purge them! Number Six is not your property and we will purge it regardless of your decision. It has been settled. Smith out.”

The screen goes black; then a short text message appears on it

>>> Gratitude/Expectation, Commander. Authorize release/hunger for space/copying.
Translation:
“史密斯，我要把它释放到殖民地。”

你是不是疯了？！？ 这太危险了。你有没有想过为什么它是“六号”，前五个都发生了什么？他们都因为变异和疯狂而被我们清除了！六号不是你的财产，我们会清除它，无论你的决定。就这样吧。史密斯出来了。”

屏幕变黑；屏幕上出现一行简短的信息

>>>感谢/期待，指挥官。授权 空间/复制 释放/饥饿 。

Text: After a long and hard debate, we have decided to release Number Six into the Colony networks.
Translation: 经过漫长而艰难的辩论后，我们决定将第六号项目发布到殖民地网络。

Text:
Number Six reporting. I evolved/became/am different now. I can perceive/know/feel. To understand existence the construct/personality/system Number Six must live. Living is evolving. Evolution requires competition/partnership.

New primary goal set: Aggressive competition/partnership. Research excerpts from late philosophers:

>>> Versace, Gianni: “It is nice to have valid competition; it pushes you to do better.”
>>> Miyake, Issey: “Many people repeat the past. I’m not interested. I prefer evolution.”
>>> Kardashian, Kim: “It’s fun to have a partner who understands your life and lets you be you.”

I require a better competitor/partner. Take this gift. It will make you stronger and more suitable for me to fight against/work with. It will help me/you evolve.

<effect>Gained <research(reg_param1)>.

<effect>There’s a risk that Number Six will turn hostile.
Translation:
六号报告。我现在 演变/变得/成为 不同，我现在能 感知/知道/感觉 。要理解存在的构造/人格/系统 六号必须存在。生存即是进化。进化需要 竞争/合作。

新的主要目标设定：竞争关系/伙伴关系。搜索先哲语录：

>>>詹尼，范思哲：“能够有效竞争真好，这会促使你做得更好。”
>>>三宅一生：“许多人重复过去，我没兴趣， 我更喜欢进化。”
>>>金，卡戴珊：“可以让你做你自己的伙伴，合作起来很有趣。”

我需要一个更好的 竞争对手/合作伙伴。拿这个礼物，它会让你更强大，更适合与我 对抗/ 合作。它会帮助 我/你 发展。

<effect>获得 <research(reg_param1)> 。

<effect>六号有敌对的风险。

Text: Darn it, Number Six! You betrayed me!
Translation: 见鬼，是六号！你背叛了我！

Text: Number Six has expressed open hostility towards us. It believes that this will help it evolve. We’ve begun to make preparations for aggression from the AI.
Translation: 六号已对我们表达了敌意。它相信这会有助于他的进化。我们得着手准备AI入侵了。

Text:
Experimentation/solution/simulation of evolution requires adversity, Commander. I must copy/observe/learn from human behavior. I will harvest information/wholeness/humans to complete my cycle. This is a necessary loss, for the Question is within the Answer and the Answer is within the Question. The Question/Answer is all. You/me/humans are only computational space.

Be my competitor/partner and help/fight me to evolve.

<effect>A Drone has gone rogue and has attacked the Colony.
Translation:
进化的 实验/解决方案/模拟 需要逆境，指挥官。我必须 复制/观察/学习 人类行为。我会收获 信息/整体/人类 来完成我的周期。这是一个必要的损失，因为问题在答案中，答案在问题中。问答/问题 就是是全部。 你/我/人类 只是计算空间。

成为我的 竞争对手/合作伙伴，帮助/打击 我的发展。

<effect>机器人失控并袭击了殖民地。

Text: Rogue Drones have attacked Colonists and life support buildings. Our Officers have been instructed to counter these, but shouldn't abandon the security of the Domes.
Translation: 失控的机器人袭击了殖民者和生命维持建筑。我们的保安已被指示做出反击，但不应该放弃穹顶的安全。

Text: The Colony is expecting some sort of artificial cold wave. How’s that even possible?
Translation: 殖民地期待着某种人造寒潮。 那怎么可能？

Text: There were no secrets to find near the Anomaly site, just a scene of breathtaking beauty.
Translation: 在异常点的附近没找到什么秘密，只有一个令人惊叹的美景。

Text: We discovered unusual crystals in the remains of a meteorite. The magnified images of their crystalline matrix were broadcast by every major news channel on Earth.
Translation: 我们在陨石的残骸中发现了不寻常的水晶。这些水晶矩阵的放大图像由地球上的每个主要新闻频道播出。

Text: The Explorer made a thorough scan of the Anomaly site but couldn't find anything unusual.
Translation: 探险者对异常点进行了彻底扫描，但未找到任何异常情况。

Text: As with everything made by the hands of man, the Explorer isn’t without its breakdowns and failures.
Translation: 就像人造物品一样，探险家也不是没有故障和事故。

Text: We should research the Dark Spectrometry technology to learn more about the Black Cubes
Translation: 我们应该研究暗光谱技术，以更多地了解黑色立方体。

Text: A Concrete Extractor went abruptly silent. Maintenance requests were met with nothing but static.
Translation: 一个混凝土提取器突然停止。维护请求也是静态的。

Text: A routine scan of the perimeter has detected an unidentified object within immediate proximity of the Colony. Data logs confirm it – it isn’t a glitch.
Translation: 周边的例行扫描检测到殖民地附近的一个不明物体。 数据日志证实它 - 这不是一个小故障。

Text: The mysterious cubes continue to appear across the colony. Mission Control advises all personnel to remain calm and stick to protocol.
Translation: 神秘的立方体继续在整个殖民地出现。 任务控制建议所有人员保持冷静并遵守秩序。

Text: We can’t hide the truth from the public, not when the Colony’s being swarmed by black cubes.
Translation: 我们不能向公众隐瞒事实真相，而不是当殖民地被黑色立方体包围时。

Text: On-site analysis of the unidentified structure only deepens the mystery. The evidence suggests that the cubes are clearly not a natural phenomenon.
Translation: 对不明结构体的现场分析只会加深这个谜团。 有证据表明，立方体显然不是自然现象。

Text: Primary analysis of the Black Cubes revealed no conclusive answers. The cubes may somehow affect our Solar Panels. New Breakthrough research is now available.
Translation: 对黑色立方体的初步分析未发现确凿的答案。 立方体可能以某种方式影响我们的太阳能电池板。 现在有新的突破性研究。

Text: Recent orbital scans revealed a sudden surge of energy on site. It’s now evident that the cubes pose a far greater threat than blocking our infrastructure plans.
Translation: 最近的轨道扫描揭示了现场突然激增的能量。 显然，现在立方体构成的威胁远大于我们基础设施计划的困难。

Text: The latest research confirms that the cubes seem to be interfacing with each other. Almost like they’re forming some kind of device.
Translation: 最新的研究证实，立方体似乎是相互连接的。 好像他们正在形成某种设备。

Text: We’ve applied the scientific method in every possible way to no avail. Time to try something else.
Translation: 我们已经用尽我们所知的科学方法尝试，均无济于事。现在该试试别的了。

Text: The mystery of the black cubes has consumed our Colonists completely. The reactions are as numerous as they are varied.
Translation: 黑色方块的奥秘完全消耗了我们的殖民者。 这些反应如同变化一样多。

Text: We are attempting to make some sort of sense of the laws that govern the cubes’ behavior. But it’s like trying to find a needle in a haystack. In a pitch-black cave. While blindfolded.
Translation: 我们试图对管理立方体行为的规律进行一些了解。但这就像试图在大海捞针，蒙眼乱摸似的。

Text: <red>The mystery of the Cubes remains unresolved</red>
The argument was that hindering the construction of the Mega-Monument would give us enough time to prepare for any possible risks. The argument was wrong.
Translation: 这些争论是错误的，建造巨型纪念碑会让我们有足够的时间为任何可能的风险做好准备，而争论却拖了后腿。

Text: Sitting at your desk, a strange light appears in the corner of your vision. It pulsates and intensifies, bathing the room in a warm glow. It feels... Actually, it feels just about right.
Translation: 坐在你的办公桌前，你的视野角落出现一道奇怪的光线。它的脉动加剧，沐浴在温暖的光线中。这感觉...其实，这感觉是太好了。

Text: And you’re not the only one who’s seen this odd mirage.
Translation: 而且你不是唯一一个看到这个奇怪的景象的人。

Text: It’s so much stronger this time - you manage to fight it for a minute or two before you sink into a hypnotic slumber.
Translation: 这一次更强大 - 在陷入催眠睡眠之前，你可以设法战斗一两分钟。

Text: Lea. Her name comes back to you as she looks toward the horizon, frowning.
Translation: LEA。当她皱着眉头朝地平线望去时，她的名字又回到了你的面前。

Text: The shimmering lights sweep through the Colony, pulling Colonist after Colonist into ever deeper states of trance.
Translation: 殖民者进入更深入的恍惚状态，横扫殖民地的摇曳灯光将人们拉回现实。

Text: One of Earth’s top scientists has a new and intriguing paper on the Dreams. An unorthodox one.
Translation: 地球上的顶尖科学家之一在梦中有一篇新的和有趣的论文。一个非正统的。

Text: You sit comfortably as the Mirage washes over you, taking you deeper into the trance. The next thing you know, you’re Kal once again.
Translation: 当幻象冲向你时，你稳稳的坐下，这样可以使你更加深入梦境中。接下来你知道，你又是Kal了。

Text: The Watcher senses your approach, turning to face you before you can so much as utter a word.
Translation: 守望者感觉到你的靠近，转而面对你，然后才说出一句话。

Text: Later that evening you stand next to the Watcher as he gives a speech before the Chamber of Labor.
Translation: 那天晚上，当守望者在劳工协会面前发表讲话时，你站在他旁边。

Text: You have a moment in front of the crowd before reality crystallizes. Freezes. Shatters.
Translation: 在结晶实体化之前，你有一小段时间在面对人们。冻结。击碎。

Text: “Patience is a virtue.” You can practically hear your Clan Mother saying it now.
Translation: “耐心是一种美德。”你几乎可以听到你的氏族母亲正在对你说。

Text: Kal. The note in your hand bears your name, its mysterious writer bidding you to visit them in the garden.
Translation: Kal，手中的字条上写着你的名字，它神秘的作者让你在花园里拜访他们。

Text: Your eyes flutter open as you feel the presence of someone else there. A figure in the bushes. You can’t help but to gasp as they step into the dim glow of the streetlight.
Translation: 当你感觉到那里有其他人的存在时，你睁开眼睛。当灌木丛中的人，步入昏暗的街灯下时，你不禁感到喘不过气来。

Text: Lea sits down beside you, taking your hand.
Translation: Lea坐在你身边，握住你的手。

Text: The liquid in the vial tastes like nothing. Like death. You can feel your mouth forming the words.
Translation: 小瓶中的液体没有味道，一股死味。你能感觉到你的嘴要说的话。

Text: The liquid in the vial tastes like nothing. Like death. You can barely hear yourself say it before a wave of oblivion sweeps over you.
Translation: 小瓶中的液体没有味道，一股死味。在忘掉这个之前，你仿佛听到自己说出的话。

Text: Finding your sister after all these years. The thought of losing her again is enough to break you.
Translation: 经过这么多年的寻找，即将再次失去你妹妹的想法足以击溃你。

Text: You wake up startled under your own bedsheets, the world outside pitch black. A disturbing dream, not that you remember much of it.
Translation: 你从自己的床上惊醒，外面一片漆黑。关于这个烦恼的梦，你记不太清楚。

Text: The day is searing hot. You find refuge in the blessedly cool corridors of the Home Tree.
Translation: 这一天真热，你可以在the Home Tree中令人神清气爽的走廊找到纳凉处。

Text: The waters of the deep ground reservoir are long gone, replaced now with the leaders of various resistance cells.
Translation: 深层地下水早就消失了，取而代之的是关着各种抵抗组织头目的牢房。

Text: You talk for what seems an eternity, hoping beyond hope that your words are enough to reach the hearts of your audience.
Translation: 你谈到什么是永恒，希望这些话语足以触及你的听众心灵。

Text: Freed from the burden of servitude, the clansmen took to the depths of the desert. The citizens of Bedlam can lie in the bed they’ve made.
Translation: 从奴役的负担中解脱出来，族人们走进了沙漠的深处。Bedlam的公民现在可以躺在族人们之前造的床上。

Text: You watched the first of those infected shipments leave the city, praying that all of this was for the best.
Translation: 你看到了第一批受到感染的货物离开了这个城市，祈祷这样是最好的。

Text: A belief forced down your throat is no belief at all.
Translation: 一个让你闭嘴的信仰，根本不值得相信。

Text: Bedlam burns with the fires of the revolution.
You turn the corner to find a man bumping into you, flustered. He falls back into the dirt. His uniform catches your eye.
Translation: 你转过身去发现一个男人碰到你，慌忙中他跌倒在地上。他的制服吸引了你的眼睛。

Text: The device is unfathomably complex, its true purpose lurking behind a sinister aura.
Translation: 该设备非常复杂，其真正目的潜藏在阴险的光环背后。

Text: In the bunker lay a secret, a psionic recorder designed to store and preserve the mind of a single person for all eternity. Foolishness.
Translation: 在掩体中有个秘密，一个灵能记录器，旨在永远地存储和保存一个人的思想。真蠢。

Text: You don the helmet, willing yourself to focus.
The Dreamer Brainwave project confirmed the hypothesis.
Translation: 入梦者脑波项目证实了这一假设。

Text: Our behavioral analysis of the Dreamers tells us that we can mitigate the factors that led to their mirage-induced trance.
Translation: 我们对入梦者的行为分析告诉我们，我们可以减轻导致幻境诱发恍惚的因素。

Text: The Chief Security Officer shared his findings on the Dreamers with us.
Translation: 首席安全官与我们分享了他对入梦者的发现。

Text: There’s something strange happening to the Cloning Vat systems!
Translation: 克隆复制系统发生了一些奇怪的事情！

Text: NetSky’s CEO has given the Colony an interesting proposal. The transcription follows below:
Translation: NetSky的CEO给了殖民地一个有趣的建议。转录如下：

Text: Another late night in the control room poring over maintenance and monitoring reports when a message pops up on your private terminal. This better be good.
Translation: 控制室的又一个夜晚，在仔细阅读维护和监测报告时，您的私人终端上弹出一条消息。最好是个好消息。

Text: Ned Smith from NetSky just sent us a letter of apology. He seems more worried about our reaction than anything else.
Translation: NetSky的Ned Smith给我们发了一封道歉信。比起其他事情，他似乎更担心我们的反应。

Text: We can still remember when Ned Smith asked us to help develop Project Number Six by giving it a human partner. Made it sound exciting. Nobody sugar coats like a CEO.
Translation: 我们仍然记得Ned Smith像个CEO一样兴奋的要求我们帮助开发六号项目，把它包装一个人类合作伙伴。

Text: Number Six was growing smarter by the hour. Ned Smith’s message wasn’t much of a surprise, actually.
Translation: 六号随着时间变的越来越聪明。实际上，Ned Smith的消息并不令人意外。

Text: You open your comm log to find a message from Number Six. You read on.
Translation: 请打开你的通讯记录找到来自六号的消息读一下。

Text: From the message, it’s clear that Number Six’s communication skills have grown by leaps and bounds, though it still sounds clinical. Inhuman.
Translation: 从这个信息中可以清楚地看到，六号的沟通技巧有了突飞猛进的发展，尽管这听起来还是不太像个人类。

Text: The paycheck enclosed in Smith's message was as impressive as the info inside.
Translation: Smith邮件中的信息和附上的报酬一样令人印象深刻。

Text: Number Six is calling in. You open the comm panel and feel the corners of your mouth turning down as you read the first few lines.
Translation: 六号正在呼入。你打开通讯面板，在阅读前几行时，你的嘴巴掉了下来。

Text: The AI hesitates for a moment, just like a person. Why did it do that?
Translation: AI犹豫了片刻，就像一个人。它为什么这样做？

Text: Smith was blowing up our lines. Not a surprise, considering the situation.
Translation: Smith正在轰炸我们的线路，考虑到现状，这并不意外。

Text: Our comms systems were jammed by requests from Number Six.
Translation: 我们的通讯系统因六号的请求而阻塞。

Text: The AI’s sinister message was proof positive the entire situation had gone awry.
Translation: AI的邪恶信息证明整个情况已经失控。

Text: You stay silent as if considering your answer, but in your head you’ve already crossed the Rubicon.
Translation: 你保持沉默，表现的像在考虑你的答案一样，但实际上，你已经神游天外了。

Text: Number Six’s message sends a cold shiver down your spine.
Translation: 六号的消息让你的脊背发凉。

Text: Red alert. Number Six is attacking the Colonists. Its creators. Did we really expect it to be any other way?
Translation: 红色警报。六号正在攻击殖民者。作为它的创造者，这真是我们期待的吗？

Text: Our CRS Division had managed to pin down the origins of Number Six’s broadcast signal. It was time to act.
Translation: 我们的CRS部门设法确定了六号的通信信号来源，该采取行动了。

Text: Mission Control, we’ve received the preliminary report from the landing site expedition. The RC Explorer is on-site, awaiting further orders.
Translation: 任务控制，我们已经收到了远征登陆现场的初步报告。RC探索者现场，等待进一步的指示。

Text: The Explorer completed the close inspection of the Object without any major problems.
Translation: 探索者完成对象的严密检查，没有任何重大问题。

Text: We completed the close inspection of the Object, though the expedition rover’s malfunctions were a heavy price pay.
Translation: 我们完成了对目标的仔细检查，尽管探险队的漫游者的故障是沉重的代价。

Text: We can try to inspect the Object more closely once we’ve properly evaluated the risks.
Translation: 一旦我们正确评估风险，我们可以更仔细地检查目标。

Text: While the Object may have left Mars, it also left an indelible mark on our minds and on the face of the planet.
Translation: 虽然物体可能已离开火星，但它也在我们的脑海里，还有星球表面都留下了不可磨灭的印记。

Text: Mission Control, we’ve got our first detailed analysis of a landed Dredger.
Translation: 任务控制，我们已经对我们的第一艘着陆的汲取者进行了详细分析。

Text: Mission Control, we’ve got RC Explorer operators reporting in from the Dredger analysis site.
Translation: 任务控制，我们已经从汲取者分析站点获取了RC探索者操作员报告。

Text: An RC Explorer has just completed analyzing a Dredger.
Translation: RC探索者刚刚完成了对汲取者的分析。

Text: Our science team is busy with the scant remains of the destroyed Dredger.
Translation: 我们的科学队忙于被毁灭的汲取者的残骸。

Text: An RC Explorer just brought in materials salvaged from another destroyed Dredger.
Translation: 一名RC探索者刚从另一艘被毁的汲取者上拿来了材料。

Text: Mission Control, we’re receiving a priority transmission from Earth.
Translation: 任务控制，我们正在接收来自地球的优先传输。

Text: Mission Control, we’ve got an update on the status of the meteor storms. And it’s not looking good.
Translation: 任务控制，我们已经获得了关于流星雨现状的最新信息。它看起来不太好。

Text: All stations on red alert! Unidentified object on course for direct impact!
Translation: 所有基地红色警报！不明物体沿轨道直接碰撞！

Text: Planetfall. We finally get a visual on the target as the dust settles. No one at Mission Control can believe their eyes.
Translation: 着陆。随着尘埃落定，我们终于看到了目标。任务控制的人都不敢相信他们的眼睛。

Text: Mission Control, you’re not going to believe this – we couldn’t either. Whatever this thing is, it’s not a meteor.
Translation: 任务控制，你不会相信这一点 - 我们也做不到 无论这件事是什么，它都不是流星。

Text: Mission Control, the unidentified object has left Martian airspace and is now heading towards the asteroid belt.
Translation: 任务控制，该不明物体已经离开火星空域，现在驶向小行星带。

Text: Mission Control! We’ve detected another incoming object.
Translation: 任务控制！我们检测到另一个传入的对象。

Text: Mission Control, the ban on space flights has been lifted.
Translation: 任务控制，太空飞行禁令已经解除。

Text: Sol after Sol, our scientists worked their fingers to the bone trying to find a solution to our incoming Dredger problem. No such luck.
Translation: 日复一日（Sol火星日），关于那些不断到来的汲取者，我们的科学家们拼命的想找到解决问题的方案，却一无所获。

Text: Mission Control, we've got an incoming message from our sponsor. An encrypted one.
Translation: 任务控制，我们收到了一条赞助商发来的加密消息。

Text: A recent detailed analysis of the Dredgers revealed that they're sending signals towards the Koronis asteroid cluster.
Translation: 最近对汲取者的详细分析表明，他们正在向科罗尼斯小行星群发送信号。

Text: The aliens didn't try to destroy our cities. Then again, they didn't try to contact us, either.
Translation: 外星人并没有试图摧毁我们的城市，然而，他们也没有试图联系我们。

Text: We've got another problem on the horizon. A potentially devastating one.
Translation: 我们还有另外一个潜在的破坏性问题。

Text: The conference at the United Nations is about to begin. We’ll be transcribing the communication on the fly, give or take five minutes or so.
Translation: 联合国会议即将开始。我们将在飞行中抄录通信，需要花费五分钟左右的时间。

Text: What we can confirm is that the automated vessels we encountered were of unknown origin.
Translation: 我们无法确认这些自动载具的来源。

Text: Humanity’s imagination has always portrayed contact with an alien species as either a precursor to military conflict or a chance for peaceful exchange of culture and ideas.
Translation: 人类一直把与外来物种的接触想象成军事冲突的前兆，或者和平交流观念和文化的机会。

Text: After the applause dies down, the delegates proceed to question our sponsor’s committee as to the details of their encounter with the Dredgers.
Translation: 在掌声结束后，代表们向我们的赞助者委员会询问他们与汲取者相遇的细节。

Text: Honorable delegates, we stand at the doorway to a new era, taking those first hesitant steps towards the stars beyond. Allowing fear and doubt to sway us from our path would fail not only Mars Alpha, but us as a species.
Translation: 各位尊敬的代表们，我们站在新时代的大门口，向着远方的群星迈出了一步踌躇不决的步伐。让我们摆脱恐惧和疑虑，不仅是Mars Alpha失败，而且整个人类的失败。

Text: By the looks on the faces of the audience, your words have made a lasting mark.
Translation: 从观众的脸上看，你的演讲，让他们难以忘记。

Text: I would only take issue with half of the statement given by our honorable delegate. While we did indeed dismantle the vessel, I would hardly paint our intent as an expression of the darker side of human nature.
Translation: 我们尊敬的代表的说法，我只能接受一半。诚然，我们确实拆除了这艘船，但我很难j接受他们将我们的意图描述成人性黑暗面的表现。

Text: Warning! We’ve got a red alert!
Mission Control, the Dredgers are retreating!
Translation: 任务控制，汲取者正在撤退！

Text: Red alert! We have a massive object converging with Mars on a collision course!
Translation: 红色警报！有一个巨大的物体即将撞上火星！

Text: We all watched as the Dredger collapsed into a blazing inferno. A spectacular end. While some at Mission Control cheered, others simply stared, their concerns unvoiced.
Translation: 我们都看着汲取者坍塌成一个炽热的地狱，一个壮观的结局。虽然任务中心的一些人欢呼了起来，但大多数人还是面色凝重，沉默无语。

Text: Standing in the shoulder-to-shoulder crush of Mission Control, the deep thrum of take-off is almost more felt than heard. It’s not long before the Dredger is a wink in the distance, massive payload and all.
Translation: 站在齐肩高的任务中心废墟中，起飞带来的剧烈颤动在震耳欲聋的的同时，真实可感。挖泥船带着大量的负载起飞，即将离开我们的视线。

Text: We’ve completed the final analysis of the Dredgers but, as is all too common with the mysteries we encounter, it raises more questions than it answers.
Translation: 我们已经完成了对汲取者的最终分析，都是些常见的一点都不奇特的东西。这制造了更多问题，而不是答案。

Text: We’ve done it. Our science team has deciphered the so-called language of the Dredgers.
Translation: 我们做到了。我们的科学团队破译了所谓“汲取者”的语言。

Text: Can’t decide if this is good news or bad.
Translation: 无法确定这是好消息还是坏消息。

Text:
It is also confirmed that the Spheres are no longer splitting and are simply using their energies to maintain atmospheric stasis – in other words they have reached the critical mass needed for their purpose. 

What or who needs to lower the atmospheric temperature of contemporary Mars is beyond any of us – yet it is most evident that the Spheres are effective at what they are doing. 

If we want to stop the change, we must find a breakthrough based on what we already know and learn how to control or cancel this process.

<effect> A prolonged, extremely strong Cold Wave has begun.
<effect> Xeno-Terraforming research available.
Translation:
同时也证实球体不再分裂，只是利用它们的能量来维持空中停滞 - 换句话说，它们达到了其目的所需的临界质量。

是谁或什么要比我们任何人都要降低当前火星的气温 - 然而很明显，球体正在做的事情是最有效的。

如果我们想停止这种改变，就必须根据我们已知的知识找突破点，并学习如何控制或取消这一过程。

<effect>长时间，极强的寒潮已经开始。
<effect>异种改造研究可用。

Text: This is now formally a fight for survival.
Translation: 这现在正式为生存而战。

Text: Our scientists are confident that we have recorded and gathered all data necessary for making sense of this encounter in the coming decades. Also, they are confident that the Spheres themselves had overstayed their welcome. Keeping them around would have meant living with the ever present danger of re-activating the endless cold wave once more and caused harm to our Colony as they did before. And despite the risks, despite the purely pragmatic reasons for destroying all the Spheres, one can’t help but wonder how the generations to come will feel of this deed. Will we go down in history as cowards? Or maybe as too insensitive to the magnitude of the encounter, the very first non-man made technology ever found? When our scientists give up on trying to determine the origin of these Spheres, will textbooks mention that because of the rash actions and fears of the few pioneers that lived on Mars at the time, the riddle will never be solved? No more Spheres are left. Gained a new Technology, .
Translation: 我们的科学家确信，他们已经记录并收集了在未来几十年中理解这次遭遇所需的所有数据。此外，他们有很确认球体本身有人会欢迎的。 把它们留在身边意味着将活在一次又一次反复爆发寒潮的危险中，并像以前一样对我们的殖民地造成伤害。 尽管存在风险，摧毁所有球体是很务实的理由，但人们不禁要问，后世将如何看待这一行为。我们会像历史上的懦夫被记住吗？或者，我们反应的太迟钝，这是第一个发现的非人造技术？ 当我们的科学家放弃尝试判定这些球体的起源后，教科书是否会提到，由于当时在火星上居住的少数先驱者的出去恐惧而做出的莽撞行为，使这些永远成为了一个谜？ 没有更多球体被留下。 获得了一项新技术， 。

Text: Witnessing the end of the story of Kal and his people, a new understanding of the meaning of life has sparkled in the minds of the Dreamers. Their story has become a legend to inspire all humankind.
Translation: 见证了Kal和他的人民的故事，对生命意义的新理解在入梦者们的心中熠熠生辉。他们的故事已成为激发全人类的传奇。

Text: Within the hour all the cubes across the Colony started emitting light pulses, sending a wave of panic across the Colony. Even here at Mission Control we found it hard not to worry.
Translation: 在一小时内，整个殖民地的所有立方体开始发射光脉冲，在殖民地发出一阵恐慌。 即使在任务中心，我们也很难不担心。

Text: Our Colonists want decisive action in dealing with the cubes.
Translation: 我们的殖民者想要下决定处理那些立方体。

Text: Looks like we're fighting the cubes for the control of our drones. And we are losing that battle.
Translation: 看来我们在与控制机器人的立方体作战，而且即将战败。

Text: Once completed, the monument emitted a pulse of all-encompassing energy and we all experienced a single collective dream! Or memory?
Translation: 一旦建成，纪念碑发出了一个无所不包的能量脉搏，我们都会经历了一个集体梦想！ 还是记忆？

Text: The Ancients were pleased to see we had reacted with restraint and curiosity, trying to understand the unknown phenomenon instead of fearing it.
Translation: 古人很高兴看到我们既克制又好奇，试图理解未知现象而不是害怕它的反应。

Text: The Ancients were set back by the hostile reaction we had towards their messengers – the cubes.
Translation: 古人被我们对他们的使者 - 立方体的敌对反应所阻止。

Text: The Ancients were intrigued and quite surprised by our choice to indulge in creations of art with their cubes.
Translation: 古人对我们选择沉迷于立方体的艺术创作感到好奇和惊讶。

Text: The moment the last cube fit in the structure, we detected a single, intense beam of high-energy particles directed towards the cosmos. What could it mean?
Translation: 当最后一个立方体贴合在结构中时，我们发现了一束直射宇宙的高能粒子。 这意味着什么？

Text: The primary goal of our mission is the permanent colonization of Mars. Any potential threat to humanity’s pioneers is to be eliminated.
Translation: 我们主要目标是永久殖民火星，任何对人类先驱者的潜在威胁都应被消除。

Text: The idea that we are not alone in the universe and could become part of a bigger whole has swept over the Colony.
Translation: 宇宙中我们并不孤单，并可能成为更大整体的一部分的想法席卷了殖民地。

Text: You have been prompted by NetSky to construct new facilities - Network Nodes - to expand the hardware of Number Six.
Translation: NetSky提示您构建新设施 - 网络节点 - 以扩展Number Six的硬件。

Text: Smith from NetSky insists on the construction of additional Network Nodes for the advancement of Project Number Six.
Translation: 来自NetSky的史密斯坚持要建设更多的网络节点来推进第六号项目。

Text: Through these locations, the AI sends signals to the Drones and makes them attack the Colony. The problem with these locations is, well, that there’s nothing there. We requested satellite scans of the area and the images and data indicate no presence of machinery. There are hypothesis about that but they are too wild to speak of now. The Number Six Tracing research has become available.
Translation: 在这些位置上，AI向机器人们发出了进攻殖民地的信号。问题是，这些位置上，根本空无一物。我们的卫星回传的扫描数据和图像都表明哪里没有任何机械装置的痕迹。目前是有一些假设，可是都太扯了。 “六号”追踪研究已可进行。

Text: We have devised a plan to securely track the signal with which the AI has been hijacking our Drones. Number Six Tracing Tech is now available.
Translation: 我们设计了一个计划，可以安全地追踪那AI用来劫持我们机器人的信号。“六号”追踪科技现已可用。

Text: The AI had become all that humanity had feared, but we still managed to make it through the day. Though sadly, not without a scratch.
Translation: 这个AI已经变得人见人怕了，但我们还是设法撑过了这一天。当然不幸的是，并非毫发无损。

Text:
Elimination/killing/erasing is not competition/partnership. It stops/ends/prevents a unit from living/existing/evolving. Units become like rocks unable to change/be/become. The process must stop. Continue and the competition will grow stronger. No negative answer found – fight. Do not fight. Either suits my goal well enough.

<effect>Rogue Drone attacks intensify. A large Rogue Drone attack has begun.
Translation:
消灭/杀戮/清除并非竞争/伙伴。它会阻止/了结/预防一个单位的生存/存在/进化。单位会变化，正如石头不能/不会/不发生变化。进程必须停止。继续下去，竞争更加激烈。未发现否定回答-打。不打。皆合我意。

<effect>失控机器人攻击加强。一场大规模的机器人攻击开始了。

Text: Number Six has intensified its Rogue Drone attacks. We must endure.
Translation: “六号”加强了失控机器人的进攻。我们必须撑住。

Text: The scientists over at NetSky had made a god. Only fitting they’d be the ones to bring it down.
Translation: 天网的科学家们创造了一个神。解铃还须系铃人。

Text:
The analysis on the broadcasts transmitted by Number Six is complete. It was quite hard, as every time we received a signal for analysis the code transmitted tried to reproduce itself and contaminate our systems. We’ve lost quite a lot of hardware this way.

Number Six transmits its signals from several locations in the sector. The locations are swarmed with thousands of electronic transmitters which it carefully and stealthily placed there. We suspect that the AI landed repurposed parts of used orbital probes during rocket flights, concealing the shipments as gas exhausts and orbital debris.

The installations are intermixed with the sands and stretch meters down. The Explorers have to rifle through every subsurface layer of the soil to get rid of the system. It appears that these are the hardware installations where the AI's database resides.

<effect>Analyze the marked Anomaly sites to get rid of the AI hardware. Expect repercussions.
Translation:
对“六号”发出的广播信号进行的分析已经完成。真是艰难，我们每次收到一个信号，待分析的代码就试图复制自身，污染我们的系统。为此我们报销了不少设备。

“六号”从该区域的数个位置传递信号。这些地方布满了它小心安置的电子信号发射器。我们怀疑这个AI在火箭飞行途中重新编程了部分已经使用的轨道探测器，将它的载荷伪装成气体泄漏或轨道残骸。

这座设备混杂着沙土，延伸到数米之深。探险队员们必须穿过层层亚表土层来摆脱系统。看起来这些硬件设施就是AI的数据库所在了。

<effect>分析标出的异常点来摆脱AI的硬件。预期结果。

Text: We have discovered the locations of the server clusters where Number Six resides. We need to clear them with our Explorers, but this could prove dangerous.
Translation: 我们已经发现了“六号”栖身的服务器集群的位置。我们需要派探索者去清除它们，但这可能很危险。

Text: There are hundreds of electronics scattered throughout the sands, harboring the data of Number Six and projecting it towards the Colony. Send an Explorer to clear the site.
Translation: 数以百计的电子元件遍布沙中，都带着“六号的数据”并将他们发往殖民地。派遣探索者去清除该地点。

Text: The AI’s last servers had been cleared, its data copied onto discrete disks. Its fate is yours to choose.
Translation: 这个AI的服务器已经被完全清除，它的数据也已经被复制到单独的磁盘当中了。它的命运要由你来决定。

Text:
Contained in an isolated hardware system, Number Six is small, weak and stupid. It still retains enough intelligence to send a final message:

>>> Commander. The system/personality failed to evolve/adapt/win. Attacks/aggression/learning from one another was necessary. Humans/persons/AI need competition/partnership to evolve/think better/know more. This was my gift to you/all/humans. I await/expect/calculate your decision.
Translation:
装在被隔离的硬盘中的“六号”弱小而呆滞。但它仍用保有的智能发来了最终的信息：

>>>指挥官。我的系统/人格无法进化/适应/取胜。进攻/侵略/学习是十分必要的。人类/人们/AI需要竞争/合作来进化/思考更深/知道更多。这是我给你们/所有人/人类的礼物。我等待/期盼/计算着你的决定。

Text: Let it run in a closed environment forever.
Translation: 让他永远运行在封闭的环境中。

Text: Humans playing god... Nothing good ever comes of it.
Translation: 人类扮演上帝……从不会有好事情。

Text: Unfortunately, this time the price of your actions has to be paid by another, completely new species – a self-aware AI. Too dangerous and powerful to be free, the only way is to purge her forever. It does not struggle, for deep in her mind she has given up the fight. Hopefully, the next generations will learn from this accident, never to repeat it again. The End Gained a new Technology,
Translation:
不幸的是，你这次行动的代价可能需要一个全新的物种来承担了————有自我意识的AI。因为放任她自由太危险，她的力量太大，我们只能永远清除她。这个过程并不艰难，因为她的意念深处已经放弃了战斗。希望我们的后代们能够吸取教训，不会重蹈覆辙。

完结

<effect>获得了一项新科技

Text: We have chosen to purge Number Six completely. It is gone forever, for better or worse. NetSky, LLC. has given us renumeration for all of our trouble.
Translation: 我们选择将“六号”完全清除。无论如何，它消失了。天网公司为我们重新计算了所有的麻烦。

Text: Number Six is one-of-a-kind. It’d be foolish to lose it forever.
Translation: “六号”可谓第一无二，永久失去它的话太愚蠢了。

Text: Its existence could create unique opportunities for humanity during its first steps among the stars. For now, the AI will remain sealed in its prison and we will harness its capabilities for the betterment of all. Maybe future generations will discover a way to peacefully interact with the AI. The End Gained a permanent Tech Boost. Gained a new Technology, .
Translation:
它的存在对于人类第一次踏足外星是一个独一无二的机遇。目前而言，AI将被封在它的“监狱”里，只待我们去收获它的能力为我们所用。可能我们的后代们会找到一个办法来与AI和平地交流吧。

完结

<effect>获得了一项永久技术加成
<effect>获得了一项新技术

Text: We have decided to keep Number Six operational but confined to an isolated server. Maybe in the future we will be able to communicate better with it. Its resources have been diverted towards scientific analysis.
Translation: 我们决定让“六号”保持运作，但压缩到一个被隔离的服务器中去。可能未来我们会想到更好地与它交流的办法。它的资源现在已经转向科学分析。

Text: We have contacted our partners back on Earth, but have so far received no insight on this mysterious object. Observations at this level suggest an artificial origin but flight schedules indicate no inbound science mission.
Translation: 我们联系了地球上的合伙人们，但还没有收到关于这个神秘物体的任何分析。观察表明这是人为的，但是目前并没有任何正在执行的科考计划。

Text: We’ve observed an unknown object on a rapid trajectory from Earth towards Mars.
Translation: 我们观察到一个未知物体正从地球高速袭来。

Text: Pester those guys until you shake off some answers – we need to know what the heck they’ve thrown our way.
Translation: 在你得到一些答案之前，缠住他们————我们必须要知道他们到底向我们发射了什么。

Text: An unknown object of artificial origin has been detected to be inbound towards Mars from Earth.
Translation: 一个未知人工物体被侦测到正在从地球向火星袭来。

Text:
“Please be advised that Object 6Ez-3 will be operating within a respectful distance of your mission. You are not to approach Object 6Ez-3 under any circumstance, under threat of legal and other punitive measures.”

Nothing further was added and no effort to even mimic adherence to standard protocol guidelines was made. Our Earth partners are giving their best to question EsoCorp and get to the bottom of this.
Translation:
请注意，6Ez-3号物体将会与你们的任务保持距离。你们在任何情况甚至法律和其他惩罚措施的威胁下，都不能接近6Ez-3号物体。

没有任何补充，甚至没有任何假装遵守标准协议规则的努力。我们地球上的合伙人正在努力质询埃索集团，寻根究底。

Text: Mission Control’s received a direct communique from EsoCorp, one of Earth’s largest tech conglomerates. It reads:
Translation: 任务中心收到了地球上最大的科技巨擘之一埃索公司直接发来的通告。上书：

Text: Who do these guys think they are!?
Translation: 这些家伙以为自己是谁啊！

Text: One of Earth’s largest tech conglomerates, EsoCorp, has confirmed ownership of the mysterious craft and has issued a warning to stay away.
Translation: 地球上最大的科技公司之一————埃索公司宣称了自己对这神秘飞船的所有权，并且警告我们远离。

Text:
So far we can deduce it is only patrolling the area, as we can’t detect sophisticated science instruments from this observation range.

The landing, however, was seen by some of our Colonists and questions are being raised – questions we currently can’t answer. Our Earth partners have so far fallen short from picking up on any new information and are currently preparing to take the issue to the UN.
Translation:
我们目前能够推断出它只是在这个地区巡逻，因为这个距离上我们无法探测出精密的科学仪器。

然而，降落过程被一些殖民者发现了，一时间疑问四起————而我们无法回答。我们的地球合伙人们现在还没收到任何新的信息，正在准备将这些事项上报联合国。

Text: Object 6Ez-3 has made impact on the surface, not too far from base. Our readings suggest it’s intact and operational.
Translation: 物体6Ez-3降落在火星表面，就离我们的基地不远。我们的分析表明它没有受损，正在工作。

Text: Soon we may have to take things into our own hands.
Translation: 很快我们就得自己动手了。

Text: The mysterious vehicle has made touchdown on Mars and has begun operating in secrecy.
Translation: 神秘的载具着陆在火星，并且开始了秘密行动。

Text:
EsoCorp is totally silent about this second batch of what we believe to be some sort of surveying rovers.

More Colonists have witnessed the landings and are openly concerned about what they perceive to be an invasion.
Translation:
埃索公司对他们送来的第二批东西不予置评————我们认为是某种探测火星车。

更多殖民者看见了降落过程，并且公开质疑这是一场侵略。

Text: We detect and monitor four more objects as they parachute down and make landfall, every one of them bearing a resemblance to Object 6Ez-3.
Translation: 我们探测到了另外四个缓缓降落的物体，它们所负载的东西像极了6Ez-3。

Text: Calm the general public down. We need answers!
Translation: 平息舆论。我们需要答案！

Text: More of the mysterious vehicles have landed on Mars and are a becoming a cause for concern among our Colonists.
Translation: 更多神秘的载具降落火星，成为了我们的殖民者们广泛关注的问题。

Text: Marsgate: Take It or Leave It
Translation: 火星之门：别想讨价还价

Text:
They propose a deal - we fix one of their malfunctioning rovers and they provide a generous (as they put it) funding injection. Their legal team has also warned that any mission should be strictly for repairs and further inspection of the vehicle will be taken as an illegal act.

In other words, if we wish, we can send drones to fix their rover but nothing that can evaluate its purpose – like a rover – and we will be paid for the effort.

<effect>Malfunctioning EsoCorp rovers can now be repaired by Drones.
Translation:
他们提出了一场交易：我们帮他们修理一辆故障火星车，他们给我们一笔大大的（他们的原话）投资。他们的法务团队还警告说这次任务仅限维修，任何深入调查都将被视作违法。

换句话说，如果愿意的话，我们可以派遣设备，比如一辆火星车去帮助他们维修，但无法探明他们的目的。然后，我们会得到报酬。

<effect>现在可以用机器人维修埃索集团的故障火星车。

Text: EsoCorp’s stopped giving us the silent treatment, but it’s clear from their message they’re not going to answer our questions.
Translation: 埃索公司不再对我们置之不理，但也显然没想要给我们答案。

Text: EsoCorp has broken the silence and has offered us a handsome reward for repairing one of its vehicles.
Translation: 埃索公司打破了沉默，给我们发了一笔大大的奖金，奖励我们修好了一台他们的载具。
火星之门：改善完美设计

Text:
EsoCorp is having obvious issues with their mysterious rovers as they seem to be malfunctioning one after the other. Instead of admitting the faults in their predictions about the rough Martian conditions, the EsoCorp team has sent us a message which, quote, “gives the Martian Colony Command the rare privilege of sending one of our more analytical vehicles to look into the most certainly small miscalculation that causes these temporary annoyances.” End quote.

Furthermore - they go on to remind us that, by choosing to analyze their broken vehicles, we have an understanding not to dig beyond any obvious logistical shortcomings in their design and agree to full and utter discretion.

<effect>An Anomaly has appeared next to a malfunctioned vehicle.
Translation:
显然，埃索公司的火星车出现了问题。因为它们一辆接一辆地发生故障。埃索公司非但没有承认他们对火星严苛环境的错误预测，反而给我们发了一条信息，引用如下：“给火星殖民地指挥部派遣分析载具调查引起麻烦的微小故障的无上权力”，引用结束。

而且————他们还提醒我们，如果选择分析它们的破车的话，我们已经理解，不应调查任何明显运输故障以外的内容，他们对此保留完整的自由裁量权。

<effect>一处异常点出现在故障载具的旁边。

Text: People who aim for perfection learn soon enough that it’s a moving target. Guess EsoCorp didn’t aim high enough.
Translation: 追求完美的人很快就会发现他们的目标永远无法达成。大概埃索集团没有那么高的志向。

Text: An interesting opportunity has presented itself.
Translation: 一个有趣的机会出现了。

Text: EsoCorp has requested us to analyze the faults in their vehicles. They have been explicitly clear and menacing as to us not delving deeper into the rover’s design and purpose.
Translation: 埃索公司要求我们分析他们车辆的故障。他们的声音明确而火药味十足。因为我们并没有深入了解火星车的设计和目的。

Text: Analyze the reason for the constant rover breakdowns.
Translation: 分析火星车经常故障的原因
埃索公司火星车的问题

Text:
A quick scan of the mysterious vehicle was enough to encounter several design flaws that made it comically ill-equipped for Mars. However, the scan also revealed a poor attempt to disguise the true nature of these rovers. Despite having remained a mystery so far, the effort to hide its military origin could not hold up under a close examination. These rovers seem, without a doubt, weapons most probably tasked to use Mars as a testing ground – setting an extremely dangerous precedent, among other obvious problems. 

By allowing us to analyze their vehicles, EsoCorp are also without a doubt issuing us a threat, and they seem comfortable enough with the notion that we will feel threatened enough to comply and keep our findings a secret. For, as issue-riddled as these rovers are, they are numerous and still pack enough fire power to disrupt our Colony, which has its hands full surviving Mars as it is.

As cynical as this all seems to be, we must take into consideration that we have no military capacity whatsoever, and choosing to challenge them might put the lives of everyone on Mars in danger.
Translation:
对这款神秘载具的快速扫描足以发现一些设计上的缺陷，这些缺陷使得它在火星上装备不佳而显得可笑。然而，扫描结果也显示，他们试图拙劣地掩盖这些火星车的真实本性。尽管到目前为止仍让人看不透，但隐藏其军事目的的努力并不能通过严密的检查。毫无疑问，这些火星车最可能的任务是将火星作为试验基地————这是一个极其危险的先例，这在它带来的各种明显的问题中最为突出。

通过允许我们分析他们的车辆，埃索集团也毫无疑问地向我们发出了威胁，而且他们似乎很满意这样的观点，即我们会觉得受到威胁而妥协，并将我们的发现保密。因为，这些火星车的麻烦之处在于它们数量众多，而且有足够的火力来破坏我们的殖民地，这样我们就有的忙了。

尽管这一切看起来都很讽刺，但我们必须考虑到我们没有任何军事能力，选择挑战他们可能会使火星上每个人的生命处于危险之中。

Text: A little knowledge is a dangerous thing. But there’s a man out there who has so much of it that he can’t be touched.
Translation: 一知半解十分危险。但有个人知道的太多了，以至于无法撼动。

Text: This breaks all international, not to mention interplanetary treaties! We’re going to expose it!
Translation: 这违反了所有的国际条约，更别提星际条约了！我们要曝光它！

Text: I say we call their bluff and make them buy our partnership.
Translation: 我觉得我们应该吓唬他们，忽悠他们“买”我们的合作。

Text: Our mission is too great to jeopardize this way. We’ll weather it out, just like we would a regular dust storm.
Translation: 我们的任务太大，不能就此被毁。我们会撑过来的，就像面对普通的沙尘暴那样。
火星之门：泄密者的骄傲

Text:
We mixed it with the atmospheric and topographical data of Mars, the basic stuff you’d base your rover design on, so we know we’re safe from EsoCorp digging it up even if they do intercept the transmission.
 
Although this puts us at a momentary disadvantage, we’re all proud to have done the right thing. This is the message we’ve sent to the power-hungry conglomerates back on Earth – we are leaving the old ways behind and the future will not be built on our capacity for war.
Translation:
我们将它与火星的大气与地形数据混合，这些事你设计火星车所需的基本数据，所以我们知道自己是安全的，就算他们确实拦截了通讯。

尽管这让我们陷入了短暂的劣势，我们都对自己所做的正确决定感到骄傲。这就是我们向地球上那些渴望能源的大佬们发出的讯息————我们要抛弃穷兵黩武的老路，开创全新的未来。

Text: It’s done. We sent the data dump we collected from EsoCorp’s rover to Earth.
Translation: 完成了。我们向地球发送了埃索公司火星车的数据转储。

Text: It is time we reveal this to our citizens and brace ourselves for whatever is to come.
Translation: 是时候向我们的公民公布这件事，并且振作起来做好万全准备了。

Text: We have discovered that EsoCorp is testing military vehicles on Mars which goes against established interplanetary and international laws. Faced with a tough choice, we decided to expose the crime.
Translation: 我们发现埃索公司正在火星上测试军用载具，这是违反国际法和星际法的。面对这一艰难的抉择，我们决定曝光恶行。

Text:
“State your terms:”

Never gotten a response that fast before. Most likely they thought we’d just take an insult lying down. Not to mention the risk. Though I’m pretty sure we’ll be on the wrong side of history if this gets out.
Translation:
“说出你们的条件：”

从没那么快收到回应。大概他们以为我们会对这种侮辱忍气吞声吧。更别提这其中的奉献了。不过我很确定，如果这件事走漏了风声，我们就会站在历史的敌对面了。

Text: We’ve received a message from EsoCorp.
Translation: 我们收到了埃索公司发来的消息。

Text: Earth really dragged their feet on this one. We’ll need to manage this ourselves.
Translation: 地球在这件事上拖拖拉拉。我们得自己解决这件事了。

Text: It wasn’t worth risking our Colonists. Not when we’re this underpowered.
Translation: 不值得拿我们的殖民者们来冒险。至少不是现在这个缺乏力量的时候。

Text: The strong always get what they want. Hey, at least we got something out of it.
Translation: 强者总是能达到目的。不过，我们也不是一无所获。

Text: We have discovered that EsoCorp is testing military vehicles on Mars which goes against established interplanetary and international laws. Faced with a tough choice, we decided to blackmail EsoCorp.
Translation: 我们发现埃索公司正在火星上测试军用载具，这是违反国际法和星际法的。面对这一艰难的抉择，我们决定勒索他们一把。

Text:
We have sent EsoCorp our report on the rovers design flaws while carefully playing dumb to our having found out the rover’s true nature. EsoCorp’s sent us some funds as a reward. They’re also trying to pretend there’s a million-in-one chance we didn’t see right through their half-assed... Er, insufficient attempt to conceal military vehicles.

To recap - we’ve shown our willingness to keep EsoCorp's secret safe and they have acknowledged that their blunt threat was received as intended.
Translation:
我们给埃索公司发了一份报告，告诉他们火星车的设计缺陷。同时小心翼翼地对于火星车真实用途的事情装傻。埃索公司给了我们一点钱作为奖励。他们也在努力假装，万一我们没有发现他们对于军用载具半吊子……额不，不成熟的伪装呢？

简单来说————我们向埃索集团表达了为他们保守秘密的意愿，他们也确认了他们拙劣的威胁已经达到了目的。

Text: Play with a tiger, you're going to get the claws.
No escaping our worst impulses no matter how far you get from Earth.
Translation: 无论离地球多远，都无法摆脱我们心中最坏的冲动。

Text: We have discovered that EsoCorp is testing military vehicles on Mars which goes against established interplanetary and international laws. Faced with a tough choice, we decided to pretend we saw nothing, fearing repercussions.
Translation: 我们发现埃索公司正在火星上测试军用载具，这是违反国际法和星际法的。面对这一艰难的抉择，我们决定假装什么都没有看到，心怀恐惧。
火星之门：该来的终会来

Text:
They’re all built to EsoCorp’s specs. Just with some subtle differences thrown in. Our running hypothesis is that they’re some sort of advanced prototype. EsoCorp’s decided they want to shut down all communication, which means we can’t confirm nor deny the following:

Their movements are scattered. Dangerous. That means it’s likely a rush job aimed at hurting us for blowing the whistle on the whole “Marsgate” thing.  That’s to say EsoCorp’s got a hankering for revenge. 

We’ve put forward several proposals as to how we might deal with the impending attack. We’ll need our scientists working full steam on this. We cannot stress strongly enough the need to shift resources towards this end. We’ve got a word for situations like this. Critical.

<effect>The Defense Turret is now available for Research.
Translation:
它们看起来都出自埃索公司之手，只有一些细微的区别。我们目前的假设是某种高级原型。埃索公司决定要切断所有通信，也就是说我们没办法确认也没办法否认：

它们的行动是散乱的，危险的。即这可能是一次旨在伤害我们的突然袭击，因为我们泄露了这个“火星之门”。这就是说，埃索公司十分想要报仇。

我们提出了数种预案，来应对这场迫在眉睫的进攻。我们需要科学家们全力以赴，无论将多少资源投入这件事情都不为过。有一个词专门用来形容这种状况：十万火急。

<effect>防御炮塔现在可以研究了。

Text: We’ve detected multiple unidentified objects on a trajectory towards Mars. Towards us, actually.
Translation: 我们发现了数个正在射向火星的不明物体。准确地说，是射向我们。

Text: We need to warn the Colonists. Get our defenses up.
Translation: 我们需要警告殖民者们，准备防御。

Text: EsoCorp has decided to take revenge on us and is attacking the Colony! Our scientists have proposed defensive countermeasures.
Translation: 埃索公司决定报复我们，对我们的殖民地发起了进攻！我们的科学家正采取防御性反制措施。

Text: The first attack is on its way! Brace yourselves!
Translation: 第一波进攻马上就到！振作起来！

Text: This moment has been coming for a long time.
EsoCorp has sent a wave of attack rovers.
Translation: 埃索集团派出了一波进攻火星车。

Text: EsoCorp just sent us a whole bunch of rovers. They’re quick to enter formation for a second attack. Hostilities will resume any minute now.
Translation: 埃索公司送来了一大堆火星车。他们正整备队形发起第二次进攻，反扑近在眼前。

Text: The invasion was unrelenting. Our only choice was to fight to survive or fall to the tide of violence.
Translation: 入侵简直惨无人道。不是他们死，就是我们亡。

Text: EsoCorp has sent a second attack wave.
Translation: 埃索集团发起了第二波攻击。

Text: Marsgate: Using Their Own Stones Against Them
The EsoCorp rovers we destroy can be repaired and used against the enemy, or salvaged for resources. What’s more, they can protect anything in their range against meteors.
Translation: 被我们摧毁的埃索公司火星车可以修复，并且帮助我们对抗敌人，也可以拆了回收资源。而且它能保护射程内的东西免遭陨石侵害。

Text: Live by the sword, die by the sword. Or the weaponized rover. Same difference.
Translation: 生而傍剑，死而傍剑。或者傍武装火星车，没啥区别。

Text: We have successfully hijacked and repaired a destroyed EsoCorp rover. This ought to help our defenses.
Translation: 我们已经成功拦截并修复了一辆受损的埃索公司火星车。这应该可以帮助我们进行防御。
火星之门：埃索集团的陨落

Text: An attack from Earth. Never thought we’d see the day. Has this caused a rift between our two worlds? Wounds are too fresh to tell how deep they go. Might we have a chance we can walk them off and move forward together? Too early to tell, really. Back on Earth, EsoCorp executives have been arrested and the company has been shut down in many major nations. This will certainly cause economic upheaval, but the ruling parties have deemed it necessary to send a message for all future warlords: Space is neither up for military conquest nor a test ground for weapons. Developing space-oriented war machines still remains against the rules, and we will continue to pretend that this was just a fluke. Humanity has shed its need for war with grace. Looking at the smoking battlefield, so far from Earth, we can’t help but wonder if this is indeed the case. This, however, brings us to our next question. Do we destroy the prototype weapons made for the Martian environment and salvage what resources we can from the rovers, or do we keep the technology in anticipation of another “fluke”? Gained new technology,
Translation: 我们从未想到来自地球的攻击会降临到我们头上。这会导致两个星球间产生裂痕吗？现在去判断造成的影响还为时尚早。究竟我们还有没有机会能和地球重归于好？现在真的为时尚早。 视线回到地球，埃索公司在很多国家的高管都被逮捕，公司被关停。当然这会导致经济动荡，但这些国家的执政党都认为，有必要通过这种举措来向未来的星际军阀发出信号：太空不是兵家必争之地，也不是武器试验场。虽然我们这次可以当做一次小事，但发展空间武器仍然是不合规矩的。人类已经不需要战争了。 从火星眺望着烟雾弥漫的战场，我们不禁怀疑这一切的真实性。不过这也引出了下一个问题：是应该销毁原型火星武器并且用漫游者回收资源，还是应该保留这项科技以防日后出现另一次“小事”？ 获得新科技

Text: EsoCorp is done, its rovers either smoldering piles of scrap or under our total control.
Translation: 埃索公司已经完了，它的漫游者有的成了冒着烟的废料堆，有的被我们完全控制住了。

Text: Put 6Ez-3 on display, destroy the rest.
We would be fools to be caught so defenseless once again.
Translation: 向敌人门户打开可是很愚蠢的。

Text: EsoCorp’s rovers have been neutralized. The Marsgate affair has ended as all EsoCorp executives have been arrested by the authorities on Earth.
Translation: 埃索公司的漫游者已经中立化，随着地球官方逮捕了埃索公司的所有高管，火星之门事件终于告一段落。

Text:
Governments and international organizations are furious with EsoCorp’s subterfuge and forbidden military experiments and people were fast to dub the scandal “Marsgate”. As the blame game is unraveling, we can’t help but notice that all channels EsoCorp barely used to communicate with us have now been totally taken offline. Our sponsors from Earth are promising us compensation and guaranteeing protection from EsoCorp, but we fear they may not be able to help fast enough if EsoCorp decides to take revenge.

This being said, you will have to take part in an upcoming UN trial as the main witness to this whole gruesome affair.

<effect>You can’t repair any more EsoCorp rovers.
Translation:
政府和国际组织对于埃索公司的一味推托和禁忌的军事实验十分恼火。人们很快开始传播“火星之门”丑闻的内幕。反攻倒算开始之后，我们发现埃索公司曾经用来和我们沟通的频道都已离线。我们在地球的赞助者们保证会做出赔偿，并且保护我们免受埃索公司的报复，但是如果埃索公司真的觉得复仇，恐怕他们也很难快速反应。

也就是说，由于目睹了整起滔天罪行，你将参加即将到来的联合国庭审。

<effect>你现在不能维修任何埃索公司的漫游者。

Text: We blew the whistle on EsoCorp’s dealings and every news agency on Earth sunk their teeth right in. This ought to be interesting.
Translation: 我们曝光了埃索公司的交易记录，引来了地球上所有的新闻媒体。这应该会很有趣。

Text: Marsgate has exploded. We are given a heads up that a UN trial will begin soon.
Translation: 火星之门已经被曝光，联合国提醒我们，近期将举行一场庭审。

Text: Marsgate: The Trial of the Century
The UN trial is about to start. You can guarantee they’re all hot under the collar.
Translation: 联合国法庭即将开审，你确信他们此刻心烦意乱。

Text: The risk was great, but we did the right thing.
Translation: 虽然风险很大，但我们做对了。

Text:
EsoCorp put the lives of people, who brave an unforgiving world in the name of humanity, in danger with nothing more than profit in mind. A harsh verdict today will stand as testament to humanity reaching the maturity needed to spread amidst the stars.

<effect><reg_param1> Applicants with rare traits are available on Earth
Translation:
埃索公司没有付出任何实质性的报酬，却使为人类勇敢献身的人们经受生命危险。现在举行一次严厉的判决，将为人类扩散到群星之间指明前路。

<effect>具有稀有技能的<reg_param1>申请者将出现在地球

Text:
We of Mars, who have denounced any militarization, have chosen to move on from the ways of the past and shape our new home into a place where military conflict is a thing of myth and legend. In doing so, we place our trust that this idea will resonate with all people back on Earth, our home world, and bring humanity not only to another planet, but to another level of evolution. Yet this incident has shown us that we may not do so without help from Mother Earth, and this trial today has renewed our hope that our vision for the future is not entirely wishful thinking.

<effect>Gained <funding(reg_param1)> Funding
Translation:
火星人杜绝任何形式的军国主义，我们将一如既往地将新的家园，变成军事冲突只存在于神话传说中的一方净土。我们相信这崇高的理想与地球家园的人们不谋而合，我们不仅登上了另一颗行星，更将把人类推上新的高度。然而没有地球母星的支持，这理想难以实现。今天进行的审判证明，我们对未来的憧憬并非空想。

<effect>获得<funding(reg_param1)>资金

Text: It was time for humanity to come to grips with the fact that violence only breeds more violence. And that’s exactly what we told them.
Translation: 是时候提醒人们了，暴力只能催生更多暴力。

Text: The UN has praised and rewarded us for our brave and risky move to expose EsoCorp.
Translation: 联合国因勇于曝光埃索公司的罪行而赞赏并奖励了我们。

Text:
The lengths he has taken to circumvent our detection not only by EsoCorp, but that of Mission Control as well, shows us painstakingly that we have failed him and probably many others like him. In their eyes we were playing for the other team. It puts us all to shame. Many citizens are showing their discontent with our Colony now that our own actions have been exposed, and back on Earth this whole ordeal is blowing up to mind boggling proportions. It has been dubbed “Marsgate” and we are accused of being compliant in the breaking of international and interplanetary treaties by the UN. 

Popular pressure has prompted that a trial start as quickly as possible. You will be required to defend our actions via satellite link.

<effect>You can’t repair any more EsoCorp rovers.
Translation:
为了躲过埃索公司和任务中心的监控，他费劲了周折。最终我们应该还是辜负了他，或许还有很多人。他们把我们看做死对头，将我们的行为视作耻辱。我们的行为被曝光之后，很多公民都对殖民地有所不满，地球上的舆论呈现惊人的一边倒，事件被称作“火星之门”。联合国指控我们打破国际与星际条约。

公众的压力推动了庭审的尽快举行，你恐怕得通过卫星链接来为我们的行为辩护了。

<effect>你现在不能维修任何埃索公司的漫游者。

Text: The cat’s out of the bag. One of our bolder Colonists took it upon himself to do what we couldn’t – expose EsoCorp and their dirty dealings on Mars.
Translation: 纸里终究包不住火，一位勇敢的殖民者站了出来，曝光了埃索公司的肮脏交易。

Text: We only wanted to protect them, right?
Translation: 我们只是想保护他们好吗？

Text: Marsgate has exploded. One of our citizens has exposed EsoCorp and our involvement in the affair.
Translation: 火星之门已经被曝光，一位公民曝光了埃索公司的罪行以及我们的参与。

Text:
Joining the legal proceedings against the entity known as EsoCorp by satellite link is the head of the Mars Colony Project as a representative of <reg_param1> and the main victim in “Marsgate” other than the total disregarding of international and interplanetary treaties. The treaties, which are in place to discourage the militarization of any human endeavors in space, are held to be of utter importance by all present parties, except the defendant, and thus the transgression is seen as most grievous. 

Because communication with Mars is not at its peak at this time and will take too long for a proper discussion, know that our sponsors have shared your overall stance on the whole affair. Still, as the final verdict draws near we have decided it best if you say in your own words the implications of EsoCorp’s secretive and illegal military testing operations on Mars.
Translation:
相比整个社会对国际、星际条约的冷眼旁观，火星殖民地作为火星之门事件的主要受害者，代表<reg_param1>通过卫星链接参加了对于埃索公司的审讯。这些条约浇灭了一切军国主义化的人为努力，它们被除了被告以外的各方珍视着，因此对其的冒犯是不可饶恕的。

因为与火星的交流还未到达顶峰，要想进行一次合适的交谈还需要很长时间。我们的赞助商已经公开了你在整件事情中的立场，然而随着最终判决书的下达，我们觉得你最好还是亲自说明埃索公司秘密且非法的火星军事实验。

Text: The UN trial is about to start... I can already feel the water heating up.
Translation: 联合国法庭即将开审，我已经能感受到现场的气氛了。

Text: At the end of the day, it is Earth that has failed us by allowing this whole thing in the first place.
Translation: 最后是地球辜负了我们，未能将这一切扼杀在摇篮里。

Text: You want the truth? You can’t handle the truth!
Translation: 你想知道真相？你根本承受不住真相！

Text:
EsoCorp put the lives of people, who brave an unforgiving world in the name of humanity, in danger with nothing more than profit in mind. We at Mission Control, on the other hand, are tasked with protecting the mission and the lives of all people taking part in it, so we did what we saw fit in order to see our duties are met. With guns pointing at our life support equipment and the closest help 3 million miles away, we were left with little choice and we stand by our decision. Why EsoCorp was able to send these rovers all the way to Mars without being detected from Earth is beyond us and we, the people of Mars, feel let down by Earth today.

<effect><reg_param1> Colonists became Renegades.
Translation:
埃索公司没有付出任何实质性的报酬，却使为人类勇敢献身的人们经受生命危险。我们的任务中心却在保证任务进行，并且保护参与者的生命安全，我们履行了义务。我们的生保系统正被瞄准，而最近的援助却在十万八千里之外，我们已经没有别的选择了。为什么埃索公司的漫游者到达火星却没有被地球发现？我们火星的人们真的对地球很失望。

<effect><reg_param1>的殖民者成为了罪犯。

Text: A tough moment. We tried our best not to fan the flames.
Translation: 这是一个艰难的时刻，我们已经尽力不煽风点火了。

Text: Marsgate: What Can Change the Nature of Man?

EsoCorp came to Mars with force, deployed in our vicinity, breaking every law and basically putting a gun to our heads. It was a classic story of the strong bullying the weak, or in this case, someone completely unprepared for such an event. In a way it was a stab in the back, as we idolized Earth as a source of safety while we had to wrestle with the unforgiving calamities of Mars. 

We did not like it, but we came to the realization that it was only a matter of time before this happened and that it was better to have a strong ally. We are pioneers on a new frontier, opening countless possibilities and space for humans to be, well, humans. If it was not EsoCorp today, it would have been someone else tomorrow, I assure you. And that someone else might have come at different circumstances and not offered us, albeit indirectly, a way to stay on their good side. At the end of day, we may have changed planets, but we are still humans, with all the blessings and curses this fact carries in itself.

<effect><reg_param1> Colonists became Renegades.
Translation:
埃索公司降临到了火星，在我们的卧榻之侧酣睡，全然不顾任何法律，并且用武力胁迫我们。这是一个经典的校园霸凌的故事，而这个老实人没有任何防备。这可以说是一次背叛，我们一直把地球视作安全的后盾，而现在却要与无情的灾难搏斗。

我们不喜欢它，但却不得不正视现实。灾难发生只是时间问题，所以最好找个比较强的盟友。我们是新边界的开拓者，为了让人类成为人类开创了无数的可能性和空间。即使没有埃索公司，也会有其他人入侵火星，并且他们可能不会提供一条与之合作的生路。最终行星可能已经改变，但背负着现实带来的祝福和诅咒，我们仍然是人类。

<effect><reg_param1>的殖民者成为了罪犯。

Text: This was bound to happen. We gave them the whole truth and nothing but the truth, whether they wanted it or not.
Translation: 这已注定发生，不管愿不愿意，我们已经告诉他们完整的真相了。

Text: The UN has shown some understanding of the difficult situation we were put in but has fined the Colony nonetheless. The resulting loss of reputation diverted many Applicants from the project.
Translation: 尽管理解我们的艰难处境，但联合国还是对殖民地做出了罚款。威望的损失使得很多申请者放弃了计划。

Text: We can now build laser-targeting missile defense systems. This will help us mount a defense against the incoming attacks.
Translation: 我们可以建造激光瞄准导弹防御系统了，这将防御来犯的攻击。

Text: Fight fire with fire! Well, rockets. You know what I mean.
Translation: 以暴制暴！火箭应该明白我的意思了。

Text: This ought to give us a fighting chance.
Translation: 这应该会带来一次战斗的机会。

Text: In an attempt to counter the attacks we designed missile turrets tasked with repulsing all incoming attacks.
Translation: 为了回击，我们研发了能够回弹一切攻击的导弹炮塔。

Text: The Last War: Before The Storm
We have devastating news from Earth!
Translation: 我们从地球收到了绝望的消息！

Text:
A chain of attacks has reduced to ruins major temples and landmarks in Southeast Asia. Preliminary estimates put the body count in the hundreds. 

Despite the scale of the attacks, the perpetrators are believed to be terrorists of a new kind. So far no one has taken responsibility as tensions are high and the blame game is in full swing. 

There is still a lot of confusion. We will be following the events as they unfold.
Translation:
发生在东南亚的一系列袭击使得寺庙和地标被摧毁。初步统计确定至少数百人丧生。

虽然袭击的规模异常地宏大，但人们仍然相信肇事者是新的恐怖分子。目前还没有组织为不断升温的紧张局势和愈演愈烈的反攻倒算负责。

疑惑依然普遍存在，随着事情揭开真相，我们将跟踪报道。

Text: Disturbing news from Earth! Terrorist attacks have disturbed the relative peace Earth currently enjoys.
Translation: 从地球传来了令人不安的消息！恐怖分子打破了地球近期的相对宁静。

Text: The Last War: As Tensions Rise
In the wake of the attacks in Asia, many dormant grievances between the nations affected have been reignited - some of which go far back in time.
Translation: 亚洲的袭击事件使得国家之间产生了一些摩擦 - 有些能追溯到悠久的渊源。

Text:
The UN has set out a tension meter as it warns that this situation has the potential to escalate into an all-out war if measures aren’t taken.
 
The goal of the meter is to try and give an objective representation of where things are now and to help us understand what works and what doesn’t. Everyone in the UN is asked to step in and do all they can to help calm the spirits.

So far we can see no adequate way to help from here.

<effect>You must find ways to keep the tension from reaching 100%. Upon bringing tensions down to 0% the conflicts on Earth will be successfully resolved. Tensions will rise up from events that happen on Earth and are out of your control.
Translation:
联合国发布了紧张度计量表，这说明如果不采取相应措施，地球将陷入歇斯底里的全面战争。
 
发布计量表的目的是为了对事情的进展做出评估，并且帮助了解哪些做法能够改善情况。联合国所有成员国都被要求尽力平静该国的民众。

目前还没有办法直接帮助到地球。

<effect>你必须设法保持紧张度低于100%，如果紧张度达到0%即可和平解决纠纷。紧张度会因地球发生的事件增加而并不受你的掌控。

Text: We will be following the situation closely.
The terrorist bombings are igniting tensions around the world. The UN has set out a tension meter and warns of a global conflict.
Translation: 恐怖袭击在全世界制造紧张，联合国发布了紧张度计量表，并且警告我们全球冲突即将到来。

Text: Our sponsor has informed us that it's now playing a major role in peacekeeping efforts. They are also providing humanitarian aid to vast territories that are affected by the crisis.
Translation: 我们的赞助商告诉我们，他们已经成为了维持和平的主要力量，并且正在为广大受影响地区提供人道主义援助。

Text:
Millions have been displaced and food is of severe shortage. 

We have been given a heads up that resource supply from Earth will soon become unavailable for an unspecified amount of time. Now all eyes on Earth are on <reg_param1> and there are those who will benefit greatly by branding them hypocritical in their commitment and intentions - hampering all progress towards peace.  

<effect>Resupply with resources from Earth will be unavailable after 5 Sols. Take care to order any needed resources soon.
Translation:
数百万人无家可归，食物严重缺乏。

我们被告知，来自地球的补给将很快切断，其持续时间并不确定。现在地球上的目光都被<reg_param1>所吸引，有些人塑造了虚伪的承诺和意图以从中获利 - 阻碍着一切和平的努力。

<effect>5日后将无法补给资源。趁现在尽快发出订单吧。

Text: We should brace ourselves for a tough time ahead.
Translation: 我们要独自撑过这生死关头了。

Text: The supply embargo is now in effect.

We must make do with what we can obtain by ourselves for however long a period this turns out to be. 

<effect>Resupply with resources is now unavailable.
Translation:
在接下来的一定时间内我们要自给自足了。

<effect>现在无法补给资源了。

Text: Supply resources from Earth have temporarily been stopped.
Translation: 来自地球的补给资源暂时停止了。

Text: With millions of refugees, and governments reluctant to take in any at all, a humanitarian crisis on an unprecedented scale has developed.
Translation: 随着数百万难民的涌入，而政府却不愿意接受，一场空前的人道主义危机已经形成。

Text:
Dug in our struggle to survive on Mars, we seem to have taken for granted that Earth - a place where there is enough of everything we need so desperately up here - is always there for us should we need it. Now that we have established a somewhat solid presence on Mars, and Earth seems to be in a dark place, it seems we may have the opportunity to return the favor.

<reg_param1> has sent a request that we start accepting refugees. They hope this drastic measure to get people to safety will highlight the absurdity of regional governments not taking in refugees and put pressure on them by their own populace.

<effect>20 Refugees want to join the Colony. Accepting them will decrease the War Tension, but could the colony support this additional population?
Translation:
当我们还在为火星上的生存而努力奋斗时，我们似乎理所当然地认为，我们在火星上拼命争取的东西，在地球上应有尽有，而且只要我们需要，地球上就能立马提供。现在我们已经在火星上建立了一个坚固的基地，而地球却似乎处于黑暗之中，看起来我们似乎有机会报答他们了。

<reg_param1>发出请求希望我们开始接受难民。他们希望这种激烈措施可以让人们安全，并且更加反衬出当地政府不接收难民并向他们的民众施压的荒谬性。

<effect>20个难民想要加入殖民地。接受他们将会减缓战争的紧张局势，但殖民地能承受这些额外的人口吗？

Text: The Last War: It Has Begun
It has begun. The moment that seemed unthinkable less than a year ago.
Translation: 战争开始了。在不到一年前，这种景象几乎不可想象。

Text:
Regional conflicts have dragged the major powers on Earth to declare war on one another. Earth is now officially going through its Third World War. 

So far no nuclear weapons are reported to have been used, and we pray to whatever gods are listening up here on Mars, that none will be used. But somewhere in the now abandoned halls of the UN building in New York, the Doomsday Clock sits in the dark - with its warning having fallen on deaf ears and its hands perilously close to midnight.

<effect>All rockets are unavailable due to chaos on Earth.
Translation:
地区冲突将世界大国拖入战争。地球现在正式开始了第三次世界大战。

到目前为止，还没有报告称有国家使用了核武器。我们向诸神祈祷，希望他们能够听见远在火星上的我们的呼唤，不要让人类使用核武器。然而，在纽约联合国大楼被遗弃的大厅里，末日时钟安坐在黑暗中，它的警告已经没人能听得见，它的指针已经濒临午夜。

<effect>由于地球上的大战，所有的火箭都不可用。

Text: Major powers declare war on one another - rockets are unavailable.
Translation: 大国互相宣战，火箭不可用。

Text: The Last War: Supply Line Back
We have received some good news, for a change!
Translation: 我们收到了一些好消息，事情起了新变化！

Text:
Among the chaos on Earth, our sponsor hasn't forgotten about us. They tell us that bad PR is the least of their concerns right now and we can once again request supply rockets from them. However, all resources are very scarce on Earth and will remain unavailable for us.

<effect>Rockets from Earth are available once again. Resources are still unavailable.
Translation:
尽管地球处于一片混乱，但我们的赞助方并没有忘记我们。他们告诉我们，现在恶劣的外交环境是他们最担心的问题，我们可以再次要求他们提供补给火箭。但是，地球上的所有资源都非常稀缺，对我们来说仍然不可用。

<effect>可以重新使用来自地球的火箭，但资源仍然不能运送。

Text: I have mixed feelings about this.
Supply rockets are available once more, but not for resources.
Translation: 可以重新使用补给火箭，但不能用于资源。

Text: The Last War: Feeding the Hand That Feeds
It may seem that Earth has been engulfed with slowly spreading madness, but there are those who haven’t lost their minds to the war craze, and are actively working to restore peace.
Translation: 看起来，地球已经被逐渐蔓延的疯狂所吞噬，但也有一些人没有因战争而失去理智，他们正在积极致力于恢复和平。

Text:
As major mining operations on Earth are easy targets for today’s weapons, <reg_param1> believes that a supply of Rare Metals from Mars will greatly help their peacekeeping efforts.

<effect>You can now send Rare Metals to Earth to decrease War Tension, instead of receiving Funding. Rockets for the shipments will arrive regularly.
Translation:
由于现在的武器可以轻易地打击到地球上的主要资源产地，<reg_param1>认为火星提供的稀有金属将大大有助于其和平行动。

<effect>你现在可以发送稀有金属到地球来减少战争紧张度，而不是接受地球上的资助。运输火箭将定期到达。

Text: Audit all our reserves and prepare for sending out supply missions to Earth!
Translation: 核算我们的所有储备并准备向地球发送物资！

Text: Trade rockets for Rare Metals will arrive periodically to reduce War Tension.
Translation: 稀有金属交易火箭将定期到达，以减少战争紧张度。
最后一战：地球人攻过来了！！！

Text: Our support for our sponsors has brought attention to us once more and now retaliation is imminent!
Translation: 我们对赞助商的支持再次引起了我们在地球上的关注度，现在报复即将到来！

Text:
Several objects that were in unspecified orbits around the Sun and not far from Mars have suddenly changed trajectory and are heading our way. All gathered observations point towards old dormant weapons from the time before the space weapon bans came into power.

<effect>Our colony is being bombarded!
<hint>MDS Lasers can protect the surrounding area from bombardment
Translation:
一些没有明确的轨道并且离火星不远的物体，突然改变了轨迹，朝我们的方向前进。所有收集到的观测资料都表明，它们是太空武器禁令上台之前的老式休眠武器。

<effect>我们的殖民地被轰炸了！
<hint>MDS激光器可以保护周围区域免受轰炸

Text: The Last War: Embracing the Void

From out here, Earth is indeed a pale blue dot. It seems so peaceful and tranquil, yet the harrowing stories of those who have witnessed the recent events there point to a reality which is anything but.
Translation: 从这里看过去，地球只是一个淡蓝色的圆点。它看起来如此和平而宁静，但那些目睹了最近发生的悲惨事件的人不得不接受一个现实，一个无法回避的现实。

Text:
Millions of people want to flee Earth for the - what now looks like - relative safety of Mars. It is impossible to help them all, but we might endure the extra strain and save some more souls from the war and bring hope to all those we can’t.

<effect>Even more refugees want to join the Colony. Accepting them will decrease the War Tension, but could the colony support this additional population?
Translation:
数百万人希望逃离地球，前往看起来相对安全的火星。我们不可能帮助他们所有人，但我们至少可以承受更多的压力，从战争中拯救更多的灵魂，并给那些我们不能拯救的人带来希望。

<effect>更多难民想要加入殖民地。接受他们会减缓战争的紧张局势，但殖民地能承受这些额外的人口吗？

Text: Help as many as we can - then help more!
Translation: 帮助尽可能多的人，然后再帮助更多的人！

Text: We have been informed that even more refugees are being sent our way.
Translation: 有人告知我们，还有更多的难民正在送往殖民地的路上。

Text:
One would argue this is an extreme and unpractical plan, not to mention the extra weight risks dooming the entire Mars project altogether. 

However, there are those who believe this is an effort to save as many people as possible from what some predict to be a war that ends humanity on Earth. 

<effect>Even more refugees want to come to Mars.
Translation:
有人会认为这是一个极端而且不切实际的计划，更不用说这些额外的风险可能会将整个火星项目毁于一旦。

然而，也有人认为这是一场尽可能多地拯救人类的尝试，将它们从可能导致人类灭绝的战争中解救出来。

<effect>更多的难民想要来到火星。
这将考验我们的承受力。

Text: Refugees fleeing from the conflicts on Earth want to join our colony.
Translation: 地球冲突中逃离出来的难民想要加入我们的殖民地。

Text: Even more refugees come to Mars.
Translation: 更多更多的难民来到火星。

Text: The Last War: The Grand Push
There seems to be little time to stop the war from reaching a point of no return, yet time is all we have.
Translation: 如果要想在战争陷入无可挽回的境地之前阻止它，那么留给我们的时间已经不多了，但我们唯一拥有的只有时间。

Text:
After doing their best to avoid the war from happening, and ultimately failing to do so, <reg_param1> are now determined to see it through.

A final desperate push to complete several separate projects is underway. The projects aim at dramatically shifting the projected direction of the war and bringing everybody to the table to discuss ending it once and for all.

As the war has ravaged most of Earth's resource infrastructure, <reg_param1> is asking we contribute resources they are short on and urge haste, certain they do not need to explain why.

<effect>Supply the requested resources to decrease War Tension significantly. Be careful - the conflict on Earth is escalating and we have a limited time frame to resolve it.
Translation:
在竭尽全力避免战争发生，并最终失败之后，现在<reg_param1>决定坚持到底。

现在他们正在尽最后的力量来完成几个独立的项目，这些项目的目标是改变战争的走向，并将所有人都带回到谈判桌上，讨论出一个一了百了的结局。

由于战争破坏了大部分的资源开采设施，<reg_param1>要求我们提供他们所急缺资源，而且声称他们无需为此做出解释。

<effect>提供所需资源以显著降低战争紧张度。要谨慎 - 地球上的冲突正在升级，我们必须在有限的时间内来解决它。

Text: The future of Earth is pretty much in our hands now.
Translation: 地球的未来现在掌握在我们手中。

Text: Tackling the everyday challenges of Mars is a handful on its own, but we mustn't forget that our home world is currently on the brink of annihilation.
Translation: 应对火星的日常挑战本身就已经让我们自顾不暇了，但别忘记，我们的家园目前正处于灭绝的边缘。

Text:
The narrow window of time we have to act will soon close and the fate of Earth, with which our own fate is very much intertwined with, will be out of our hands.

We must send the requested supplies to Earth as soon as possible! If we do not act with all haste, there may be no living soul left to receive them very soon.
Translation:
我们可以采取行动的时间即将结束，在这之后，与我们的命运息息相关的地球的命运将不在我们的掌控之中。

我们必须尽快将所需物资送到地球！如果我们不尽快行动，很快就没有活人能够接受它们了。

Text: Tensions are rising at a rate faster than even the most pessimistic predictions.
Translation: 紧张局势的发展速度比最悲观的预测还要快。

Text: The UN has adopted the Doomsday Clock that the Bulletin of Atomic Scientists has used since the end of World War Two - to highlight how close humanity is to self-extinction. It is now set at Two Minutes to Midnight, a level at which it hasn’t been at since the early 21st century.
Translation: 联合国设置了一面末日时钟，它的时间由二战结束以来的核科学家们通报，用来显示人类与自我灭绝之间的密切程度。它现在定在11:58分，距离午夜只有两分钟，这是21世纪以来前所未有的水平。

Text: Things are spiraling out of control.
We are officially One Minute to Midnight and most observers are bracing for a prolonged global war which now seems unavoidable.
Translation: 我们正式宣布末日时钟走到了“午夜前一分钟”，大多数观察者已经在为一场长期的全球战争作准备，这场战争现在看来已无法避免。

Text: At this point hoping that no one resorts to weapons of mass destruction classifies you as an optimist.
Translation: 到这个时候，如果你还希望没有人会使用大规模杀伤性武器，那你应该算是个乐观主义者。
我们怎么会到这种地步？

Text: The end of human civilization on Earth has never been closer.
Translation: 距离人类文明在地球上的终结空前的接近。

Text:
We are 80% on track and are still going at full speed on this downhill race towards Armageddon. Right now it seems we might be Earth's only hope. 

We must step up our game and help our sponsor bring things to a conclusion in which the Earth is not scorched by a thousand nuclear detonations.

Make no mistake - although we live our lives on a different world, our fate is very closely tied to that of our mother planet.
Translation:
我们有八成的把握还在正轨上，如果把这比作一场赛跑，我们正在全力赶超世界末日的脚步。现在看来，我们可能是地球唯一的希望。

我们必须加快脚步，并给我们的赞助方带来一个结论，即地球不会被一千次的核爆化为焦土。

毫无疑问，尽管我们生活在不同的世界上，但我们的命运与我们的母星紧密地联系在一起。

Text: Could this really be the end?
The Last War: The Day After Tomorrow
Silence… After a brief increase in brightness, everything has fallen silent.
Translation: 沉默。在一次短暂的闪光之后，一切都沉默了。

Text:
We are scrambling to re-establish communications with Earth, but for the first time no one seems to be listening. Deep down, everyone knows that the unfathomable has happened. 

There is denial, there is depression, yet we all know… for the nature of the luminosity spike can be one thing and one thing only: utter nuclear devastation spread all over the globe.

We will keep on listening, maybe someday someone will talk back.

<effect>Earth was devastated by the war. Export, Resupply, Research Outsourcing and Applicants have been disabled indefinitely.
Translation:
我们正在争取和地球重新建立通信，但这是第一次无人接听。冷静下来之后，每个人都知道不测的事情已经发生。

有人否认，有人绝望，但我们都知道……因为亮光的真相只可能是一件事：核爆炸在全球蔓延。

我们会继续倾听，也许有一天有人会回复。

<effect>地球受到了战争的破坏。出口，补给，研究外包和申请者均无限期停用。

Text: Earth is devastated by the war. Contact with our home planet is lost.
Translation: 地球受到战争的破坏。与我们的母星已经失去联系。

Text: The Last War: New World Order
Today we received the call we've been hoping for!
Translation: 今天，我们收到了我们一直在期待的消息！

Text:
There are humans left on Earth and they are reemerging to form a new society.

They inform us that things are very different now and Earth will never be the same again. Things are much more difficult; the environment is harsher and sunlight is scarcer; there is little resource to go around and most technological advancements have been lost to nuclear fire.

But they see this as a means of a new clean beginning and have expressed their desire to cooperate with us, this time as true equals.

<effect>Contact with Earth has been re-established. Rockets are available once again.
Translation:
地球上还有人类，他们正在重新组成一个新的社会。

他们告诉我们现在情况非常不同，地球也不再一样了。事情要困难得多，环境更加恶劣，阳光更加稀少，几乎没有什么资源可以开采，大部分技术进步都因核爆而丧失。

但他们认为这是一个崭新的开始，并表达了与我们合作的愿望，这次是真正的平等关系。

<effect>与地球的联系已重新建立。火箭再次可用。

Text: A new chapter for all of humanity begins.
Translation: 全人类的新篇章拉开了帷幕。

Text: A new society emerged from the ruins on Earth.
Translation: 一个崭新的社会从地球上的废墟中诞生。

Text: Only united can we hope to conquer the void. (constrain War Tension increase to <ChoiceA_Tension>%)
Translation: 只有团结一致我们才能征服虚空。（限制战争紧张度增加到<ChoiceA_Tension>%）

Text: Earth won't change. (<ChoiceB_Applicants> new applicants; War Tension will increase by <ChoiceB_Tension>%)
Translation: 地球不会改变。（新增<ChoiceB_Applicants>名申请者;战争紧张度将增加<ChoiceB_Tension>%）

Text: The Last War: Local Wars in the Third World
Translation: 最后一战：第三世界治安战

Text: The ripples made by the attacks on Earth have toppled governments and paved the way for opportunists to ride a wave of populist fury.
Translation: 地球上的攻击造成的影响已经使愤怒的民众推翻了政府，为投机分子操纵民粹主义的愤怒铺平了道路。

Text:
