Border skirmishes are slowly spilling into full scale invasions and the major powers are so far failing to instate a cease fire. The relative peace Earth has been enjoying for the past century now seems to have been a fragile facade, beneath which grudges and ambitions have been festering in wait for the right moment. 

The organization responsible has all but vanished after accomplishing more that it could have possibly hoped for. 

We, on the other hand, as a symbol of what humanity can achieve when working together and not by fighting between ourselves, are in an unique position to make a statement which may be of actual merit to the situation.
Translation:
边境冲突正在慢慢发展为全面入侵，而且大国之间目前还没有停火。地球在过去的一个世纪中一直享受着的相对和平似乎只是一个脆弱的外表，在这个外表下，怨恨和野心一直在等待合适的时机。

需要负责的组织还没完成人们对它的期望，就几乎销声匿迹了。

另一方面，作为人类共同努力的成果，而不是互相争斗的成果，我们处在一个特殊的位置，我们发表的言论可能对这种情况更具实际价值。

Text: We have received a disturbing medical report. A number of colonists have contracted an unknown disease.
Translation: 我们收到了一份令人不安的医疗报告。部分殖民者感染了一种未知的疾病。

Text:
The medical examination shows they all suffer from a form of hypercoagulation. Anti-coagulation medicines have been issued but the symptoms remain. Primary analysis of the patients’ blood samples hasn't found the cause behind the symptoms, but the level of damage to the erythrocytes leads to the workings of a virus-sized or smaller agent. We’re currently running a thorough check on the patients’ background information and behavior to find the source of the infection.

<effect>Several Colonists have gained the Infected trait.
Translation:
体检报告表明他们都患有高凝血症。我们已经向他们提供了抗凝血药物，但症状仍然存在。对患者血液样本的初步分析未能发现症状背后的原因，但从红细胞的损伤程度来看，它背后的元凶可能只有病毒那么大，或是比这更小。我们正在对患者的背景和行为进行彻查，以查明感染源。

<effect>数名殖民者获得了被感染者特质。

Text: I’ll inform Earth Control to enact decontamination protocols on any cargo we send.
Translation: 我会通知地球控制中心，对所有向我们发送的货物实施消毒。

Text: Some Colonists have contracted a mysterious infection. It's spreading rapidly across the colony.
Translation: 一些殖民者感染了神秘的物质，它在整个殖民地迅速蔓延。

Text: So far the bizarre nature of the infection has defeated all of our attempts to stop it. Yet time is growing short as more and more people are getting sick.
Translation: 到目前为止，由于这种感染的奇异特性，我们所有试图阻止它的尝试都以失败告终。然而随着越来越多的人感染，留给我们的时间越来越短。

Text: The challenge would be monumental as our researchers lack any epidemiological data on which to step up. The medical records we’ve gathered point out the symptoms, but the chemical structure of the agent is so alien that it cannot be compared to anything known to science. To make things worse, the nano-scale of the agent makes analysis even harder. Only by diverting enough resources to the task we can hope to make any breakthrough. The Wildfire Cure research has become available. Each newly constructed Medical Building will grant a 5% Tech Boost to the Wildfire Cure research (maximum 50%).
Translation: 挑战十分艰巨，因为我们的研究人员缺乏流行病学数据，无法加快脚步。我们收集的医疗记录已经指明了症状，但这种物质的化学结构是如此的陌生，以至于无法与我们已知的任何东西进行比较。更糟糕的是，它的纳米级尺寸使分析更加困难。只有把足够的资源转移到该课题上，我们才有希望取得突破。 “野火”治疗方案 研究已经可用。 每座新建的医疗建筑都会给“野火”治疗方案提供5％的研究加速（最多50％）。
最终，我们看到了一丝希望！

Text: Our scientists have devised a complex plan to discover the cure for the Wildfire infection. It would be a monumental effort but we must prioritize the research to be able to find a solution to the growing crisis.
Translation: 我们的科学家已经制定了一个复杂的计划，用以治疗“野火”的感染。这将是一项艰巨的任务，但我们必须优先研究，才能找到解决日益严重的危机的办法。

Text: Constructing new Medical buildings which gather data about the infection could speed up the progress towards discovering the Wildfire Cure.
Translation: 建设医疗建筑以收集有关感染数据，可以加快发现“野火”治愈剂的进度。

Text: Tremendous news! The cure for the Wildfire disease has been discovered!
Translation: 大新闻！“野火”的治疗方案已被发现！

Text:
A genetically modified strain of the Martian Wildfire interfaces with the RNA of the virus and effectively stops it from coagulating the blood plasma of the host. The intake of only a small amount of the cure is enough to halt the development of the disease, even though it wouldn't repair the tissue damage suffered so far.

The scientists experimented with multiple growth mediums and discovered that the most effective way to proliferate the medicine is by introducing it in mold cells growing on potatoes. This is great news because we can provide enough biomass for the modified mold to grow and if we do it quickly, we can still stand a chance to end the suffering on Earth.

<effect>The Curetato Crop has become available. Harvesting it will produce Cure for the Wildfire infection, which in turn has to be exported to Earth to end the crisis.

<effect> Colonists with the Infected trait will be cured permanently after their first visit in a Medical Building.
Translation:
转基因“野火”菌株能够与病毒的RNA相互作用，并有效阻止它对宿主的凝血作用。只需少量药剂就足以遏制疾病的发展，尽管它无法修复身体组织遭受的损伤。

科学家对多种培养基进行了实验，发现增殖药物最有效的方法是将其植入马铃薯上生长的霉菌细胞中。这是一个好消息，因为我们可以为转基因霉菌提供足够的生物质，如果我们能够迅速完成，我们仍然有机会结束地球上的灾难。

<effect>治愈豆作物已经上市。收获它会产生“野火”治愈剂，然后再将它出口到地球以结束危机。

<effect>具有被感染者特质的殖民者会在首次访问医疗建筑后被永久治愈。

Text: Start the process immediately. Time is of the essence!
Translation: 立即开始工作。时间就是生命！

Text: The Cure for Wildfire has been discovered! Conveniently spliced in modified mold cells, the cure can be grown on plant biomass. We have to produce it en masse!
Translation: “野火”的治疗方案已被发现！通过在转基因霉菌细胞中拼接，该药剂可以在植物生命体上生长固化。我们必须全面生产！

Text: The faint distress signal led us to the burial site of a small satellite. It had fallen deep under the red sands and could have been there for an eternity.
Translation: 微弱的求救信号将我们带到了一个小型卫星的掩埋处。它已深深地陷进红色的沙土下，可能已经见证了无尽的时间。

Text: It’s strange that we couldn't find any information for the flight in the international records. No black box nor signatures can be seen except for a discolored logo, ‘Scoop XI’. Upon opening the hull we found all of the internal systems corroded away by time, with only a small capsule remaining. The biohazard sign on it only served to stir our curiosity, but a closer examination discovered that it has been breached. We assume that the biological material inside has been destroyed. We have ordered the Rover to store the salvage for further analysis.
Translation: 奇怪的是，我们在国际记录中找不到有关该飞行器的任何信息。除了已经褪色的标识“Scoop XI”以外，没有黑盒子和识别标志。打开舱体后，我们发现所有的内部系统都在漫长的时间中风化了，只剩下一小块胶囊。上面的生化危害标志令我们的好奇心更加浓厚，但仔细检查后发现它已经破裂。我们假定里面的生物材料已被破坏。我们已命令火星车来打捞以作进一步分析。

Text: A curious find. Let’s hope the future will bring more answers than questions on that matter.
Translation: 一个有趣的发现。希望它会带来更多的答案，而不是带来更多的问题。

Text: We've just lost one of our scientific facilities in a disturbing set of events. We’re still investigating the cause of the disaster but there are clues which lead to unsettling conclusions.
Translation: 我们在一系列令人不安的事件中失去了一座科学设施。我们仍在调查灾难的原因，但调查到的某些线索指向一个令人恐惧的结论。

Text:
The security log shows that everything started with a malfunction in the storage unit where the analysis samples were stored. After that the internal systems of the laboratory began to rapidly fail one after another. Suspiciously, the damaged systems were all made of plastic and organic polymers, all corroded away within mere seconds.

Our operatives are puzzled with the cause of the chain reaction but the Chief Engineer has pointed out a fact which eluded our attention until now – the remains of the Scoop XI satellite were held in the storage unit of this facility. We didn't take any chances and ordered an emergency decontamination of the building. Let’s hope that whatever was in there has been destroyed.

<effect>A Laboratory has mysteriously malfunctioned.
Translation:
安全日志显示，一切都源自装有分析样本的存储单元中的故障。随后，实验室的内部系统开始陆续失效。可疑的是，损坏的系统全部由塑料和有机聚合物制成，但它们都在几秒钟内遭到侵蚀。

我们的操作员对这种连锁反应的原因感到困惑，但总工程师指出了一个没人注意到的事实 - Scoop XI卫星的残骸在该存储单元中存放。我们别无选择，只能下令对该建筑物进行紧急无害化处理。但愿那里面的东西都被毁坏了。

<effect>实验室因神秘原因故障。

Text: Monitor the colony and report any related cases.
Translation: 监控殖民地，并上报任何有关事件。

Text: We have to face it – we cannot stop the infection. No matter what we do it keeps spreading across the colony like a wildfire. Hence the name we've given it.
Translation: 我们必须面对这个事实：我们无法阻止感染。无论我们做何努力，它都像野火一样在整个殖民地蔓延。因此我们给它取了这个名字。

Text: All attempts to isolate the sources have failed. We can assume that the virus is traveling all across our life support and maintenance circuits. The only way to stop it is to turn off all systems, but this would be a death sentence for the colonists. We've ran out of options.
Translation: 所有试图隔离感染源的尝试都失败了。可以想见，这种病毒在我们的生命维持系统和电路中到处都是。唯一能阻止它的办法是关闭所有系统，但这对殖民者来说无异于死刑。我们已经别无选择。

Text: Don't despair, we will find a solution!
Translation: 不要绝望，总会有解决办法的！

Text: The infection is spreading at alarming rate through the colony. The scientists have named it Wildfire after its virulence and infection pattern.
Translation: 感染正以惊人的速度在整个殖民地蔓延。科学家们根据其破坏性和传染性将其命名为“野火”。

Text: The worst has happened – Wildfire has infected Earth. It was on board a rocket which returned to Earth and somehow it breached through all decontamination measures.
Translation: 最糟糕的事情发生了，“野火”已经感染了地球。它借助一枚火箭返回了地球，并以某种方式突破了所有的净化措施。

Text:
The infected personnel at the landing site deteriorated within hours of contracting the infection and the medics couldn't help them. This doesn't match our medical records as Wildfire takes much more time to develop here, on Mars. We suspect a form of rapid mutation due to the changes in the environment.

The rocket landing site has been placed under quarantine and the authorities have been informed. We can only pray that they manage to prevent the infection from spreading any further.

<effect>Infection Level on Earth has been set to the Contained level. If it reaches the Extinction level, the human population on Earth will be obliterated. Discover the Wildfire Cure and supply it to Earth to prevent this!
Translation:
着陆点周围的感染者在数小时内恶化，医务人员无法救治他们。这与我们的医疗记录不符，因为在火星上，“野火”需要更多时间才能扩散。由于火地之间的环境差异，我们怀疑它已迅速地发生了变异。

火箭着陆点已被隔离，并已通知当局。我们只能祈祷有关方面能够阻止感染进一步蔓延。

<effect>地球上的感染级别已被设置为受控级别。如果达到灭绝级别，地球上的所有人口将被消灭。寻找“野火”治疗方案并提供给地球，以防止这种情况！

Text: One of our rockets has spread the Wildfire infection on Earth. It's spreading rapidly - we have to discover the Cure before the human population on Earth is obliterated!
Translation: 我们的一枚火箭将“野火”传播到地球上。它正在迅速蔓延，我们必须赶在地球上的人类灭绝之前发现治疗方案！

Text: The worst has happened – Wildfire has infected Earth. We suspect this was caused by a recent meteor impact on Mars which lifted debris and showered them on the Blue Planet.
Translation: 最糟糕的事情发生了，“野火”已经感染了地球。我们怀疑这是由于最近的一颗流星造成的，这颗流星斜着撞上了火星，并迅速解体成无数碎片，有一部分碎片最终飞向了地球。

Text:
Several small settlements in different regions have been infected. The authorities report that the victims have deteriorated within mere hours, something which doesn't match our medical records. On Mars it takes Sols for the Wildfire to kill its host. We suspect some form of rapid mutation due to the changes in the environment.

The infected areas have been placed under quarantine and we can only pray that the authorities manage to prevent the disease from spreading any further.

<effect>Infection Level on Earth has been set to the Contained level. If it reaches the Extinction level, the human population on Earth will be obliterated. Discover the Wildfire Cure and supply it to Earth to prevent this!
Translation:
不同地区的几个小镇已被感染。当局报告说，受感染者在数小时内恶化，这与我们的医疗记录不符。在火星上，“野火”需要数天才能杀死它的宿主。由于火地之间的环境差异，我们怀疑它已迅速地发生了变异。

受感染地区已被隔离，我们只能祈祷有关方面能够阻止疾病进一步蔓延。

<effect>地球上的感染级别已被设置为受控级别。如果达到灭绝级别，地球上的所有人口将被消灭。寻找“野火”治疗方案并提供给地球，以防止这种情况！
整个星系都在需要我们！

Text: Martian meteors have spread the Wildfire infection on Earth! We must discover the Cure before the entire human population on Earth is obliterated!
Translation: 一颗流星将“野火”传播到地球上！我们必须赶在地球上的人类灭绝之前发现治疗方案！
野火：感染级别：小规模感染

Text: The Wildfire virus is spreading on Earth at an alarming rate, threatening entire populations all over the globe. The grim prediction is that soon the entire population of the planet will be affected.
Translation: “野火”病毒正以惊人的速度在地球上传播，威胁着全球所有人群。悲观的预测显示，很快，地球上的全体人口都将受到影响。

Text:
Scientists on Earth are desperately trying to discover a solution, but so far in vain. The virulence of the local strain is so high that sampling and transporting infected material is a death sentence. The nanoscopic size of the agent makes containment equally hard - biological filters fail to stop it effectively, threatening the safety of any laboratory which attempts to study it. The only solution is to analyze the original strain - the one we have on Mars - in order to find the cure. Time is running short!

Meanwhile, Third World countries are in a state of panic as the Wildfire strikes the poorest communities. Waves of refugees flee the affected regions and many resource operations are simply abandoned by the scared personnel. The market feels the hunger for raw resources and multiple demands have been filed for imports from Mars.

<effect>Infection Level has reached the Endemic state. Export prices have increased for the next <text_param1> Sols as the First World economies feel the hunger for resources.
Translation:
地球上的科学家们拼命想要找出解决方案，但至今仍然徒劳无功。当地毒株的致死性非常高，以至于对感染物的取样和运输都相当于死刑。它的纳米级尺寸使得控制它们的传播同样困难，生物过滤器无法有效阻止它，这使试图研究它的实验室的安全性受到威胁。唯一的解决办法是分析原始菌株，也就是在火星上的菌株，以寻找治疗方法。留给我们的时间不多了！

同时，由于“野火”侵略了许多贫困地区，第三世界国家处于恐慌状态。一大批难民逃离感染地区，人们闭门不出，工矿企业停工。市场渴求更多的原材料，并从火星进口以满足需求。

<effect>感染级别已达到小规模感染。随着第一世界经济体对资源的渴求，接下来<text_param1>天的出口价格上涨。

Text: Grave news... We have to hurry!
Translation: 重大新闻……我们必须尽快！

Text: The Wildfire infection is spreading uncontrollably on Earth. The Third World countries are hit harder due to their lack of resources to fight the disease effectively.
Translation: “野火”在地球上不受控制地传播。由于缺乏对抗疾病的资源，第三世界国家受到更大的冲击。
野火：感染级别：大规模感染

Text: Panic and desperation has spread across the population as waves of refugees flee the endemic zones.
Translation: 随着难民潮逃离感染地区，恐慌和绝望已蔓延到全球各地。

Text:
Wildfire has hit the Third World hard. The crisis can be felt across the developing countries and the First World as well. The chaos in the poorest countries resonates across the globe as the raw materials markets are plummeting. Entire resource operations in the Third World countries are abandoned as the workers flee the areas hit by the virus. People in the rich countries vocally support actions to relieve the struggling regions of the Earth and many companies divert resources for charity. Probably there’s still hope for humanity when so many of us refuse to ignore the tragedy of complete strangers.

<effect>Infection Level has reached the Epidemic state. Applicant pool is depleted for the next <text_param1> Sols due to quarantine measures.
Translation:
“野火”已经袭击了第三世界。即使是在第一世界和大型发展中国家也能感受到这种危机。随着原材料市场迅速缩小，贫穷国家的混乱在全球引起反响。由于工人逃离病毒感染地区，第三世界国家的所有资源都被放弃。富裕国家的人们发声支持采取行动，以缓解感染地区遭受的苦痛，许多公司将资源转移到慈善事业上。我们中的许多人并未忽视陌生人身上发生的悲剧，人类仍然有希望。

<effect>感染级别已达到大规模感染。由于隔离措施，应征者名单在接下来的<text_param1>天中锐减。
我们必须尽快采取行动！

Text: The Wildfire has infected the developed countries as well. Panic and desperation are spreading through the population!
Translation: “野火”也感染了发达国家。恐慌和绝望正在人群中蔓延！
野火：感染级别：全球性感染

Text: A wave of despair sweeps across the globe as people witness the futility of all measures against Wildfire. Everyone feels that our time on Earth is running short.
Translation: 当人们目睹所有针对“野火”的措施都无功而返时，绝望的浪潮席卷全球。每个人都认为我们时日无多。

Text:
The tragedy in the Third World has struck some of the richer countries as well, as the Wildfire infection has spread across their populations. People stay inside, fearing for their lives. Refugee camps are filling to the brim as entire areas of the world have been depopulated. Despair has brought the worse in some of us and looters raid the stores in the cities while the police and the army are trying to quell the violent riots. The economies of the First World are failing due to the growing crisis and our Sponsor wasn't spared as well. I'm afraid we’re running out of time...

<effect>Infection Level has reached the Pandemic state. Next level - Extinction! All resupply costs are increased for the next <text_param1> Sols due to supply shortages.
Translation:
发生在第三世界的悲剧同样袭击了一些较富裕的国家，因为“野火”也蔓延到他们的人群中。人们待在家中等待着审判。世界各地人口锐减，难民营处在被淹没的边缘。绝望已经给一些人带来了更严重的后果，暴徒游街抢劫，警察和军队正在努力平息暴乱。由于危机日益严重，第一世界的经济急剧衰退，我们的赞助商也无法幸免。恐怕我们的时间已经不多了。

<effect>感染级别已达到全球性感染。下一级别：灭绝！由于物资短缺，接下来<text_param1>天的所有补给成本都会增加。

Text: The Wildfire has nearly destroyed the human civilization. Scattered pockets of survivors are still dwindling in remote areas of the world.
Translation: “野火”几乎摧毁了人类文明。在世界偏远地区，零星分布的生还者的数量依然在减少。

Text: Earth's population has been obliterated by the Wildfire infection. No traces of any human activity can be detected. We could be the only humans left out there...
Translation: “野火”已彻底消灭所有地球人口。我们检测不到任何人类活动的痕迹。我们可能是唯一逃离那里的人。

Text: Our sensors detect no signs of human activity on the surface of Earth. We must admit that the battle with the Wildfire infection is lost. Night falls over humankind.
Translation: 我们的传感器没有发现任何人类活动的迹象。我们必须承认与“野火”之间的战斗彻底失败。黑夜笼罩着人类。

Text:
Earth has become an uninhabited mausoleum of our past greatness - the barren, lifeless husks of the once overcrowded megalopolises, the abandoned derelicts of our once great industrial might, the meadows where no children would ever play. The shroud of silence has covered the surface of the Earth and only the wind chimes through the ruins of our past, whispering stories no one is there to listen.

Is this the end? Is the Wildfire infection over, dead in its rampant destruction alongside its human hosts? Or would it mutate further, consuming all life on Earth? Only the children of our children will be able to answer these questions, watching from afar.

<effect>Earth population is devastated by the Wildfire infection! Export, Resupply, Research Outsourcing and Applicants have been disabled indefinitely.
Translation:
地球已经成为我们伟大的、无人居住的坟墓。曾经熙熙攘攘的都市成为一具死气沉沉的空壳，曾经震撼人心的工业基地成为一片废墟，曾经欢声笑语的草坪再也不会有儿童来玩耍。厚厚的灰尘像沉默的裹尸布覆盖着地球表面，只有风还在废墟中回荡，诉说着再也没人听得见的往事。

这就是结局吗？“野火”的感染是否结束，因为自身的肆虐而和人类宿主一同走向灭亡？还是会进一步变异，耗尽地球上的所有生命？从长远看，只有我们孩子的孩子能够回答这些问题。

<effect>地球遭到“野火”的摧毁！出口，补给，研究外包和应征者已无限期停用。

Text: A dark day, but do not lose hope - while we stand, humanity is alive!
Translation: 这是黑暗的一天，但不要失去希望！只要我们还活着，人类就还活着！

Text: We've received a radio transmission! From Earth! We thought we were the last humans and now this! Amazing news!
Translation: 大新闻！我们收到了无线电信号！来自地球！我们曾以为我们是最后的人类，可现在呢！令人惊叹的消息！

Text:
The survivors of the Wildfire gathered in remote places of the planet and inside protected facilities and began to re-emerge into the world when the signs of the infection began to vanish. They are unsure what happened with the disease, and so are we, but they claim that it appears gone. Earth is welcoming to humans once more!

The survivors have just began restarting abandoned factory complexes and power plants to fuel the industry needed to rebuild the civilization from the ruins. People move into the cities and repopulate the farming areas. The economy is starting to build up momentum – and they want us to become part of the exchange once more!

The survivors have their spirits high, but still the fear of the Wildfire lies in all of them – what if it comes back? This is the reason why they’ve requested us to send them as much of the Wildfire Cure as we can.

<effect>Communications with Earth have been re-established. Resupply, Research Outsourcing and Applicants are available once more. Export prices are reduced for the next <text_param1> Sols while the economy is recovering.

<effect>Cargo Rockets will be sent from Earth to be loaded with Wildfire Cure. When they reach Earth you will be granted <funding(reg_param2)> Funding.
Translation:
“野火”的幸存者聚集在偏远地区和收容所内，当感染迹象开始消失时，他们开始重新融入世界。他们不知道这种疾病受到了什么影响，我们也是如此，但他们声称“野火”已经消失。地球再次向人​​类张开怀抱！

幸存者开始重启废弃的工厂和发电厂，为从废墟中重建文明提供动力。人们进入城市，重新经营农田，经济开始增长。他们希望我们再次成为贸易伙伴！

幸存者们情绪高涨，但对野火的恐惧仍然伴随着他们。如果它回来了会怎样？因此他们要求我们尽可能多地送来“野火”治愈剂。

<effect>与地球的通信已重建。补给，研究外包和申请人重新可用。在经济复苏的同时，接下来<text_param1>天的的出口价格下降。

<effect>货运火箭将向地球发送“野火”治愈剂。当他们到达地球时，您将获得<funding(reg_param2)>资金。

Text: A cargo rocket is on its way to gather the Wildfire cure. People on Earth depend on our efforts to create a steady supply chain for the cure.
Translation: 一枚货运火箭正在采集治疗野火的药剂。 地球上的人依靠着我们的努力为治愈疾病建立稳定的供应链。

Text:
The amount of Wildfire Cure we have to return to Earth depends on the severity of the situation there. If the situation demands it, we should expect potential future requests for the cure.

<effect>Load Cargo Rockets with the Cure and Fuel and send them back to Earth until the Wildfire infection is completely eradicated.
Translation:
我们需要寄回去的野火药剂数量取决于那里的情况的严重程度，如果有那么个必要的话，我们可以预估未来对该药剂的潜在需求。

<effect>将治疗药物和燃料装载到货物火箭上并将它们送回地球，直到将野火这个顽疾彻底打败。

Text: The authorities on Earth have sent a Cargo Rocket to gather Wildfire Cure and return it to the struggling population on our homeworld.
Translation: 地球当局已经派出货运火箭来取治疗野火的药剂，并将其运回去地球给我们家乡的受苦人群。

Text: Refuel and load with Wildfire Cure to relief Earth from the Infection.
Translation: 补充燃料并将治疗野火的药剂装载到火箭上，以此来缓解地球受到的疾病感染。

Text: Authorities all over the Earth report that no cases of the Wildfire infection have been detected. Earth is freed from the yoke of the worst pandemic in history.
Translation: 全球当局报告再无发现野火的感染病例。 地球终于从有史以来最严重的流行病的枷锁中解脱出来了。

Text: People all around the world celebrate, but the consequences of the Wildfire crisis remain. We have decades – maybe even centuries before us – to cope with the damages caused, with the fear and desperation which reverberate inside all of us. But we remain optimistic that, given time, people will return to their everyday lives. The Wildfire crisis has shown us how fragile we are, how the ivory towers we’ve built could crumble in mere days. Maybe it’s the perfect moment to step back and reconsider the way we lived our lives. To rebuild our civilization, but build it better than before. The Wildfire Cure remains our hot lead towards the way the disease worked. By studying it we will be able to delve in the mystery of its structure and origin, preparing for worse days ahead. The infection on Earth has been eradicated! All Infection Level effects have been removed. Cargo Rockets will be sent from Earth to load Wildfire Cure. Upon return, each rocket will grant you Funding. Gained a new Technology, .
Translation: 世界各地的人都在为消灭野火庆祝，但野火所带来的后果是不可忽略的灾难。然而，在这次灾难之前我们有几十年 - 甚至几个世纪 - 去应对它所可能造成的损害，以及抚平在我们所有人面前回荡的恐惧和绝望。但是我们曾经乐观地认为，时间，能使人们重返正常的日常生活。 这次的野火危机向我们证明了我们的脆弱性，呈现了我们建造的象牙塔是如何在短短的几天内崩溃。也许这是回顾并重新考虑我们生活方式的最好时候。我们要以此为鉴，重建我们的文明，并建立得比以前更好。 治疗野火的药剂遗留给我们的是引领我们了解疾病病理的热潮。通过研究它，我们将能够深入研究其结构和起源的奥秘，为未来的日子做好准备。 地球上的感染已被根除！所有感染级别的影响已被删除。 货运火箭将从地球发送到火星来装载治疗野火的药剂。返回地球后，每枚火箭都会为您提供 资金。 获得了新技术，。

Text: The Wildfire infection has been eradicated on Earth! People all over the globe rejoice and praise your adequate actions!
Translation: 野火已经在地球上被消灭了！全世界的人都为你们的行动而高兴和赞扬！

Text: Refuel and load with Wildfire Cure to sell to Earth and gain Funding.
Translation: 重新补充燃料然后带上治疗野火的药剂送回地球，赚取资金。

Text: Our brave colonists waited for their brethren on Earth to be cured before they have received relief from the burden of the disease. The colonists would surely be happy to hear that the threat is eliminated – it will raise their spirits high!
Translation: 我们勇敢的殖民者们一直等待在地球上的同胞们被治愈后，才从疾病的重担中得到解脱。殖民地的居民听到威胁被消除的消息一定会非常高兴 - 这将会提高他们的士气！

Text: Today marks the moment when our colony is free from the threat of the Wildfire infection!
Translation: 今日标志着我们的殖民地摆脱野火感染的威胁！

Text:
Our efficient medical program has managed to cure all cases of the Wildfire infection. Mars has become a much safer place. We informed Earth and after a careful selection and medical checks they are ready to launch an emergency flight with healthy survivors aboard.

These are ordinary people who survived the Wildfire crisis somehow and managed to get to safety. None of them has passed the initial training required for arriving on Mars so we expect them to have a hard time acclimating to the life in the colony. But at least they would be safe from harm with us.

<effect>A rocket with <text_param1> Refugees aboard is inbound to Mars.
Translation:
我们高效的医疗设备竭尽所能治愈了所有的野火感染者。火星已经变得安全多了。我们通知了地球，在经过仔细的选择和检查以后，他们准备好了发射一艘带着健康的幸存者的紧急航班。

他们都是在野火危机中幸存下来渴望安全的普通人。他们之中没有人曾经受到过在火星生活所需的初始训练，所以估计他们将很难适应火星的生活，但至少应该不会伤害我们。

<effect>一整艘火箭的<text_param1>难民抵达火星。

Text: We’ll make sure these poor souls get the best reception.
Translation: 我们将确保这些可怜人能获得最好的接待。

Text: Now that Mars has become a safe haven from the Wildfire infection the authorities on Earth have sent a rocket with non-infected refugees to be sheltered in your colony.
Translation: 既然火星已经解除野火感染危机变成了足够安全的地方，地球当局已经派出了一艘带着无感染的难民飞往你的殖民地避难。

Text: Refugees on board are fleeing the infected Earth.
Translation: 难民们正在逃离四处都受感染威胁的地球。

Text: Beyond Earth: Vision of the Future
“No, aliens did not build the pyramids – human beings built the pyramids because we are clever and hard workers.
Translation: 不，外星人没有建造金字塔 - 人类会建造金字塔式因为我们聪明而又勤奋。

Text:
And in this day and age, when we value the strength of a civilization not by its ability to wage war - but by its ability to prevent it, our hard work and cleverness have only one place left to take us – up.

Up towards the stars - above our superficial segregations and competing with ourselves. Up towards a united humanity spread out on many worlds… possibly even stars.  

I am more than certain that the last several thousand years of our history are but the bumpy road towards a version of humanity where there is no hunger, no war, no needless suffering and where the future holds nothing but opportunity and wonder.  And I also believe we are quite close to the end of this turbulent road. I make it my mission to help take us through this last stretch and today I announce my plan in investing the vast majority of my considerable fortune to this endeavor. “

Rede Goddenberry, one of the wealthiest and most powerful people on Earth, addresses the UN General Assembly
Translation:
在当今时代，当我们重视文明的力量并将其用于阻止战争而不是发动战争时，我们的聪敏勤奋就只有唯一的用途 - 繁荣昌盛。

向往着群星 - 超越这肤浅内斗的种族。向往着向整个世界传播团结和统一...甚至很可能是那群星。

我十分确信我们历史的最后几年将是一条崎岖但通向没有饥饿、没有战争、没有无谓的痛苦，未来充满奇迹和惊喜的道路。而且我相信我们距离现在这动荡之路的尽头已经不远了，我的使命就是帮助大家携手共度这最后的时期，今天我宣布我计划将我的大部分财力都投入到这次努力之中。

Rede Goddenberry, 世界上其中一位最富有最具权势的人在联合国大会上的发言

Text: Rede Goddenberry gives out a speech at the UN.
Translation: Rede Goddenberry在联合国大会上发表演讲。

Text: Beyond Earth: A Deluded Old Billionaire
Translation: 超越地球：一位受骗的老百万富翁

Text: Greetings from Earth! I’ve wanted an audience with the founders of the first human settlement away from our dear blue planet for ages now.
Translation: 来自地球的问候！许久以来，我一直都想要同这远离我们亲爱的蓝色星球的第一座人类居住地的创始人一起当一名观众。

Text:
You see, in you I find kindred souls, souls who do not view my speech at the UN as the ramblings of a deluded old billionaire. I’m certain my vision resonates with all of you up there; after all - you are a part of it.

My Beyond Earth initiative is pushing several separate projects simultaneously - all aimed at bringing prosperity and peace to a human race spread across the Solar System.

One of the projects in question is currently in a ditch - the planning of a Moon base to mine Hydrogen 3, called Aldrin Base. I’m certain I don’t need to tell you what an abundance of the material would mean energy-wise. I’d kindly implore you, if your situation permits it of course, to contribute some research capacity and quite frankly know-how to the Beyond Earth initiative.

<effect>Beyond Earth Initiative tech unlocked. Research the tech to help the Aldrin Base project.
Translation:
你知道的，我在你身上找到了志同道合的灵魂，你们不会把我在联合国的演讲看做是一位受骗的身价百亿的老头儿的闲言碎语，我确信我的愿景与你们所有人有着共鸣； 毕竟 - 你是其中之一。

我的超越地球计划有几个项目正在同时推进 - 所有项目都旨在为人类在太阳系的繁衍带来繁荣与和平。

目前正在讨论的其中一个项目遇到了障碍 - 在名为奥尔德林的月球基地上开采氚元素的计划。我确信我不需要告诉你对能源而言大量的原料意味着什么。我只恳请你，如果可以的话请为超越地球计划贡献一些研究力量和知识诀窍。

<effect>超越地球计划技术解锁。研究该技术以帮助完成奥尔德林基地项目。

Text: Rede Goddenberry contacts the Mars colony with direct request for research contribution towards his Beyond Earth initiative.
Translation: Rede Goddenberry联系火星殖民地并直接请求为超越地球计划的研究贡献力量。

Text: The Beyond Earth initiative needs your help! And not with know-how this time around.
Translation: 超越地球计划需要你的帮助！而且这次不是知识诀窍。

Text:
Currently we are falling behind schedule at our Rubicon Station front - a deep-space shipyard tasked with expanding our space-faring capabilities - and would kindly request you to contribute Metals towards bringing the construction back on track.

We ran the numbers and have come to the conclusion that using Mars for firing raw materials towards our separate projects could prove far more effective than doing this from Earth and will speed up the whole process of bringing the project to fruition. 

A rocket to pick up the resources has been sent towards Mars. Every now and then more such rockets will arrive. If you have the materials to spare, please do!

<effect>A rocket requesting supplies for the Rubicon Station megaproject is headed towards Mars.
Translation:
目前我们在卢比孔空间前线的进度落后了 - 一个深空太空船坞，其任务是扩大我们的太空航行能力 - 恳请你能贡献一些金属让工程进度回归正轨。

我们对这些数据进行了分析并得出结论，利用火星资源进行独立项目的原料烧制比在地球上要有效得多，这将加速整个项目的完成。

一艘为运载资源而派遣的火箭已经飞往火星。每隔一段时间就会有更多这样的火箭抵达。如果你有多余的资源，请你帮忙制作！

<effect>一艘希望获得用于卢比孔空间工程的资源的火箭正在前往火星。

Text: See what resources we can spare.
Translation: 看看我们有什么资源有富余。

Text: Rede Goddenberry requests the export of materials for the construction a farm hub on Ganymede.
Translation: Rede Goddenberry请求能出口一些金属用于在木卫三的农作中心建设。
奥尔德林基地 (奖励：<MoonResearchReward> 科学家应征)

Text: Port Vesta (bonus: Reduced cost of Robotics Techs by <AsteriodReserachReward>%)
Translation: 维斯塔港口 (奖励：减少机器人学科技的花费<AsteriodReserachReward>%)
卢比孔空间站 (奖励：<funding(RubiconResearchReward)> 资金)
春日之城 (奖励：<GanymedeResearchReward> 植物学家 & <GanymedeResearchReward> 地质学家应征)
超越地球：选择研究重点

Text: Our contributions towards the Beyond Earth project have been received and we have Rede Goddenberry’s everlasting thanks – on behalf of humanity’s future.
Translation: 我们已经收到了对超越地球计划项目贡献的回报和Rede Goddenberry持续不断地答谢 - 代表人类的未来。

Text:
We are given a choice to contribute research to a project of our liking next, partially advancing progress on any of the following:

Aldrin Base - a settlement on the Moon to mine the Lunar soil for Hydrogen 3.

Port Vesta - a mining hub situated in the Asteroid Belt.

Rubicon Station - a shipyard in deep space.

And finally, Spring City - a farming hub on water-rich Ganymede.
Translation:
我们可以选择对喜欢的下一个项目做研究，加快以下特定项目的进展：

奥尔德林基地  - 月球上的一个用于开采土壤中的氚元素的根据地。

维斯塔港口 - 位于小行星带的一个采矿中心。

卢比孔空间站 - 在深空中的一个太空船坞。

还有最后的，春日之城 - 富有淡水资源的木卫三上的一个农作中心。

Text: Rockets to supply resources to Beyond Earth projects begin arriving. Each will partially advance a specific project.
Translation: 为超越地球计划项目提供资源的火箭开始抵达。各艘火箭都可以加快各自项目的进展。
奥尔德林基地 (需要：高级资源)
维斯塔港口 (需要：电子元件)
卢比孔空间站 (需要：金属)
超越地球：选择火箭贸易

Text: The Beyond Earth initiative needs more materials for the completion of its various projects.
Translation: 超越地球计划需要更多的金属以完成各种各样的项目。

Text:
We are being asked to pick a project we are willing to contribute resources to next. Each time we choose and send supplies towards a project it will advance a certain amount towards completion. The Beyond Earth projects are:

Aldrin Base - a Hydrogen 3 mining facility on the Moon tasked with powering up all of humanity’s activity in the entire Solar System.

Port Vesta - a mining operation in the Asteroid Belt guaranteeing humanity never wages war over resources again.

Rubicon Station - a shipyard situated in deep space tasked with considerably expanding humanity's space fleet construction capabilities.

Spring City - a farming settlement on Ganymede with the potential to feed humanity spread across an entire star system with capacity to spare.
Translation:
我们需要选择下一个我们乐意贡献资源的项目。每次选择一个项目并且送出物资都能明显提高项目进展。超越地球计划项目包括：

奥尔德林基地 - 位于月球上的一座开采氚元素的工厂，目的是为人来在整个太阳系的活动提供能源。

维斯塔港口 - 位于小行星带中的一座采矿中心，目的是保障人类不再因资源而发起战争。

卢比孔空间站 - 位于深空中的一座太空船坞，目的是扩大人类的太空航行能力。

春日之城 - 位于木卫三上的一座农作中心，目的是为人类向所有星系的扩张提供充足的粮食支持。

Text: This rocket is tasked with brining construction materials for the Hydrogen 3 mining base being built on the Moon - Aldrin Base.
Translation: 该火箭的任务是将建设氚元素开采基地 - 奥尔德林基地所需要的资源送往月球。
奥尔德林基地贸易火箭
奥尔德林基地项目进展已推进

Text: This rocket is headed out for the Asteroid Belt to bring resources for the Port Vesta mining facility.
Translation: 该火箭已经携带建设维斯塔港口所需要的资源出发去往小行星带。
维斯塔港口项目进展已推进

Text: This rocket is tasked with bringing construction materials for the completion of the Rubicon Station - a deep space shipyard.
Translation: 该火箭的任务是运送建设卢比孔空间站 - 一座深空太空船坞所需要的资源。
卢比孔空间站贸易火箭
卢比孔空间站项目进展已推进

Text: This rocket is headed out for Jupiter's largest moon - Ganymede - where a project to create the breadbasket of humanity is under way.
Translation: 该火箭已经携带建设人类的产粮基地所需要的资源出发去往木星最大的卫星 - 木卫三。
超越地球：奥尔德林基地开始运作

Text: Aldrin Base has been completed! The Hydrogen 3 mining facility is fully functional and has begun exporting energy to Earth.
Translation: 奥尔德林基地的建设已经完成！氚元素开采设备运行良好，已经开始向地球输送能源。

Text:
Earth celebrates a full independence of fossil fuel based energy sources and has a now virtually endless power supply coming from the Moon available for everyone. 

The technologies needed to transit power to far off posts like our colony is still a ways off, but we are given schematics to improve on our Fusion Reactors, based on the perfected design used at the Aldrin Base.

We have helped bring humanity closer to Rede Goddenberry’s utopic vision.

<effect>+<reg_param1>% Fusion Reactors Power production.
Translation:
地球上的人为获得完全独立于化石燃料的新能源而庆祝着，现在由月球提供的能源几乎永无止尽地为每一个人提供电力。

能够将能源输送到如我们的殖民地般的如此遥远的地方所必需的技术依然是无法触及的，但我们已经基于在奥尔德林基地应用的完美设计对核聚变反应堆做出了改进方案。

我们已经帮助人类往Rede Goddenberry所描绘的图景更进了一步。

<effect>+<reg_paraml>% 核聚变反应堆电力生产。
地球已经被永远地改变了。

Text: The Moon Hydrogen 3 mining base - Aldrin Base - has been completed and Earth now enjoys limitless clean energy.
Translation: 月球氚元素开采基地 - 奥尔德林基地 - 已经建造完毕，现在地球上的人正享受着永无止尽的清洁能源。
超越地球：维斯塔港口建设完成

Text: An extraordinary feat has been completed – an unparalleled  milestone in humanity’s history!
Translation: 一个卓越壮举已经完成 - 这是人类历史中一座空前未有的里程碑！

Text:
Port Vesta has begun operations.

At the heart of the Asteroid Belt, the mining base is predicted to end poverty on Earth and bring an abundance of materials for all needs far and wide across the Solar System. 

The first shipments are already Earthbound, and while free and endless materials may await us in the future, for now we have been given the know-how to upgrade all of our extractors and make them more productive.

The megaproject envisioned by Rede Goddenberry has been completed.

<effect>+<reg_param1>% Extractor production.
Translation:
维斯塔港口已经开始运作。

位于小行星带中心地带的采矿中心寄托了终结地球上的贫困的希望，它将为整个太阳系的所有需求提供大量充足的资源。

第一批货物已经被运往地球，免费而且永无止尽的资源在未来等着我们，而现在我们也已经运用我们的知识技术给所有采集器做了升级，使他们更具生产效率。

Rede Goddenberry所设想的宏伟项目已经完成。

<effect>+<reg_paraml>% 采集器产能。

Text: Humanity is conquering the Solar System.
Port Vesta, a mining base situated in the Asteroid Belt has been completed, virtually ensuring an abundance of resources for all of humanity.
Translation: 位于小行星带的采矿基地Vesta港口已经建成，为全人类确保了丰富的资源。

Text: What was until recently pure science fiction has now become a reality. Rubicon Station has been built and is already receiving its first permanent residents.
Translation: 现在，科幻小说已经成为现实。Rubicon太空站已经建成并接收了第一批永久居民。

Text:
A shipyard built in deep space, the Station is expected to grow humanity’s space faring capacity a thousandfold.

The unique location of the base is also perfect for fringe research purposes, boosting humanity’s understanding of the universe.

This project may have never been completed without our help and guidance.

Rede Goddenberry’s vision has become more real than ever.

<effect>Reduced cost of Physics and Engineering Techs by <reg_param1>%.
Translation:
预计建在深空中的造船厂将增加人类数千倍的航天能力。

基地的独特位置对于边缘研究来说也是完美的，促进了人类对宇宙的理解。

没有我们的帮助和指导，这个项目不可能完成。

Rede Goddenberry的愿景变得如此的真实。

<effect>降低了<reg_param1>%的物理和工程技术成本。

Text: The Solar System just became a smaller place.
Translation: 太阳系只是宇宙中渺小的一隅。

Text: Rubicon Station has been built. Space vessel construction will never be the same.
Translation: Rubicon太空站已完工，如今太空船的建造将今非昔比。

Text: From the idealistic vision of one eccentric old billionaire, to a farm world meant to feed all of humanity’s current and possible future needs – Spring City has now begun food production.
Translation: 从一个古怪的老亿万富翁的理想主义愿景，到一个旨在养活人类当前和未来可能需要的农场世界，Spring城现在开始了粮食生产。

Text:
Many heated regions on Earth where hunger and strife are rampant will now be saved.

Our role in the realization of this project is far from overlooked and we have been sent new crops which are a extremely tough, healthy and nutritious to use on our own farms.

The Beyond Earth initiative brings humanity closer to a place where hunger and poverty will become nothing more than the woes of yesterday.

<effect>New Ganymede Rice hydroponic crop available.
Translation:
在地球上，许多饥饿与冲突猖獗的地区现在将被拯救。

我们现在实施的这个项目中的作用得到了重视，发送了新的作物，这些作物是更坚韧，健康和有营养，可以在我们自己的农场上使用。

冲向太空行动的使人类的饥饿和贫穷成为昨日之魇。

<effect>新增木卫三水培大米作物。

Text: Can't wait to see what this does for the salad quality down here!
Translation: 迫不及待想要看看这款沙拉的味道如何呢！

Text: Spring City - the breadbasket project of humanity - has been completed.
Translation: Spring城 - 人类的粮仓项目已经完成。

Text: Beyond Earth: The Dream Lives On

A time of change is befalling the human race – a time of unity and hope for a brighter future that most couldn’t have imagined just a short few years ago. A massive push - by thousands of people and the best that two worlds had to offer - has become a reality. Our role will never be forgotten and the everlasting gratitude of a space fearing humanity will always be a factor. And spearheading the whole affair - the vision of an eccentric old billionaire who did not live to see how this vision uplifted the entire human race to conquer the Solar System with no reasons for strife and competition. May he rest in peace and forever be remembered a visionary of Mankind. Gained a new Technology, .
Translation: 人类正面临着时代的巨变 - 一个团结的时代，一个创造未来的时代，一个几年前的无法想象的更光明的未来。 来自两个世界的佼佼者，和成千上万人的共同努力，使之成为现实。我们在其中扮演的角色将载入史册，人性中对太空的恐惧一直是一个因素。 然而引领整个事件的 - 一个古怪的老亿万富翁，并没有活着看到他的愿景，是如何促进人类放弃纷争，放弃冲突，团结一心的征服了太阳系。 愿他安息，永远被人们铭记为人类梦想家。 获得了一项新技术，。

Text: Rede Goddenberry will never be forgotten.
Although Rede Goddenberry did not live to see his vision become a reality, his legacy will forever live on for all of humanity to prosper from.
Translation: 尽管Rede Goddenberry没有活着看到他的愿景成为现实，但他的遗赠仍旧促进着人类的繁荣。

Text: Beyond Earth: In Time to Witness
The Beyond Earth initiative has been deemed a success. Already the efforts of this massive endeavor are bearing fruit.
Translation: 冲向太空行动被认为是成功的，这一巨大努力的成果已经开花结果。

Text: A time of change is befalling the human race - a time of unity and hope for a brighter future that most couldn’t have imagined just a short few years ago. A massive push - by thousands of people and the best that two worlds had to offer - has become a reality. Our role will never be forgotten and the everlasting gratitude of a space fearing humanity will always be a factor. And spearheading the whole affair, the vision of an eccentric old billionaire who wished to see the bright future of his kind before his passing. History will remember Rede Goddenbarry a visionary of Mankind. Gained a new Technology, .
Translation: 人类正面临着时代的巨变 - 一个团结的时代，一个创造未来的时代，一个几年前的无法想象的更光明的未来。 来自两个世界的佼佼者，和成千上万人的共同努力，使之成为现实。我们在其中扮演的角色将载入史册，人性中对太空的恐惧一直是一个因素。 引领整个事件的，一位古怪的亿万富翁的愿景，就是希望在他逝世前看到这个光明的未来。 历史永远铭记Rede Goddenbarry这个人类梦想家。 获得了一项新技术，。

Text: A new era for humanity has dawned!
Translation: 人类的新时代已经到来！

Text: Rede Goddenberry's dream becomes reality with him still alive to witness it unfolding.
Translation: Rede Goddenberry的梦想成为现实，他活着见证了这一切。

Text: We have received grave news from Earth. It seems Rede Goddenberry has fallen ill and doesn’t have much time left.
Translation: 我们收到了来自地球的不幸消息，看来Rede Goddenberry已经病倒，没有多少时间了。

Text:
The billionaire has sent a special request out to us:

“It seems I can no longer hide the fact that I am and have been dying in these recent months. Although this may explain my push for haste in the completion of the Beyond Earth initiative to some, the reality is that it's badly needed with or without my condition in mind.

People are suffering and dying on Earth - in war, from deceases, from malnutrition. All of this is not necessary and my vision will remedy all of it, once complete.

So I convey this message to you, whom I have come to see as my closest partners in this endeavor: Please redouble your efforts, for it would please a dying old man greatly to see the plan bearing fruit before his death. But if not to warm my old heart, do it because you believe in what the initiative represents as I know you do.”
Translation:
亿万富翁向我们发出了特别的要求：

“看来我不能再隐瞒事实了，这几个月来，我已病入膏肓。尽管这是我催促冲向太空计划尽快完成的原因之一。但无论是否考虑到我的病情，更重要的是另一个原因。

地球上的人们正在饱受战争所带来痛苦和折磨 - 饥荒，瘟疫和死亡。一旦完成我的愿景，这些痛苦和折磨都会结束。

所以我传递给你，在未结束战争的努力中，我视为最亲密的伙伴一个信息：请加倍努力，因为看到这个计划开花结果，会极大的安慰我这个垂死的老人的心。即便不是为了我，也请你去做吧，因为我相信你知道这个计划代表了什么。”

Text: I am at loss for words.
Rede Goddenberry reveals he is ill and dying.
Translation: Rede Goddenberry表明他快要病死了。

Text: Beyond Earth: Rede Goddenberry has passed away
Translation: 冲向太空：Rede Goddenberry已经病逝

Text: Today we received news of Rede Goddenberry’s passing. We are all deeply saddened by this loss.
Translation: 今天我们收到Rede Goddenberry过世的消息。 我们对这次损失深感悲痛。

Text:
But we are still inspired by his vision - a vision where humanity travels free amidst the worlds of a unified Solar System. 

Although Goddenberry’s death will dissuade many of his current partners to see the completion of the Beyond Earth initiative, we just may bring the plan to full or at least partial realization before other parties quit their involvement.
Translation: 但我们依旧被他的愿景 - 人类自由行走在统一的太阳系世界中所鼓舞。
虽然Goddenberry的去世会导致他目前的许多合作伙伴放弃参与冲向太空计划，但我们可以那之前完全或至少部分实现计划。

Text: Beyond Earth: The Dream is Dead
Following Rede Goddenberry’s death, all of his former partners from Beyond Earth have since abandoned the initiative.
Translation: Rede Goddenberry去世后，他的所有冲向太空计划的的前合作伙伴们，都已经放弃了这一计划。

Text:
We have failed to persuade them without the uniting effect of his utopic vision spearheaded by himself alone. 

The different gains in space exploration and asteroid mining will not simply disappear but are being bought off and pushed towards partial completion by various Earth-based corporations that will exploit them for personal profit and show no signs of desire to contribute to what was Rede Goddenberry’s vision of a united humanity.

In the end, history will remember him as an old eccentric billionaire who tried to swim upstream for humanity’s sake but ended up solidifying the rule of massive corporations that are more interested in profits than in an idealistic future.
Translation:
没有了他独到的乌托邦视角来联合众人，我们没能说服合作伙伴。

在太空探索和小行星采矿方面的不同成果，不会简单的消失，而是被各地球上的公司收购并部分完成，这些公司将利用它们谋取私利，并且没有表现出愿意为Rede Goddenberry团结人类的愿景作出贡献的迹象。

最终，历史只会记住他是一位古怪的亿万富翁，试图为了人类的利益逆流而上，但最终巩固了对利润更感兴趣的大公司，而不是理想化的未来。

Text: Rede Goddenberry's plan falls apart as previous partners leave the initiative after his passing.
Translation: Rede Goddenberry的计划因为前任合伙人离开而分崩离析。

Text: There was a terrible accident at the Port Vesta project site.
Translation: 在Vesta港项目现场发生了一起可怕的事故。

Text:
A strong solar flare erupted without a sufficient head warning. There are 23 confirmed casualties.

The solar flare erupted during a short window of vulnerability, when Port Vesta had no operational means of shielding against such an event. If it had happened just a bit later, the defenses would've been operational.

Sadly the damage is massive in scale. The project suffered a major setback.
Translation:
没有足够的头部防护，强烈的太阳耀斑爆发。有23人确认伤亡。

太阳耀斑在一个短暂的脆弱时期爆发，当时Vesta港没有屏蔽这种事件的有效手段。如果事情发生的时间稍晚一些，防御措施将会运作。

可悲的是，这种破坏规模巨大，使该项目遭受重大挫折。

Text: A tragedy indeed, but we will overcome this setback.
Translation: 确实是一场悲剧，但我们将克服这一挫折。

Text: News of sabotage at the Aldrin Base mining facility on the Moon has just been made public. Luckily, there are no fatalities.
Translation: 刚刚公布了Aldrin基地采矿设施的被破坏新闻。幸运的是，没有伤亡。

Text:
The project has suffered a major setback. Below is Mr Goddenberry’s statement:

“What the Beyond Earth initiative is striving to ultimately achieve is change - change that will make inter-human rivalry a thing of the past. 

As with all change, there will be resistance. There are those who prosper from wars, from suffering. And they see a united humanity as a threat, for they will be left behind.

To them I have to say: the world is moving on. Try as you might, you have only slowed down an irreversible process.”
Translation:
该项目遭受重大挫折。 Goddenberry先生的发言如下：

“冲向太空计划力图最终实现的是变革 - 将使人类间的冲突成为过去。

与所有变化一样，都会有阻力。那些发战争财，给他人制造痛苦的人，会认为团结的人类是一种威胁，因为他们将被抛在脑后。

对于这些人，我不得不说：世界正在前进。尽可能地尝试，你们只是在减慢不可逆转的过程。”

Text: A setback. We will overcome it!
Translation: 挫折而已，我们会战胜它！

Text: The Biotech field deals with Food production, life support and medicine.
Translation: 生物科技 负责的领域包括 食物 生产, 生命支持 和 医药.

Text: Moisture Vaporator Upgrade (Hygroscopic Coating) - Water production increased by %. With its mechanical simplicity and applicability to any point on Mars's surface, the Water-Vapor Adsorption Reactor technology can extract water directly from the Martian atmosphere.
Translation: 给水分蒸馏器升级增加 (吸湿外层)——淡水产出增加 %。 由于它的机械简单性和对火星地表任何一点的适应性，水蒸气吸附式反应堆技术可以直接从火星大气中提取淡水资源。

Text: New Building: Farm () - Produces Food. Large in-Dome building which is more work-efficient and requires no Power. "They say once you grow crops somewhere you’ve officially colonized it." Andy Weir – The Martian
Translation: 新建筑： 农场 () - 可以生产食物。穹顶内部的一种高效且不需要能量的大型建筑。 “他们说一旦你在某处种植农作物，你就正式地在那殖民了” Andy Weir – 火星人

Text: New Building: Fungal Farm () - An out-Dome building that produces Food. "All fungi are edible. Some fungi are only edible once." Terry Pratchett
Translation: 新建筑： 真菌农场 () - 一个在穹顶外部生产食物的建筑。 “所有的蘑菇都能吃，但有的蘑菇只能吃一次。” Terry Pratchett

Text: MOXIE Upgrade (Magnetic Filtering) - Oxygen production increased by %. Magnetic filters block ferromagnetic metal contaminants as well as weakly magnetic particles from the Martian atmosphere when inhaled by our MOXIEs, greatly increasing their efficiencies.
Translation: 制氧机升级增加 (磁力过滤器) - 氧气产出增加 %. 制氧机吸入火星大气时，磁力过滤器会过滤掉磁性金属污染物和大气中的弱磁性颗粒，大大提高制氧效率。

Text: New Spire Building: Water Reclamation System () - drastically reduces the Water consumption of the Dome. Water on Mars is abundant, yet it is mostly underground and in a frozen state – making it, while within reach, still difficult and expensive to mine. This makes recycling necessary to ensure a steady water supply.
Translation: 新的中央塔： 淡水再生系统 () - 大幅度地减少穹顶的淡水资源消耗。 淡水在火星上还是挺充足的，但是大多数都在地下而且呈冻结状态——因此即使在我触手可及的范围内，我也仍然感觉到开采的困难和高昂代价。这使得淡水循环成为确保供水稳定的必要条件。

Text: Unlock new crops in Farms and Hydroponic Farms that provide Oxygen and improve soil quality. From the salad you eat to the air you breathe, plants have a fundamental role to play for humanity well beyond Earth.
Translation: 解锁 新农作物 位于农场和水培农场中，可以提供氧气和改善土壤质量。 在这距离地球遥远的地方，从你吃的沙拉，到你呼吸的氧气，植物都为人类生存扮演者重要的角色。

Text: Martianborn Colonists graduate faster in Universities and Sanatoriums and have higher chance to gain Perks from Schools. Certain restrictions that still persist on Earth derived from religion and general conservatism are absent here on Mars. As a result, we have the freedom to genetically enhance our newborns and hone their already-sharp minds to a sharp point.
Translation: 生于火星的 殖民者在大学和康复中心毕业得更快，而且有更高的概率在学校中习得优良特性。 在火星上，仍然存在着来自宗教和一般保守主义的某些限制。因此，我们可以自由地从基因上提高我们的新生儿的能力，并将他们已经敏锐的头脑变成更加突出。

Text: Farms increase the Comfort of all residences in the Dome. Seeing something green against the endless reddish barrens of Mars can be quite therapeutic.
Translation: 农场 会增加穹顶内所有住所的舒适度。 避开火星无尽的红野看一些绿色的东西能得到相当的放松。

Text: Residences in Basic Domes have improved Comfort. “One touch of nature makes the whole world kin.” William Shakespeare
Translation: 在 基础穹顶 中的住所的舒适度将得到改善。 “接触自然，与世界成为亲人。” William Shakespeare

Text: New Spire Building: Medical Center () - has larger capacity and is more effective than the Infirmary. “The good physician treats the disease; the great physician treats the patient who has the disease.” William Osler
Translation: 新的中央塔： 医疗中心 () - 比医疗站具有更大的容纳空间和更高的效率。 “一名好的医生关心的是人患的病，而一名优秀的医生关心的是患病的人。” William Osler

Text: Unlock new crops in Farms and Hydroponic Farms that provide better Food yields. The overall reputation of GMO grown foods has increased dramatically when the only other alternative for food is red dirt.
Translation: 解锁 新农作物 位于农场和水培农场中，可以提供更高的食物产量。 当要么什么都不吃，要么就只能吃红土时，所有转基因食品的声誉就显著提升了。

Text: Water consumption of Domes reduced by %. "No water, no life. No blue, no green." Sylvia Earle
Translation: 穹顶 的淡水消耗减少 %。 “没有水，就没有生活。” Sylvia Earle

Text: Farm, Hydroponic Farm & Fungal Farm Upgrade: Automation - Decreases number of workers. Now that we have adapted crops to the Martian environment we can mechanize some procedures.
Translation: 农场、水培农场、真菌农场 升级：自动化 - 减少工人数量。 既然我们已经让农作物适应了火星的环境，我们就可以来让一些程序机械化了。

Text: New Spire Building: Hanging Gardens () - a beautiful park complex that greatly improves the Comfort of all Residences in the Dome. One of humanity’s most enduring and fanciful legends from the ancient past is made a reality on Mars.
Translation: 新的中央塔： 空中花园 () - 一座瑰丽的复合式公园，能够极大地提升所有住所的舒适度。 人类历史上最悠久、最富有幻想的传说之一，在火星上成为现实。

Text: Medical Center Upgrade (Holographic Scanner) - Increases birth rate in the Dome. Holographic technologies can significantly improve medical diagnostics and monitoring procedures.
Translation: 医疗中心 升级 (全息扫描) - 增加穹顶里的出生率。 全息扫描技术可以显著地改善医疗诊断和监察系统。

Text: New Building: Moisture Vaporator () - Produces Water from the atmosphere. Doesn't produce during Dust Storms. "What I really need is a drone that understands the binary language of moisture vaporators." Unknown Martian Colonist
Translation: 新建筑： 水分蒸馏器 () - 从大气中生产淡水资源。沙尘暴时停止工作。 “我真正需要的是一个能够理解水分蒸馏器的二进制语言的机器人。” 不明火星殖民者

Text: Infirmary & Medical Center Upgrade (Rejuvenation Treatment) - Improves Service Comfort and provides Relaxation, allowing Colonists to visit and gain Comfort. You haven’t truly colonized a planet until you build the first Spa center on it.
Translation: 医疗站 & 医疗中心 升级 (回春疗法) - 改善服务质量，并且允许殖民者参观放松以获得舒适度。 你还没有真正地殖民一个星球，除非你建起你的第一座SPA中心。

Text: Retirement age and death from old age happen later in the Colonists' lifespan. "Live long and prosper" Vulcan Salute
Translation: 在殖民者的寿命中，退休年龄 和 死 于寿尽 将变得更晚。 “多福多寿” Vulcan Salute

Text: New Wonder: Geoscape Dome () - A slice of Earth on Mars, this Dome has high Comfort and increases the Sanity of its inhabitants on every Sol. "It's a fixer-upper of a planet but we could make it work." Elon Musk
Translation: 新奇观：超巨型穹顶 () - 火星上的一片地球，这个穹顶具有很高的舒适度，并且每日都会增加其居民的精神值。 “这是一座需要维修的火星建筑，但我们能让它动起来。” Elon Musk

Text: The Engineering field deals with Buildings, Domes and improves Rocket technology.
Translation: 工程学科技 负责的领域包括 建筑物, 穹顶 以及改进 火箭 科技。

Text: Rocket Cargo Space increased by kg. The fuel section is by far the largest and, when full, the heaviest part of any rocket. This makes developing more compressed fuels especially important when striving to bring more to Mars with fewer rockets.
Translation: 火箭 负载空间增加 kg。 到目前为止，燃料分段已经达到最大，而且充满燃料时这将成为火箭最重的部分。这就使得发展更高压缩的燃料显得尤为重要，毕竟我们需要用更少的火箭运送更多的东西到火星。

Text: Allows the clearing of salvaged and destroyed buildings. We have reached the point where we must do away with old buildings on Mars to make way for new ones.
Translation: 允许对被回收和摧毁建筑物进行彻底清除。 事至于此，我们必须行动去移除火星上的旧建筑来为新建筑让路

Text: New Building: Polymer Factory ( - Produces Polymers from Water and Fuel. New Building: Fuel Refinery () - Produces Fuel from Water. Resolving the obvious problems with water pressure in Low-G environments will allow for more complex hydro-synthetic procedures to be done on-site on Mars.
Translation: 新建筑： 聚合物工厂 ( - 利用淡水和燃料合成聚合物。 新建筑： 燃料精炼厂 () - 利用淡水合成燃料。 能够在低重力环境下解决明显的水压问题，将允许我们在火星上就地进行更为复杂的氢氧合成程序。

Text: Rockets and Shuttles require less Fuel. The scarcity of Martian-made rocket fuel options has made for our first true contribution towards rocket engine efficiency.
Translation: 火箭 和 穿梭机 需要更少的燃料。 火星制造的火箭燃料的供给缺乏，成为了火箭发动机效率向前迈进的第一推动要素。

Text: New Building: Apartments () - A Residential Building that houses many Colonists. "I suggest that going to Mars means permanence on the planet - a mission by which we are building up a confidence level to become a two-planet species." Buzz Aldrin
Translation: 新建筑： 公寓 () - 一个可以提供更多居住空间的住所。 “我认为去火星就意味着永远居住在这个星球 - 我们正在建立起一种成为双星球物种的信心。” Buzz Aldrin

Text: Passenger Rockets carry more Colonists. Better design patterns and lighter, tougher materials have all contributed to a more advanced and compact rocket passenger module.
Translation: 载客火箭 能携带 更多的殖民者。 更好的设计模式和更轻便坚固的材料，都促成了更先进紧凑的火箭乘员模块。

Text: Water, Oxygen and Power storage capacity expanded by %. Life support reserves are essential for the survival of the Colony. Fortunately, a new method of compressing fluids in low-gravity environments can help us increase our reserve capacity greatly.
Translation: 水，氧气和电能 存储 容量扩大 %。 生命支持储备对于殖民生存至关重要。幸运的是，在低重力环境下的一种新流体压缩方法可以大大提高我们的存储能力。

Text: New Dome: Medium () - A medium-sized Dome. Gaining experience in actually building constructions on Mars rather than just hypothesizing has vastly advanced our off-Earth architectural capabilities.
Translation: 新建筑： 中型穹顶 () - 一种中等尺寸的穹顶。 并非纸上谈兵，而是实实在在的火星建造经验，已经大大提升了我们在地球外的建筑能力。

Text: In-Dome buildings require maintenance less often. Shifting focus away from "fixing it" to "avoiding it" is the natural step forward for any Martian habitat.
Translation: 穹顶内部建筑 需要的维护频率降低。 将关注点从“修理它”转向“避开它”是在任何火星栖息地中很自然的一步。

Text: New Buildings: Smart Homes () & Smart Complex () - Provides a very comfortable living space for Colonists. Residents will recover Sanity when resting. Perfecting the Martian household - for a better life beyond Earth.
Translation: 新建筑： 智能家居 () & 智能复合体 () - 为殖民者提供一个非常舒适的居住空间。在殖民者休息时，住所会恢复其精神值。 让火星的家庭更完美 - 为了地球之外的更好的生活。

Text: New Building: Electronics Factory () - Produces Electronics from Rare Metals. "In the end, I hope there's a little note somewhere that says I designed a good computer." Steve Wozniak
Translation: 新建筑： 电子工厂 () - 将稀有金属加工成电子元件。 “在最后，我希望能有一条小记录，上面写着我设计了一台好电脑。” Steve Wozniak

Text: New Spire Building: Arcology () - provides comfortable living space for many colonists. Martian settlements are becoming less just mere shelters and more of fully fledged cities –cities with unique vibes and even architecture.
Translation: 新的中央塔：生态建筑 () - 为殖民者提供许多舒适的居住空间。 火星人居住的地方，仅仅是避难所的越来越少了，更多的是已经高度发展的，有着独特氛围甚至是建筑的城市。

Text: Building construction costs in Metals & Concrete reduced by % (excluding Domes). A mix of off-world pride, a unique and ambitious style, and inspired creativity has resulted in more efficient structural design.
Translation: 建造建筑物需要的 金属 & 混凝土 减少 % (穹顶除外)。 外世界的骄傲、独特又具雄心的风格、以及被激发的创造力，促成了更高效的结构设计。

Text: Out-Dome buildings require maintenance less often. There is a difference between knowing that conditions on Mars will take a heavy toll on man-made buildings and actually experiencing and fixing the damage done. The latter paints a better picture for improvement.
Translation: 穹顶外部建筑 需要维护的频率降低。 只是知道火星上的条件会对人造建筑造成巨大损失，与实际经历并修复被损坏的东西是有区别的。后者描绘了一副更好的图景。

Text: Passenger Rockets carry more Colonists. Cutting edge methods in space optimization and Comfort-centric designs make for a more practical Passenger Module.
Translation: 载客火箭 能携带 更多殖民者。。 切除了在宇宙中的边缘的优化方式和以舒适为核心的设计，成就了更加实用的乘员模块。

Text: New Dome: Mega () - The most advanced and spacious Dome design. We have reached a proficiency in engineering that surpasses the most ambitious architectural achievements on Earth.
Translation: 新穹顶：巨型穹顶 () - 具有最先进最宽阔设计的穹顶。 我们已经熟练掌握了超越地球上最荣耀的建筑成就的工程技术。

Text: Rare Metals Extractor production increased by %. Introducing state of the art plasma torches to our Rare Metals Extractors show a great promise for boosts in production.
Translation: 稀有金属采集器 产出增加 %。 我们在稀有金属采集器中引入具备最先进科技水平的等离子喷枪，为生产力的提高带来了巨大希望。

Text: Drones can extract concrete from Waste Rock stored in Dumping Sites. The utilization of lots of waste rock by reprocessing it into becoming concrete-grade regolith as part of our "Nothing Is Wasted" efficiency policy.
Translation: 机器人可以从储存在弃置场中的 废石 里提取出混凝土。 将大量废石重新加工形成混凝土级的土被，是我们的“不存在真正的垃圾”的高效政策的一部分。

Text: Wonder: Space Elevator () - Exports Rare Metals to Earth and offers resupply materials and prefabs at preferential prices. "The space elevator will be built about 50 years after everyone stops laughing." Arthur C. Clarke
Translation: 奇观： 轨道电梯 () - 向地球出口稀有金属，并以优惠的价格提供补给材料和预置建筑。 “轨道电梯将在人们停止嘲笑以后的50年内建成。” Arthur C. Clarke

Text: The Robotics field deals with Drones, Rovers and Shuttles, as well as building automation.
Translation: 机器人学科技 负责的领域包括 机器人，漫游者和穿梭机, 也涉及到 自动化技术.

Text: The RC Transport harvests resources faster and its maximum storage is increased by . The remote location of some resource deposits calls for Transport Rover optimizations.
Translation: RC运输车 采集资源更加快速并且最大储量增加 。 一些位于远处的地表资源促使了运输者的优化。

Text: Drones and Rovers move % faster. An engine design optimized for low-gravity environments.
Translation: 机器人 和 漫游者 移动加快 %。 为低重力环境而专门优化的发动机设计。

Text: Drone Hubs are constructed with additional Drones and the maximum number of Drones is increased by . Drones being the backbone for most of the heavy and dangerous labor on Mars, it is essential our Hubs have greater operating capacity in order to employ more Drones at any given time.
Translation: 机器人中心 将增加额外的 机器人，同时可控最大机器人数量增加 。 机器人是火星上大部分重型和危险型工作的支柱力量，因此我们的机器人中心需要有更大的运营能力，以便能够在任何时候使用更多的机器人。

Text: Generate per Sol for each RC Explorer vehicle. Multiple vehicles result in collaboration losses. AI specifically tailored for our Explorers will think for itself, gathering only the data they have deemed could be of interest. The above will greatly contribute to our research initiatives.
Translation: 每一辆 RC探索者 每日可产生 。有多辆RC探索者合作时产能会有所下降。 专门为RC探索者量身定做的人工智能会让它们只会考虑去收集它们感兴趣的数据，这将大大有助于我们的研究工作。

Text: New Building: Drone Hub () - Controls Drones and allocates them to different jobs. We can now rely upon ourselves to build the complex Hubs that control our de facto heavy labor force.
Translation: 新建筑： 机器人中心 () - 可以控制机器人并且给它们分配不同的任务。 我们现在可以靠自己建造这个控制着我们的重型的劳动力的设施中心了。

Text: Drone battery capacity increased by %. Advances in power accumulator technology allow Drones to function longer before needing to recharge.
Translation: 机器人 的储电容量增加 %。 先进的蓄电技术让机器人在重新充能之前能够工作更长的时间。

Text: The RC Rover no longer needs recharging, starts with additional Drones and command limit increased by . Developing a specialized AI with greater autonomy and advanced multitasking capabilities will allow our rovers to control more drones simultaneously.
Translation: RC漫游者 不再需要重新充能，初始附加 机器人并且命令限额增加 。 开发一个具有更高自主权的具有先进的多任务并发处理能力的专业人工智能，将允许我们的漫游者同时控制更多的机器人。

Text: New Building: Drone Assembler () - Constructs Drone Prefabs from Electronics which can then be used in Drone Hubs to construct new drones. We may now print and assemble entire Drones on Mars with Martian-mined materials.
Translation: 新建筑：机器人装配厂()——用电子器件生产预制机器人，由机器人中心使用以建造新的机器人。 我们现在能在火星上用火星矿产打印并组装整个机器人了。

Text: New Building: Machine Parts Factory () - Produces Machine Parts from Metals. Mastering the peculiarities of Martian ores has allowed us to make 3D Metal Printers, which will serve as the foundation for all future Martian industry.
Translation: 新建筑：机械部件工厂()——用金属生产机械部件。 了解了火星矿石的特性之后我们造出了3D金属打印机，这将是未来火星工业的基础。

Text: New Building: Shuttle Hub () - Houses and refuels Shuttles that facilitate long-range transportation of resources between Depots and resettling of Colonists between Domes. Adapting an air-breathing jet engine to work in the 95% carbon dioxide atmosphere of Mars is a challenge.
Translation: 新建筑：穿梭机枢纽()——容纳穿梭机并为之加油，可用于仓库间的资源远程运输以及穹顶间的殖民者搬迁。 在火星上95%成分为CO2的大气中，用空气推进的喷气引擎恐怕不太好用。

Text: Extractor Upgrade (Fueled Extractor) - Production increased by % as long as the building is supplied with Fuel. "We should not just consume hydrocarbon fuel but use it to develop nuclear energy, hydro power and renewable energy sources." Vladimir Putin
Translation: 采集器升级(Fueled Extractor)——有燃料供应的采集器产量提高%。 “我们不能只消耗化石燃料，而是应该利用它来发展核能、水电和可再生能源。” 弗拉基米尔·普京

Text: Factory Upgrade (Factory AI) - performance increased by %. After extensive trials and the allocation of many resources to the program, a work-safe AI has been developed to optimize various Factory operations.
Translation: 工厂升级(Factory AI)——效率提高%。 在进行了广泛的实验并投入了大量资源之后，我们研发了一款安全工作AI来优化工业生产。

Text: Shuttle speed increased by %. Designing shuttles for flight in a low density/low pressure atmosphere is more efficient when designing them in a low density/low pressure atmosphere.
Translation: 穿梭机速度提高%。 我们在密度和气压正常的大气中设计了一款在低密度和气压大气中飞行的穿梭机。

Text: Can construct RC Rover (), RC Transport () and RC Explorer (). Machine-part printing devices have reached a fidelity high enough to print the intricate parts necessary to assemble state of the art Rovers.
Translation: 可以建造RC漫游者()、RC运输车()和RC探索者()。 高保真的机械部件打印装置已经可以打印漫游者中的复杂组件了。

Text: The maximum number of Shuttles that the Shuttle Hub can house is increased by . Reaching heights unheard of in parking space sciences.
Translation: 穿梭机枢纽可容量的最大穿梭机数量增加。 在停放空间物理学上获得了前所未有的高度。

Text: Shuttle cargo capacity increased by . Advanced shuttle drives deliver more thrust and allow for greater cargo capacity.
Translation: 穿梭机载重量增加。 升级后的穿梭机能装更多的货，也能飙得更猛。

Text: New Spire Building: Network Node () - increases the research output of all Research Labs and Science Institutes in the Dome. Rapid transfer of information and an easier access to it could speed up research several times-fold.
Translation: 新的中心塔：网络节点()——穹顶中所有实验室和科研机构科研产出提高。 信息的迅速传输和简便地获取信息可以使研究成倍加快。

Text: Wonder: Mohole Mine () - Extracts Metals, Rare Metals and Waste Rock without the need of a deposit, while heating the surrounding area. Moholes are shafts that dig exceptionally deep in the Martian crust, releasing heat as part of a potential terraforming effort and, as a bonus, mining ore.
Translation: 奇观：莫霍面钻探机()——无需矿床即可提取金属、稀有金属和废石，会加热周围地区。 莫霍机能向火星地壳内的极深层挖掘，释放有可能导致地形变化的热量，顺便采点矿。

Text: Wonder: The Excavator () - Produces Concrete directly from the Martian soil without requiring a deposit. Martian concrete, made from equal parts regolith and sulfur, has some vast improvements over its Earth counterpart. Red concrete is stronger, more durable and can be recycled and reused simply by reheating it.
Translation: 奇迹：挖掘者()——无需矿床即可生产混凝土。 火星混凝土由一半浮土和一半硫磺配置，相比地球上的同行，红色的混凝土更强、更耐用，而且只需加热就可以回收再利用，简直不知道高到哪里去了。

Text: The Physics field deals with Power production, exploration and disaster safety.
Translation: 物理科技研究能量生产、探索和躲避灾难。

Text: Extractor Upgrade (Amplify) - Increases production by % but also increases Power consumption by . "From the first day to this, sheer greed was the driving spirit of civilization." Friedrich Engels
Translation: 采集器升级(增幅)——增加%产出但也增加能量消耗。 "卑劣的贪欲是文明时代从它存在的第一日起直至今日的动力。" 弗里德里希·恩格斯

Text: Sensor Towers no longer require Power or maintenance. Reliable sensor data is instrumental for the exploration of Mars.
Translation: 感应塔不再需要能量和维护。 可靠的传感器数据对探索火星非常有帮助。

Text: New Building: Subsurface Heater () - Increases the local temperature in cold areas and protects nearby buildings from Cold Waves. Consumes Water. Mars has an average surface temperature of −55 degrees Celsius, with inclinations to fall well beneath −130.
Translation: 新建筑：地下加热器()——提高附近冰冷区域的温度，并且保护附近建筑免受寒潮影响。需要消耗水。 火星地表的平均温度为-55摄氏度，并且有可能降至-130度。

Text: Wind Turbine Upgrade (Polymer Blades): Power production increased by %. Hands-on observations and problem solving in the low gravity environment of Mars have helped our engineers come up with solutions for increased Wind Turbine efficiency.
Translation: 风力涡轮机升级(聚合物叶片)——能量生产提高%。 在火星低重力环境中进行实地考察并解决问题启发了工程师们提升风力涡轮机效率的灵感。

Text: Probes are cheaper and can deep scan. "The Universe is under no obligation to make sense to you." Neil deGrasse Tyson
Translation: 探测卫星造价更低并能进行深层扫描。 "宇宙可没有让你弄懂它的义务。" 尼尔·德格拉塞·泰森

Text: New Building: Stirling Generator () - Generates Power. While closed the Generator is protected from dust, but produces less Power. The Stirling Radioisotope Generator is a generator based on a Stirling engine powered by a large radioisotope heater unit.
Translation: 新建筑：斯特林发电机()——产生能量。可通过封闭来防尘，但会产生较少的能量。 斯特林放射性同位素发生器就是由大型放射性同位素加热器单元驱动的斯特林发电机。

Text: New Building: Atomic Accumulator () - Stores electrical Power. Has huge capacity but charges slowly. "History will remember the twentieth century for two technological developments: atomic energy and space flight." Neil Armstrong
Translation: 新建筑：原子能聚集器()——储存电力能量，容量极大，但充电速度慢。 "历史将因两项科技进步而铭记20世纪：原子能与空间飞行。" 尼尔·阿姆斯特朗

Text: Solar Panels are gradually cleaned from dust when closed, resulting in less frequent maintenance. Solar Panels are inherently vulnerable to dust, more so than any other equipment used on Mars. Thus automatic dust repulsion systems are put in place to spread out maintenance periods.
Translation: 太阳能板关闭时会清除灰尘，降低维修频率。 太阳能电池板天生就比其他设备易受灰尘影响。因此我们在此基础上安装了自动除尘系统，来降低其维修频率

Text: Factory Upgrade (Amplify) - Increases production by % but also increases Power consumption by . Scaling power production to meet the needs of manufacturing is a challenge on Mars.
Translation: 工厂升级 (增幅) - 提高产能 % 但也会提高 电能消耗。 提高电能生产成为火星生产的瓶颈

Text: Sectors can now be scanned again for deep deposits. Exploiting these deposits requires additional technologies. We've barely scratched the surface of what we can learn about the Martian environment.
Translation: 传感器现在可以再度扫描出 深层矿藏. 开采这些矿藏需要额外的其他技术。 我们对火星的地质了解仅仅是冰山一角

Text: Can exploit deep Water deposits. Water reserves the size of Lake Superior are predicted to be present deep beneath the surface of Mars.
Translation: 可以开采 深度地下水. 据预测，苏美尔湖的水储量远在在火星地表之下

Text: Can exploit deep Metal and Rare Metal deposits. Digging deep can be dangerous but it is necessary for sustained metal production.
Translation: 可以深度开采 金属 和稀有金属 矿藏. 深度挖掘可能是危险的，但为了金属持续性产出，我们不得不去做

Text: New Building: Fusion Reactor () - Generates Power. Out-Dome building which requires Workers to operate. "I would like nuclear fusion to become a practical power source. It would provide an inexhaustible supply of energy, without pollution or global warming." Stephen Hawking
Translation: 新建筑: 聚变反应堆 () - 产生电能. 穹顶外部建筑，需要工人操作。 "我希望核聚变成为一种实用的能源。它会提供源源不断的能源并且不会造成污染和全球变暖" 史蒂文.霍金

Text: New Building: MDS Laser () - Destroys falling meteors in its range. The low density of the Martian atmosphere makes meteors especially dangerous; this is why installing a reliable defense system against meteors is critical for our Colony’s long term survival.
Translation: 新建筑: MDS激光发生器 () - 击毁在其范围内下落的流星 火星大气稀疏使得流星更加危险——我们因此安装了一个可靠的防御系统来对抗流星，保证我们殖民地正常运作

Text: New Building: Triboelectric Scrubber () - Emits pulses which reduce the Dust accumulated on buildings in its range. While the triboelectric effect is not very predictable or precise, it can be entrusted with removing dust from our structures.
Translation: 新建筑: 静电洗涤器 () - 发射脉冲，减少范围内的建筑物积灰速度。 静电虽然难以捉摸，但是却可以用来清除灰尘

Text: Research Labs, Science Institutes and the Network Node Upgrade (Amplify) - Increases production by % but also increases Power consumption. The speed of the calculations and research efficiency grows with the amount of power invested.
Translation: 研究实验室和科研协会以及网络节点升级(增幅) - 提高产能%但是同时也会提高电能消耗. 计算速度和研究效率伴随电能消耗增长迅速

Text: Fusion Reactor Upgrade(Auto-regulator) - reduces the amount of workers. "Our present nuclear fusion reactors are classified by the methods used to support the nuclear fusion reaction, which takes place at a temperature much hotter than the surface of the Sun." Wilson Greatbatch
Translation: 聚变反应堆升级(自控聚变反应堆) - 降低所需工人数量。 "我们现在的核聚变反应堆是按照用来支持核聚变反应的方法进行分类的，这种反应温度比太阳表面温度还要高。" Wilson Greatbatch

Text: Wonder: Artificial Sun () - Produces colossal amounts of Power. It provides light for nearby Solar Panels during the dark hours and heats the surrounding area. Consumes vast amounts of Water on startup. Unlocking the secrets of the stars is now within the grasp of humanity.
Translation: 世界奇观：人造太阳 () - 产生巨大的能量。可以提供光源使周围的太阳能板在夜间运作，也会加热附近区域。在启动时会消耗大量的水资源。 群星闪耀的秘密已经掌握在人类手中

Text: Wonder: Omega Telescope () - Gives access to new Breakthrough Technologies and boosts overall research. A milestone in human history has been achieved – feeling comfortable enough living on an alien world, so much so that some people are already turning their curiosity towards the endless expanse of space once more.
Translation: 世界奇观: 欧米伽望远镜 () - 获得新的突破性科技并且促进整体研究。 人类历史上的里程碑——陌生星球的舒适生活将人类的好奇心转向无尽深空

Text: The Social field deals with Colonists, traits, Martian society and Funding.
Translation: 社交涉及殖民者、殖民者特征，火星社会以及资金。

Text: More applicants will start to appear on Earth. PR research aimed at exposing the benefits and positive aspects of life as a Colonist on Mars.
Translation: 地球上将会出现更多的申请者 公共关系的研究表明了火星殖民生活的优点和乐观一面。

Text: Engineers and Geologists have + performance when working in their specialty. "Geologists have a saying - rocks remember." Neil Armstrong
Translation: 工程师和地质学家 当处于合适岗位时有 + 绩效加成 "地质学家有一句名言——磐石会记住一切！" 尼尔.阿姆斯特朗

Text: Increases research provided by sponsor by . "Two planets, one human race – sharing knowledge and coexisting within the Solar System." Martian Scientist
Translation: 赞助商提供的研究点数增加。 “两颗行星，一种知识，太阳系中，共享共存。” 火星科学家

Text: Scientists and Botanists have + performance when working in their specialty. "Hell yeah I'm a botanist! Fear my botany powers!" Andy Weir - The Martian
Translation: 科学家和植物学家 当在合适岗位时拥有 + 绩效加成 "我特么是植物学家！感受植物的力量吧！" Andy Weir - 火星公民

Text: Receive a one-time grant of funding. With the rising media hype about our mission, it is only a matter of social maneuvering to make the first interplanetary crowdfunding campaign a reality.
Translation: 获得一次性资金. 随着媒体对我们使命的大肆宣传，社会舆情高涨使得第一次星际之间的众筹活动成为了现实！

Text: New Building: Martian University () - Trains Scientists, Geologists, Botanists, Medic, Engineers or Security specialists. College education is always free on Mars.
Translation: 新建筑: 火大！火星大学！ () - 培养科学家、地质学家、植物学家、医学专家、工程师或安全专家。 在火星上大学也是义务教育！

Text: License Martian technology for use back on Earth. Earn funding. This tech is repeatable and can be researched multiple times. "Economic exchange between Mars and Earth would be mostly in the form of intellectual property" Elon Musk
Translation: 特许火星上的科技返用于地球。 获得 资金. 这个科技是 可重复的 ，这意味着可以多次研究. "火星地球之间的经济交流主要是是产权互换" Elon Musk

Text: Lowers the risk of colonists developing flaws after Sanity breakdown. "Beauty is not who you are on the outside, it is the wisdom and time you gave away to save another struggling soul like you." Shannon L. Alder
Translation: 降低 精神值下降带来的殖民者缺陷特征出现的风险. "美丽并不局限于外表，更多的是一个拯救其他心灵的有趣灵魂" Shannon L. Alder

Text: Security Officers and Medics have + performance when working in their specialty. One can never be too prepared for the vast array of emergencies that could arise at any given moment on Mars.
Translation: 安全员和公务员以及医生 在合适岗位时拥有 + 绩效加成 火星环境险恶，我们永远无法做到万无一失

Text: Colonists without the proper specialization suffer a lower work penalty.
Translation: 没有 特殊技能的殖民者受到更低的工作效率惩罚.

Text: New Building: Science Institute () - Generates Research faster than a Research Lab. With Martianborn science we will truly shift from being an experiment to being an equal to Earth, contributing to the scientific advancement of all of humanity.
Translation: 新建筑: 科研所 () - 比研究实验室更快地进行研发. 火星上的科技将使我们与地球平起平坐，并为全人类做出贡献

Text: 新的中央塔：康复中心 () - 帮助殖民者移除缺陷。 "我们头脑打破禁锢，心灵冲破限制，我们无所不能" Ronald Reagan
Translation: 新的中央塔：康复中心 () - 帮助殖民者移除缺陷。 "我们头脑打破禁锢，心灵冲破限制，我们无所不能" Ronald Reagan

Text: Decorations have increased Service Comfort. Reinforcing the notion of a separate and unique Martian culture makes our Colonists more positive and helps them find comfort in the uncertain world which is life on Mars.
Translation: 装饰物 提升服务的舒适度. 火星价值观独特而独立，使得我们的殖民者满怀信心，这，就是火星生活

Text: Martianrborn don't take Sanity damage from disasters. Martianborn grow up in the reality of the everyday dangers of the Red Planet. It bestows upon them an inner strength that is truly a unique Martian quality.
Translation: 火星之子 不会因灾难降低精神值. 火星之子诞生于这个红色星球的危险之中，他们内心坚韧，无所畏惧。而这，就是火星精神

Text: Martianborn don't take Sanity damage when working in out-Dome buildings. We are born on the Red Planet. We do not fear stepping outside the safety of the Dome. We embrace it.
Translation: 火星之子在穹顶之外工作时不会降低精神值。 我们诞生于此，我们不惧踏足这片土地，我们勇敢前进。

Text: Residential Building Upgrade (Home Collective) - Increases the Service Comfort of the building by . A friendly and supportive community is the key to making life easier in the harsh reality of the Red Planet.
Translation: 居住建筑升级 (家庭集群) - 提高点服务舒适度。 友善亲和的居委会让这个红色星球充满了人情味。

Text: License Martian copyrights for use back on Earth. Earn funding. This tech is repeatable and can be researched multiple times. "The conditions of extreme labor shortage combined with a technological culture will tend to drive Martian ingenuity to produce wave after wave of invention." Robert Zubrin
Translation: 授权地球使用火星的专利权，获得 资金. 这项技术是可重复的可以多次研究 "劳动力的极度缺乏与新技术环境的结合可以让火星上出现创新浪潮" 罗伯特卓别林

Text: Sanatorium Upgrade (Behavioral Melding) - replaces removed flaws with random Perks. A more benevolent and productive iteration of 18th century methods.
Translation: 康复中心升级（行为融合）——用随机的优点来代替缺陷。 比十八世纪的方法更加仁慈有效.

Text: Wonder: Project Morpheus () - Stimulates the development of new Perks in adult Colonists throughout the entire Colony. "You take the red pill - you stay in Wonderland and I show you how deep the rabbit-hole goes."
Translation: 奇观: 梦境工程 ()——刺激整个殖民地中的成年殖民者发展出新的优点。 "你吃下红色药丸，你就可以留在幻境而我则会向你展示兔洞的深邃"

Text: Buildings construct themselves slowly without Drones. Nanites will seek out resources from nearby resource depots. With a payload of several molecules and an electronic instrument used for both navigating and knowing its purpose, Construction Nanites form slightly saturated winds which to the casual observer would seem to erect buildings as if by magic.
Translation: 建筑 可以无需机器人而慢慢的自我修建. 纳米机器人可以从周边的矿藏寻找矿物. 几个分子的有效载荷和一种用于导航的电子仪器，建筑的纳米结构会形成轻微的饱和，这对于一般的观察者来说似乎是用魔法来建造建筑物.

Text: Buildings require maintenance less often. "Don't confound static electricity with ecstatic eccentricity. One will leave your hair up, the other will live up in the air!" Ana Claudia Antunes
Translation: 建筑物需要较少的 维护 "不要将静电与疯狂的离心率搞混，他们一个让你的头发竖起来，另外一个则会让你飞在空中" 安娜 克劳迪娅 安图内斯

Text: When a colonist dies there's a % chance he or she is reconstructed as youth with the same traits. Like the legend of the Phoenix, all ends with beginnings. Consciousness being an electrical charge within a specific neuron pattern, replicating it eventually comes down to data fidelity.
Translation: 当一个殖民者死亡时有% 的机会他会重造 成为一个年轻时的自己. 就像凤凰的传说一样，一切都以开端都伴随着结尾。意识是一种特定神经元模式中的电荷，复制它之后最终会成为保真的数据

Text: Bodies of dead Colonists are converted to Food. "Soylent Green is made out of people. They are making food out of people and we know that. We are actually OK with that."
Translation: 死亡殖民者 的身躯将被转换成食物 "绿色食品由人类制成.我们知道他们从人身上制作食物. 我们觉得这没什么大不了的."

Text: Unlocks Rare Trait - Empath. Empaths raise the Morale of all Colonists in the Dome. The effect stacks with other Empaths. "`The human brain has 100 billion neurons, each neuron connected to 10 thousand other neurons. Sitting on your shoulders is the most complicated object in the known universe." Michio Kaku
Translation: 解锁稀有特质——善解人意。善解人意者鼓舞了所有殖民者的士气。这种效果与其他的善解人意者相叠加。 "人类的大脑有1亿个神经元，每个神经元与另外的10万个神经元相连。搂坐在你的肩膀上是宇宙中最复杂的事物" 加来道雄

Text: Colonists need to sleep for only 1 hour and regain extra Sanity when sleeping. "Sleep, those little slices of death — how I loathe them." Edgar Allan Poe
Translation: 殖民者只需要一个小时的 睡眠 并能在睡眠中额外回复精神值 "睡眠，这些死亡般的片段，我非常的厌恶他们." 埃德加·爱伦·坡

Text: Allows the construction of Biorobots in the Drone Assembler. Biorobots eat and can gain traits but can't reproduce and never die from old age. The human body is basically a complex bio machine that could be easily replicated with the exception of one major component – the brain. Now that we have finally unlocked that secret we can manufacture human-like Biorobots the same way we manufacture cars.
Translation: 允许在机器人装配厂中修建 仿生人 . 仿生人有自己的特性，他们需要进食而且不会老去但是他们永远不能繁衍 人体基本上是一个复杂的生物机器，除了一个主要的组成部分——大脑，它很容易被复制。现在我们终于揭开了这个秘密，我们可以制造像人类一样的仿生人就像我们制造汽车一样.

Text:
When a colonist suffers a Sanity breakdown, they fall asleep and wake up after <param1> hours with <param2> Sanity. Colonists can't commit suicide or gain flaws due to sanity breakdown.

<grey>Failsafe systems have been in place and used to prevent catastrophes in various fields for centuries. Until now we had no viable way of remotely detecting when the brain was headed towards a meltdown. A means to remotely render people unconscious, however, was already available.</grey>
Translation:
当一个殖民者的心智崩溃时, 他们会陷入沉睡并且在<param1> 小时后心智完好的醒来 <param2> 殖民者不会自杀并且心智会保持健全.

<grey>应急系统已就位，并用于在几个世纪内防止各种领域的事故。到目前为止，我们还没有可行的方法来远程检测大脑何时走向崩溃。然而，远程让人们失去意识的方法已经是现成的了。.</grey>

Text: Residents in the Arcology get a bonus to work performance based on the number of unique perks and specializations of colonists living in the Arcology. "The tools that a society uses to create and maintain itself are as central to human life as a hive is to bee life. Though the hive is not part of any individual bee, it is part of the colony, both shaped by and shaping the lives of its inhabitants." Clay Shirky
Translation: 在 生态建筑学工作的居民根据居住在生态系统中的殖民者的特殊津贴和专精化的数量来获得工作绩效的奖励. "社会是用来创造和维持自身的工具，对于人类的生活来说，就像蜂房对蜜蜂的生活一样重要。虽然蜂房不是蜜蜂的一部分，但它是殖民地的一部分，它们都是由它塑造的，并塑造着它的居民的生活。" 克莱·舍基

Text: Colonists have a % chance to lose a flaw on their journey to Mars. It is never too late to improve on oneself, and the months spent traversing the void between Mars and Earth gives ample opportunity to do so.
Translation: 殖民者有% 的机会在前往火星后失去一个缺陷 。 自我改进永远都不会太迟，穿越地球和火星之间的空隙的时间为我们提供了充足的机会。

Text: 充电机 帮助机器人在格的距离内马上回复电力 特斯拉曾经预言，无线电力将在地球上任何一个地方获得，在最偏远的地方照明和驱动汽车。最终，他的预言成真了——他只是把这个星球搞错了.
Translation: 充电机 帮助机器人在格的距离内马上回复电力。 特斯拉曾经预言，无线电力将在地球上任何一个地方获得，在最偏远的地方照明和驱动汽车。最终，他的预言成真了——他只是把这个星球搞错了。

Text: Allows Drones Prefabs to be constructed in the Drone Assembler using Metals instead of Electronics. Made entirely out of 2-dimensional nanomaterials, printed electronics combine effective electronic properties with low-cost production.
Translation: 允许机器人预制件 在机器人装配厂中用金属而不是用电子元件制造。 完全由二维纳米材料制成，印刷的电子产品结合了有效的电子性能和低成本生产。

Text: Uncovers extremely rich underground Metal deposits. Increased detail in reading traces of tectonic activities from eons ago has enabled us to accurately predict where to find high-grade metals deep in the crust, only relatively recently pushed up from the Martian mantle.
Translation: 发现含矿量极高的地下金属 矿脉。 对从远古时代开始的地壳构造活动的追踪与详细信息的掌握，使我们能够准确地预测到哪里可以找到地壳深处的高存量金属，只是最近我们才从火星的地幔中向上推。

Text: Uncovers extremely rich underground Water deposits. Primordial underground lakes in the nethermost regions of Mars’s crust have been accurately hypothesized and successfully pinpointed due to advances in our understanding of the Martian geological past.
Translation: 发现含 水 极高的地下水 由于我们对火星地质历史的了解，在火星地壳中最下层的原始地下湖泊已经被准确地假设和成功地确定了。

Text: Uncovers extremely rich underground Rare Metal deposits. Applying new principles to chemical analysis of ancient crystallized magma has made it possible to locate several exceptionally potent Rare Metal veins deep underground.
Translation: 发现含矿量极高的地下稀有金属 矿脉。 应用新原理对古代结晶岩浆进行化学分析，使我们能找到在深埋地下的几个异常强大的稀有金属矿脉中的位置。

Text: Instant and free power cable construction. Power cables do not suffer from power faults. A hydrogel of high conductivity and electrical self-healing properties, without any external stimuli and of great strength and flexibility, has been developed based on Nanostructured Conductive Polymers.
Translation: 可以迅速并任意建造 电缆 。电缆再不会发生故障。 一种高导电性和自愈性的水凝胶，没有任何外界刺激和强大的力量和灵活性，是基于纳米结构的导电聚合物而开发出来的。

Text: Instant and free pipe construction. Pipes don't suffer from leaks. A pressure-induced, self-healing coating with remarkable insulation properties has been developed and field-tested to be used en masse on our pipe system.
Translation: 可以迅速并任意建造 管道 。管道不会再发生泄漏。 采用压力感应、自修复、绝缘性能优异的涂层改造对管道系统。

Text: Uncovers new Anomalies – Alien Artifacts – which provide a boost to all research when scanned. Hard as it is to believe, our observations suggest that intelligent life has visited Mars long ago and that remnants of these visits could still be here. These artifacts could help us improve and expand our understanding of the universe.
Translation: 发现新的异常现象 – 外星遗产 – 可以在扫描到时为所有技术提供加速. 尽管难以置信，但我们的观察结果显示，智能生命很久以前就造访过火星，而这些造访的遗迹可能还在这里。这些人工制品可以帮助我们改善和扩展我们对宇宙的理解。

Text: All colonists gain + performance during night shifts The greater distance from the Sun makes it so that all colonists have to cope with the psychological strain of receiving reduced sunlight. This fact, combined with newly discovered techniques allow us to considerably boost the productivity of those who work outright nightshifts.
Translation: 所有殖民者在夜班获得+绩效 离太阳的距离越远，所有的殖民者就越需要应对接阳光减少带来的心理压力。通过新发现的技术，我们就可以大大提高那些夜班工作的人的效率。
