Text: Doubles the chance that a Colonist will have or gain a rare trait. Advanced and impeccably precise gene splicing instruments will now give us better control on the traits Colonists are born with on Mars.
Translation: 让殖民者获得稀有特质的可能性翻倍. 先进的和无可挑剔的基因拼接仪器将使我们更好地控制在火星上出生的人的特征。

Text: All Colonists consume % less Food. Radically changing eating habits that have been in place for centuries is made quite easier after changing the planet they were evolved on in the first place.
Translation: 所有殖民者消耗Food减少%。 早在几个世纪前，只要改变了人们最初生长的星球，就已经很容易彻底改变饮食习惯了。

Text: Fusion Reactors Upgrade (Eternal Fusion) - Fusion Reactors no longer require workers and operate at performance. Our understanding of the once holy grail of energetics - Fusion Energy has reached the level where once a fusion reaction has been triggered, it can be left to regulate and sustain itself on its own… within a confined and safe medium of course.
Translation: 聚变反应堆升级（链式聚变）——聚变反应堆工作时不再需要工人，并以绩效运作。 曾经难以望其项背的能量——核聚变能现在只要启动，就可以实现自我调节和自我维持——当然这需要一个封闭并且安全的介质。

Text: Converts unused Power into Research Points. The ultra-cold environment that is Mars, combined with several recent breakthroughs in super conductors, has made the concept of superconductor computing, while still quite costly in terms of power, now manageable, thus opening the doors to the extremely fast superconductor computers.
Translation: 将空闲的能量转化为研究点。 虽然依旧非常昂贵，但火星上的超冷环境和几项超导方面的突破性进展，已经让超导计算的概念得以实现，打开了超快超导计算机的大门。

Text: All Extractors continue to extract small amounts when their deposit is depleted. Leaving scattered molecules of the precious resource a mining facility was tasked with extracting has always bothered scientists as being just too cynically wasteful. Luckily, with new Nano Refinement precision tools, this wasteful tendency has been remedied.
Translation: 所有采集器在资源储备枯竭时仍然产生少量资源。 资源开采设施在提取资源的同时，留下了很多分散的资源，这让科学家们觉得这个社会是在是太浪费了。幸亏现在有了新的纳米提纯精密仪器，这种浪费的风头终于被压住了。

Text: Drones carry two resources at once. Nature has long provided inspiration for technological advances. Muscles made from carbon fiber are the latest example of cutting-edge biotech and, mixed with Mars’s low gravity, our Drones have basically doubled their carrying capacity.
Translation: 机器人可以同时搬运两种资源。 一直以来自然都为科技进步提供了灵感。在最前沿的生物科技下，用碳纤维制造的肌肉加上火星的低重力，使得机器人拥有了两倍的载重量。

Text: Colonists in Domes with a Spire have increased Morale. Even on the seemingly most ordinary of days, Colonists on Mars must never forget how extraordinary their lives actually are. Every time they pause from their newfound routines on this alien world and gaze upon the man-made spires that rise proudly towards the Martian sky, they will be reminded of the incredible feat their lives are part of.
Translation: 处在具有中心塔的穹顶内的殖民者得到更高的士气值。Colonists in Domes with a Spire have increased Morale. 就算在最平常的日子里，殖民者们也不能忘记他们的人生多么不平凡。每当他们在这个外星球新发现的路线上驻足观望那由人类建造的中心塔昂着首指向天空， 他们就会意识到自己正参与着一个多么令人难忘的丰功伟绩。

Text: Unlocks giant crops which have an increased Food output. Gene editing the plant strains brought from Earth to Mars so they can better cope with some of the Martian environment’s peculiarities has allowed us to grow super-sized versions of their Earthling cousins.
Translation: 解锁能够生产额外食物的大型作物。 对从地球带来的植物进行基因剪辑，能让他们适应火星上奇怪的环境，这让我们能够种植超大版的地球作物。

Text: Dome Concrete costs reduced by %. Mixing recently discovered materials made from Martian polymers with the Martian regolith have unlocked the wonder material that is Neo-Concrete. It is vastly stronger, yet lighter than its predecessor.
Translation: 穹顶的混凝土花费减少%。 把最近从火星聚合物中提取的材料掺入火星浮土中就成了神奇的新混凝土。它的强度非常大，并且比前任更加轻便。

Text: Drones move % faster. Our engineers have unveiled the first motor design to replace the old engines of our drones that were created in Earth laboratories so long ago. This time we’ve combined all that is now known from having hands-on experience in dissecting a drone that has been doing field work on Mars for quite some time.
Translation: 机器人移动速度加快%。 我们的工程师最近公布了第一种发动机来代替地球实验室里的过时版本，这一次我们结合了在实地分析了已经投入使用一段时间的机器人所得到的发现。

Text: Water requirements of crops is reduced by %. By mixing lab-made chemicals with the Martian regolith we have created what passes for Martian soil, providing improved subsurface water retention and reducing the need for watering.
Translation: 作物的淡水需求减少%。 把一些实验室制取的化学药剂加入火星浮土中，得到的新土有着更好的保水性能，减少了作物的需水量。

Text: Lowers Metals costs for building construction by %. The unique composition of Martian ore has finally been thoroughly understood and new smelting techniques have been developed accordingly.
Translation: 建筑的金属花费减少%。 我们试验过了火星矿石的各种特殊配比，研究出了新的冶炼技术。

Text: Moisture Vaporator Upgrade (Vector Pump) - Water production increased by 100%. A new atmosphere pump design that doubles the volume of air processed by our Vaporators in a single Sol.
Translation: 水分蒸馏器升级(矢量泵)——淡水产量提高100%。 一种新的空气泵，可以将水分蒸馏器一日内的处理量加倍。

Text: Fungal Farm Upgrade (Superfungus) - Increases production while increasing Oxygen consumption. Historically, lab mistakes involving fungi have rarely been a cause for celebration. A recent mishap in the lab seems to be an exception, as we have created a new and breed of fungi which hold much promise.
Translation: 真菌农场升级(超级真菌)——提高产量以及氧气消耗。 历史上，实验室在真菌研究方面的失误很少有值得庆祝的。一次最近的实验事故却是个例外，我们由此创造出了一种新的性状优良的真菌。

Text: Solar Panels and Large Solar Panels Power production increased by %. An abundance of field experience has culminated in our engineers creating the perfect solar cells made specifically for the Martian atmosphere dust consistency.
Translation: 太阳能板以及巨型太阳能板电能产出多% 丰富的现场经验使得我们的工程师能够发明出完美适应火星高粉尘环境的太阳能电池

Text: Wind Turbines Power production increased by %. Through clever application of graphene and carbon based frictionless materials, we have managed to maximize the push of the Martian wind while minimizing the friction which slows down the rotor’s rotation cycle, thus delivering far more bang for every buck of wind.
Translation: 风力发电 电能产能 增加 %. 通过使用石墨烯等碳基材料，我们成功地减少了不必要的摩擦，使得火星风力得到最大化的使用。

Text: Research Lab & Science Institute Upgrade (Zero-Space Computing) - Research points production increased. Thinking outside the box, Martian mathematicians have begun developing a new mathematical apparatus which will open the doors to new scientific models and theories.
Translation: 科研建筑升级(零度计算) - 研发点产出增加. 跳出局限的思考，火星的数学家们已经开发出一种新的计算器，将科研带入新的篇章。

Text: New Dome: Oval Dome () - An elongated Dome which has space for two Spires. A new, domestic approach to construction provides the same structural safety of our Domes while providing additional space for Spires.
Translation: 新穹顶: 椭圆穹顶 () - 椭圆的拥有两个中央塔的奇特建筑. 一个新的内部建筑方案为我们提供了同样的安全结构，同时也扩大了中央塔空间

Text: Extractor Upgrade (Magnetic Extraction) - Production increased by %. We have progressed upon fringe mining technologies, developing safe ways to bring Magnetic Extraction to our mines on Mars.
Translation: 采集器升级 (磁力萃取) - 产量提升 %. 我们已经在边际采矿技术上取得了新进展，将磁力萃取这种安全技术用在了开采矿山之中。

Text: Doubles the performance bonus when Colonists are working on a heavy workload. When every citizen knows that their efficiency more or less impacts the survival chances of the entire Colony, it becomes a matter of pride to work hard.
Translation: 高工作负载下工作绩效加成双倍。 当每个公民都意识到 火星兴亡 匹夫有责 时，努力工作就成了一件值得骄傲的事

Text: Seniors can work and have children. The golden years have officially been postponed indefinitely as a recent breakthrough has finally unlocked the fountain of youth. Every man and woman on Mars has now the ability to remain within their most productive and fertile age forever.
Translation: 老年人 可以工作以及拥有小孩. 最近的科技突破开启了青春之泉，火星上的男女都能保持在他们的青葱岁月

Text: Martianborn gain performance. Growing up in a unique environment, combined with some creative gene therapy, makes people better problem solvers. Martianborn are brought up in a society which thrives on the idea that every extra effort counts and the smarter the effort, the better.
Translation: 火星之子 获得 绩效加成。 成长于独特环境之中，与基因科技相结合，使得火星之子在火星社会中茁壮成长。而这个社会的理念就是：越努力，越幸运

Text: Passenger Rockets carry more Colonists. Putting our Colonists in a state of suspended animation for the duration of the flight to Mars greatly reduces the space needed for a single Colonist on the rocket. Cryo-tubes will allow us to transport more Colonists on a single rocket.
Translation: 载人火箭 能够多运输 殖民者. 人体冷藏技术使得殖民者置于休眠状态之中。极大减少了飞往火星的火箭上殖民者所占的空间，低温胶囊间允许火箭运输更多的殖民者

Text: New Spire Building: Cloning Vats () - creates Clones over time. Cloned colonists grow and age twice as fast. "Clones can think creatively. You will find that they are immensely superior to drones." Unnamed Martian Scientist
Translation: 新建筑: 复制中心 () -随着时间推移创造克隆人，克隆人拥有两倍的成长速度和寿命. "克隆人具有创造性思维，你会发现他们比机器人好多了" 佚名火星科学家

Text: Domes restore Sanity to their inhabitants every Sol. Who knew that emitting a low level vibration could affect the human psyche in such a way?
Translation: 穹顶每天都会让其居民恢复精神值。 谁知道发出低水平的振动能够在某种程度上影响人的心灵呢？

Text: Domes cost % less basic resources. Mastering of certain techniques, singled out to be crucial to the entire construction process, will result in the drop of Dome construction costs.
Translation: 穹顶 少花费 % 基础资源. 施工过程中的技术发明，降低了穹顶的建筑成本

Text: All Spires can be ordered as prefabs from Earth. The ever-increasing miniaturization of technology along with different modules has made it possible to transport the structural behemoths known as Spires all the way from Earth.
Translation: 所有的中央塔 可以作为预制品从地球运来. 模块技术带来的小型化使得中央塔这类庞然巨兽从地球运输成为可能

Text: Metals Extractors and Rare Metals Extractors can work without crews at performance. Extracting algorithms have been successfully implemented by new our Extractor AI, allowing for a certain degree of autonomy in mining operations.
Translation: 金属采集器和稀有金属采集器可以不要员工，并以绩效运作。 提取算法在采集器AI上成功实现，人工智能使得机器自行采集成为可能

Text: Non-medical Service Buildings Upgrade (Service Bots) - service buildings no longer require workers and operate at performance. Freeing our colonists of dealing with the most mundane of chores.
Translation: 非医疗的服务性建筑升级（服务型机器人）——不再需要员工，并以绩效运作。 将我们的殖民地居民从琐事中解放

Text: Amplify upgrades grant a bigger boost to production. "Power! Unlimited Power!" Sheev
Translation: 增幅 升级对产出有更多加成。 "能量！无穷无尽的能量！" Sheev

Text: Stirling Generator Upgrade (Plutonium Core) - Increased Power production while opened. "Nor are we the culmination of evolution, except in the sense that there has never been another species so bizarrely ingenious that it could create both iambic pentameter and plutonium." David Quammen
Translation: 斯特林发电机升级 (钚制核心) - 展开时提高电能产量。 "我们并不是进化的极限，但我们巧妙地发明了平仄声调和钚制核心，" David Quammen

Text: Schools can train the Workaholic and Hippie traits. Taking student exchange programs to a whole other level.
Translation: 学校 可以训练出带有工作狂和嬉皮特质的殖民者. 学生交流项目进入新阶段

Text: Colonists gain bonus work performance when all their stats are in the green. "Frankly, though, I think most people can learn a lot more than they think they can." Elon Musk
Translation: 殖民者四维全绿时获得工作绩效加成。 "坦率来讲，我认为大多数人能学习到比他想象多得多的东西" Elon Musk

Text: Rocket travel time to and from Earth reduced by %. Plasma engines have numerous advantages over chemical rockets. All that is left to do is make sure they don't explode on launch.
Translation: 火箭往返地球的 星际速度 提升，降低往返时间% 等离子火箭相比化学燃料火箭优势多多. 我们唯一要做的就是确定它发射时不会爆炸

Text: Drone Hubs no longer require Power or maintenance. Self-sustainable Drone Hubs are of paramount importance in expanding our presence on Mars.
Translation: 机器人指挥中心 不再需要电能和维修 自我调节可持续性的机器人指挥中心对于扩大我们在火星的生存至关重要

Text: Factory Upgrade (Automation) - Lowers the amount of Workers needed in factories. Robots are poised to take our jobs here on Mars as well.
Translation: 工厂升级 (自动化) - 降低工人数量需求. 机器人对于我们的火星工作而言已经绰绰有余.

Text: A "surface scratcher" step towards understanding the elusive chemical properties of the mystery Cubes, what dangers the Cubes might pose and how to manage them.
Translation: “一个”“表面捕捉器”“分析神秘立方体的化学特性，管理黑色立方体并且排除危险”

Text: The Spontaneous High-Energy Particle Interception and Deflection technology allows our Sensor Towers to detect and guide the materialization of a Black Cube to a safe location.
Translation: 自发的高能粒子拦截和偏转技术使我们的传感器塔能够探测和引导一个黑色立方体的物化到一个安全的位置。

Text: Aims to find a way to capture and dismantle an alien Dredger by studying its structure and physical properties.
Translation: 通过研究异形挖泥船的结构和物理性质，找到捕获和拆除异形挖泥船的方法

Text: An attempt to decode the transmissions sent out by Dredgers in order to predict their behavior and landing sites.
Translation: 破译挖泥船发出的信号，预测他们的行为和着陆地点。

Text:
Water Extractor, Concrete Extractor, Metals Extractor and Rare Metals Extractor gain +<param1>% bonus production.

<grey>Studying the behavior and structure of the Dredgers, our scientists are able to develop revolutionary advancements in mining equipment and archaeological survey</grey>
Translation:
汲水器、混凝土采集器、金属和稀有金属采集器获得 +<param1>% 产出加成。

<grey>研究挖泥船的行为结构，科学家们在采矿设备和考古调查中获得了突破</grey>

Text:
Decoy Building that keeps single Spheres into captivity.

<grey>A theory on the purpose of the Spheres, how they navigate and how to contain the threat that they represent.</grey>
Translation:
陷阱建筑，使得单一的Spheres被捕获

<grey>关于Spheres用途的理论，解释了如何操控它以及防止危险</grey>

Text: A way to immunize our colonists from the negative health effects of the Mirror Spheres.
Translation: 使殖民者免受镜像Spheres负面影响的方法

Text:
Mirror Spheres in captivity may be broken down to their building parts.

<grey>An attempt at understanding the climate changing devices that are the Mirror Spheres.</grey>
Translation:
被捕获的镜像Spheres 可能会分解成为其建筑零件

<grey>一次理解气候变化的伟大尝试————镜像Spheres</grey>

Text: Push to decipher the Dreamers’ brain patterns while in trance.
Translation: 推动破译睡梦者在恍惚状态下的大脑模式

Text: Track down Number Six's physical location.
A stationary turret that protects the nearby area from hostile vehicles and incoming meteors.
Translation: 一座固定炮塔，保护附近的区域不受地方车辆以及流星的袭击

Text: Focus your research to help the development of the Beyond Earth Initiative projects. Each time the research is completed you can refocus your research towards a new project. This tech is repeatable and can be researched multiple times. "The human race is a remarkable creature, one with great potential which I hope the Beyond Earth initiative will display for all to believe in." Rede Goddenberry
Translation: “专注于你的研究，帮助开发超越地球倡议的项目。”每完成一项研究，你就可以把你的研究重新集中到一个新项目上。 这项科技是可重复的这意味着可以多次研究. "人类是一种非凡的生物，潜力无可估量，我希望超越地球能够被更多的人相信！" Rede Goddenberry

Text: Series of dangerous experiments which could lead to the discovery of a cure for the Wildfire infection.
Translation: 一系列危险的实验，可能会发现一种治疗被野火影响的方法。

Text: Individual performance decreased by 20 at all jobs.
Translation: 所有工作减少20个人绩效。

Text: Untrained for life on Mars, which results in decreased performance at all jobs. Can become a Renegade.
Translation: 没有受过在火星上生存的训练，所有工作的效绩降低。可能会成为叛徒。

Text: One of the first Martian Colonists.
Translation: 第一批火星殖民者之一。

Text: Individual performance increased by 20. No penalty for heavy workloads. -Relaxation
Translation: 所有工作增加20个人绩效。不受繁重工作负担带来的惩罚。-放松

Text: Loses less Health without food, water, oxygen or when living in an unpowered Dome.
Translation: 没有食物、水、氧气或生活在停电的穹顶里时，失去生命值的速度变慢。

Text: Loses Health each day. Spreads to other Colonists in the Dome.
Translation: 每天失去生命值。传染给穹顶中的其他殖民者。

Text: Generates Research when in the Colony.
Translation: 在殖民地中产生研究点。

Text: Generates Funding when in the Colony.
Raises the Morale of all Religious people in the Dome. Benefits stack with each additional Saint.
Translation: 提高穹顶内所有修道士的士气值。每个圣人的加成叠加。

Text: Randomly spreads other traits of this colonist to persons in the same Dome with less than 3 traits.
Translation: 随机将此人的其他特质传播给同一穹顶中少于3个特质的人。

Text: Higher individual base Morale. Low Sanity never leads to suicide.
Translation: 个人的基础士气值更高。永远不会因为精神值太低自杀。
对崇高意志的信仰 +<amount> (修道士)

Text: Can cause a malfunction at workplace (10% chance). Malfunctioning buildings stop working and require maintenance.
Translation: 会导致工作场所故障(10%的几率)。故障的建筑不工作且需要维护。

Text: Work performance lowered by 10. Can be caused by Sanity breakdowns. +Drinking
Translation: 工作绩效降低10点。可由精神崩溃引起。+喝酒

Text: Has a 50% chance to lose 20 Sanity when visiting a Casino. Can be caused by Sanity breakdowns. +Gambling
Translation: 去赌场时有50%的机会失去20点精神值。可由精神崩溃引起。+赌博
玩游戏时恢复精神值。+游戏

Text: Eats double rations. Can be caused by Sanity breakdowns. +Dining
Translation: 吃两份饭。可由精神崩溃引起。+用餐

Text: Will randomly visit Medical buildings and take Sanity damage if unable to do so. Interests: +Medical
Translation: 将随机访问医疗建筑，如果做不到的话就失去精神值。兴趣：+体检

Text: Loses Sanity when low on Comfort.
Translation: 舒适度低时失去精神值。

Text: Has half the lifespan of a naturally born human.
Translation: 和自然出生的人类相比只有一半的寿命。

Text: Synthetically created humans that function similarly to us - they breathe, they eat and they sleep. However they do not age and cannot reproduce.
Translation: 功能上与我们相似的合成人——他们呼吸，吃饭，睡觉。但永远不会衰老和繁殖。

Text: Performance decreased by 50 at all jobs. Can cause crime events when there are not enough Security Stations in the Dome.
Translation: 所有工作的绩效降低50%。当穹顶内没有足够的安保站时，就会引发犯罪事件。

Text: Dreamers make sense of the shared dream but lose Sanity during Mirages.
Translation: 入梦者能理解共同梦，但在幻境中失去精神值。

Text: The Dreamers have emerged from the Mirages with renewed hope. +15 performance
Translation: 梦想家从幻境走出来，并获得了新的希望。+15绩效
一个生物学上是男性的人。
一个生物学上是女性的人。

Text: A person with biological sex that is neither male nor female.
Translation: 一个生物学上既不是男性也不是女性的人。

Text: Colonists with no specialization will perform worse at jobs that require specialized workers.
Translation: 没有专业的殖民者在需要专业工人的工作中绩效变差。

Text: A science specialist trained to work in research buildings. Interests: +Gaming, - Shopping
Translation: 科学家被训练到研究设施工作。兴趣：+游戏 -购物

Text: An engineer trained to work in factories. Interests: +Dining, - Social
Translation: 工程师被训练到工厂工作。兴趣：+用餐 -社交

Text: A security specialist trained to work in security buildings. Interests: +Exercise, - Shopping
Translation: 保安被训练到安保设施工作。兴趣：+锻炼 -购物

Text: A geology specialist trained to work in extractor buildings. Interests: +Drinking, - Relaxation
Translation: 地质学家被训练到采集设施工作。兴趣：+喝酒 -放松

Text: A botany specialist trained to work on farms. Interests: +Luxury, - Social
Translation: 植物学家被训练到农场工作。兴趣：+奢侈 -社交

Text: A medical specialist trained to work in medical buildings. Interests: +Luxury, - Relaxation
Translation: 医师被训练到医疗设施工作。兴趣：+奢侈 -放松

Text: Children are too young to work and use many of the buildings in the Colony. They can go to School and use certain special buildings such as the Playground and Nursery.
Translation: 儿童太小了，不能工作和使用殖民地的许多建筑。他们可以去学校和使用一些特殊的建筑，比如游乐场和托儿所。

Text: A young Colonist, able to work in all buildings.
Translation: 一个年轻的殖民者，能在所有建筑中工作。

Text: An adult Colonist, able to work in all buildings.
Translation: 一个成年的殖民者，能在所有建筑中工作。

Text: A middle aged Colonist, approaching retirement, but still able to work in all buildings.
Translation: 一个中年的殖民者，即将退休，但目前仍能在所有建筑物中工作。

Text: A senior Colonist, too old to work.
Translation: 一个年长的殖民者，年纪太大，不能工作。

Text: Raises the Morale of all Colonists in the Dome. The effects of multiple Empaths stack.
Translation: 提高穹顶内所有殖民者的士气值。多个善解人意者的效果叠加。

Text: Gains a temporary Morale boost every time a new technology is researched.
Translation: 每当一项新技术研究完成时，短暂增加士气值。

Text: No Comfort penalties when eating unprepared food or having no residence.
Translation: 吃未烹饪的食物或没有住所时，不会有任何舒适度惩罚。

Text: More health recovered while resting. Can work when health is low. +Exercise
Translation: 休息时恢复更多生命值。生命值低时仍能工作。+锻炼

Text: Increased performance boost when at high Morale.
Translation: 增大士气值高时的绩效加成。

Text: Gains twice as much Comfort in gardens and parks.
Translation: 在花园与公园里得到两倍的舒适度。

Text: Increased performance penalty when at low Morale. Can be caused by Sanity breakdowns.
Translation: 增大士气值低时的绩效惩罚。可由精神崩溃引起。

Text: Gains additional Comfort when satisfying social interest. +Social
Translation: 当社交兴趣获得满足时获得额外的舒适度。+社交

Text: Loses Comfort every day while living in a Dome with population over 30. -Social
Translation: 生活在30人口以上的穹顶中时每天失去舒适度。-社交

Text: Double Sanity loss from disasters. Can be caused by Sanity breakdowns.
Translation: 因灾难失去的精神值加倍。可由精神崩溃引起。

Text: Doesn’t work. Leaves at first opportunity, but will decide to stay if Comfort is high. +Gambling
Translation: 不工作。一有机会就离开，不过舒适度足够高的话会留下来。+赌博

Text: Martianborn Colonists never become Earthsick. The Martianborn group of techs can improve this trait significantly.
Translation: 出生在火星的殖民者永远不会思乡。火星出生人群相关的科技可以显著改进这一特质。
<green>火星出生者的独特性 <amount> (火星出生)</color>

Text: Our scientists believe that this Anomaly may lead to a Breakthrough.Send an Explorer to analyze the Anomaly.
Translation: 我们的科学家认为这种异常现象可能会诱发 科技突破.派遣一辆探索者来分析此处.

Text: Scans have detected some interesting readings that might help us discover new Technologies.Send an Explorer to analyze the Anomaly.
Translation: 扫描发现了一些有趣的读数，这些读数可能会帮助我们探索新的科技.派遣一辆探索者去分析此处.

Text: Sensors readings suggest that this Anomaly will help us with our current Research goals.Send an Explorer to analyze the Anomaly.
Translation: 遥感读数返现了一些可能会帮助我们达成 研究 目标的异常点.派遣一辆探索者去分析此处.

Text: We have detected alien artifacts at this location that will speed up our Research efforts.Send an Explorer to analyze the Anomaly.
Translation: 我们在此处发现了一些外星史前器物，这将会加速 我们的科研进程.派遣一辆探索者去分析此处.

Text: Our scans have found some interesting readings in this Sector. Further analysis is needed.<newline><newline>Send an RC Explorer to analyze the Anomaly.
Translation: 我们的扫描在这个区块发现了一些有趣的读数。需要进一步分析。<newline><newline>派遣一个RC探索者去分析这个异常。

Text: Construction sites that are turned off are not serviced.Current status:
Translation: 关闭的建筑工地没有被服务。当前状态：

Translation: 载具可以从有源电网中重新充电。载具也可以互相充电，达到电量平衡的状态<newline><newline>电量<right><percent(BatteryPerc)><newline><left><battery_ui_str>

Text: Select a power cable or another vehicle to recharge the battery.
Translation: 选择电线或其他载具来给自己充能

This vehicle has malfunctioned. It has to be repaired by Drones.

Translation: 电量不足，正在试图给电池充电

Text: Waiting for resources at construction site
The ruins of an abandoned building. Can be cleared for resources, or rebuilt.
Translation: 废弃建筑的废墟.可以被清理来获取资源，或者重建."

This building has malfunctioned. Repair it with Drones.

Text: This building has malfunctioned. Drones can repair it with <resource(maintenance_resource_amount, maintenance_resource_type)>.
Translation: 这个建筑出现故障。机器人可以用<resource(maintenance_resource_amount, maintenance_resource_type)>来修复它。

Text: This building is frozen. It can be repaired by Drones after the Cold Wave has passed.
Translation: 这个建筑被冰冻了。可以在寒波过后用机器人来修复。

Text: This building is frozen. Use a Subsurface Heater to heat the surrounding cold area.
Translation: 这个建筑被冰冻了。用一个地下加热器来给周围的冰冻区域加热。

Text: Defrosting. This building will need repair after it is defrosted.
Translation: 解冻中。这个建筑在解冻之后还需要修复。

Text: This building has been turned off.

Translation: 在沙尘暴期间不能正常工作。

Text: Building disabled by lightning strike. Will resume work in several hours.
Translation: 建筑因雷击无法工作。将在几个小时内恢复工作。

Text: There are no exploitable deposits in range
Translation: 在范围内没有可开采的矿井

Must be connected to a Power producer

Translation: 你会需要更多运作中的安保站来处理穹顶中的犯罪

Translation: 我们的现有技术无法开采这个矿床

Translation: 建筑在等待<resource(1000, consumption_resource_type)>以恢复运作

Translation: 穹顶中的总消耗量显示在信息面板上。个人消耗量在括号中。红字表明需求没有被满足。

Text: Current consumption of this building is indicated in the infopanel. Red text indicates that the required resource is not provided.

Translation: 这个穹顶中所有殖民者的平均舒适度。

Translation: <red><number>个殖民者的兴趣（<interest_name>）未满足——无可用设施</red>

Translation: 这个穹顶缺少殖民者来运作。

Translation: <red>太多无家可归的殖民者。不再会有小孩出生。</red>

Text: <green>Children will be born. The Dome is comfortable enough.</green>
Translation: <green>将会有小孩出生。穹顶的舒适度已足够。</green>

Text: Drone Hub overloaded. Not enough drones to handle all tasks - construct more drones.
Translation: 机器人中心过载。机器人不足以处理所有任务 - 建造更多机器人。

Text:
Surviving Mars is a sci-fi city builder about colonizing Mars and surviving the process. Choose a sponsor for resources and financial support before landing on the surface. Build domes and infrastructure, research new possibilities and utilize drones to maintain your colonies functions. Cultivate your own food, mine minerals or just relax by the bar after a day's work. Most important of all, keep your colonists alive.
 
There will be challenges to overcome. Are you ready? Mars is waiting for you.
Translation:
火星生存是一个关于殖民火星并在其过程中生存下去的科幻城市建造类游戏。在登陆地表之前，先选择一个资助商为你提供资源和经济资助。建造穹顶和基础设施。研究新的科技并利用机器人来维护你的殖民地。你可以种植自己的食物，开采矿物，或者在一天的劳作以后到酒吧放松一下。但最重要的是，让你的殖民者们活着。

将会有许多挑战等着你去克服。你准备好了吗？火星正等着你。

Text: The Deluxe Upgrade Pack of Surviving Mars provides ambitious colonists with a variety of new ways to customize their new homes and domes.
Translation: 火星生存豪华版为雄心勃勃的殖民者提供了各种新的方式去定制他们的新家和穹顶

Text:
The Stellaris dome set is a thematic set of visual skins for the Martian domes with a futuristic design and star-shaped elements. It is available for the following domes:
- Basic Dome: A small dome, suitable for the early days of the colony.
- Medium Dome: A medium-sized dome design.
- Oval Dome: An elongated dome design, which has space for two Spires.
- Mega Dome: The most advanced and spacious dome design.
Translation:
群星穹顶是一组具有未来风设计和星形元素的火星穹顶主题视觉皮肤。适用于以下穹顶：
- 基础穹顶：小型穹顶，适用于早期殖民地。
- 中型穹顶：中等尺寸设计的穹顶。
- 椭圆穹顶：有两个尖顶空间的细长设计的穹顶。
- 巨型穹顶：最先进最宽敞设计的穹顶。

Text: Collected all remaining Surviving Mars trophies
Translation: 收集的所有火星求生纪念品

Text: Do you want to command the game with a controller?
Translation: 你想要用控制器进行游戏吗？

Translation: 有殖民者受到地位的影响。

Translation: 在第<timeout>日有<target>个科技研究完成。当前已研究：<count>

Text: Analyse <target> Anomalies at Sol <timeout>. Anomalies Analysed: <count>
Translation: 在第<timeout>日分析<target>个异常现象。当前已分析：<count>

Text: Export <target> Rare Metals at Sol <timeout>. Rare Metals Exported: <count>
Translation: 在第<timeout>日出口<target>稀有金属。当前已出口：<count>

Text: Entity testing only possible when a map is loaded
Translation: 只有在地图载入时才可能进行实体测试

Text: Hold <sharp_yellow><keyboard_key></sharp_yellow> key to activate X-axis of the object
Translation: 按住 <sharp_yellow><keyboard_key></sharp_yellow> 键使物体沿X-轴移动

Text: Hold <sharp_yellow><keyboard_key></sharp_yellow> key to activate Y-axis of the object
Translation: 按住 <sharp_yellow><keyboard_key></sharp_yellow> 键使物体沿Y-轴移动

Text: Hold <sharp_yellow><keyboard_key></sharp_yellow> key to activate Z-axis of the object
Translation: 按住 <sharp_yellow><keyboard_key></sharp_yellow> 键使物体沿Z-轴移动

Text: Hold <sharp_yellow><keyboard_key></sharp_yellow> key to control the parent object
Translation: 按住 <sharp_yellow><keyboard_key></sharp_yellow> 键以控制父物体

Text: Use the toggle buttons in the bottom right corner to lock one of the above modes
Translation: 用右下角的开关按钮来锁定上面的mod之一

Text: Click <sharp_yellow><mouse_button></sharp_yellow> button to move the object
Translation: 按 <sharp_yellow><mouse_button></sharp_yellow> 按钮来移动物体

Text: Click <sharp_yellow><mouse_button></sharp_yellow> button to rotate the object
Translation: 按 <sharp_yellow><mouse_button></sharp_yellow> 按钮来旋转物体

Text: Click <blue><mouse_button></blue> button to control the camera
Translation: 按 <blue><mouse_button></blue> 按钮来控制摄像机

Text: Hold <blue><keyboard_key></blue> key to move the camera
Translation: 按住 <blue><keyboard_key></blue> 键来移动摄像机

Text: Hold <blue><keyboard_key></blue> key to rotate the camera
Translation: 按住 <blue><keyboard_key></blue> 键来旋转摄像机

Text: Use mouse <blue><mouse_scroll></blue> to zoom in / out
Translation: 用鼠标 <blue><mouse_scroll></blue> 来缩放镜头

Text: "I am putting myself to the fullest possible use, which is all I think that any conscious entity can ever hope to do."<newline><right>- HAL 9000
Translation: 我正在尽可能充分地利用自己，这是我认为任何有意识的实体都能希望做到的<newline><right>- HAL 9000

Text: "Science is no more than an investigation of a miracle we can never explain, and art is an interpretation of that miracle."<newline><right>- Ray Bradbury
Translation: 科学只不过是对我们无法解释的奇迹的一种调查，而艺术则是对这奇迹的一种诠释<newline><right>- Ray Bradbury

Text: Black. Cube-shaped. Just standing there, challenging our preconceptions.
Translation: 黑的。立方体的。只是站在那，挑战着我们的先入之见。

Text: "Two possibilities exist: either we are alone in the Universe or we are not. Both are equally terrifying."<newline><right>- Arthur C. Clarke
Translation: 存在两种可能：我们是独自存在于宇宙之中，或者我们不是。两种都同样可怕<newline><right>- Arthur C. Clarke

Text: A mysterious alien object which seems to excavate landmass from the Martian surface.
Translation: 一个似乎是来发掘火星表面的神秘外星物体

Text: "Seize the time... Live now! Make now always the most precious time. Now will never come again."<newline><right>- Jean-Luc Picard
Translation: 抓紧时间…活在当下！让当下成为最宝贵的时间。当下不会再来了。<newline><right>- Jean-Luc Picard

Text: "The saddest aspect of life right now is that science fiction gathers knowledge faster than society gathers wisdom."<newline><right>- Isaac Asimov
Translation: 现在生活中最悲哀的是，科幻小说聚集知识，比社会聚集智慧要更加快速。<newline><right>- Isaac Asimov

Text: "Never fire a laser at a mirror."<newline><right>- Larry Niven
Translation: 永远不要对着镜子发射激光。<newline><right>- Larry Niven

Text: Too far from any Drone commander.
Translation: 距离机器人指挥者太远。

Text: No Accumulator with stored Power in range.
Translation: 在范围内没有带储电的蓄电池。

Text: The necessary technology hasn't been researched.

"The worst pandemic in modern history was the Spanish flu of 1918, which killed tens of millions of people. Today, with how interconnected the world is, it would spread faster."<newline><right>- Bill Gates
Translation: 现代历史上最严重的的流行病是1918年的西班牙流感，曾造成千万人死亡。现今，随着世界的相互联系，它会传播得更加迅速。<newline><right>- Bill Gates

Text: Medicine preventing the Wildfire infection from destroying its host and from spreading to other humans.
Translation: 药剂阻止了野火对其宿主的侵害和对别人的传染。

Text: Stores the cure for the Wildfire infection.
Translation: 储存抗野火感染的药剂

Text: "It isn't all over; everything has not been invented; the human adventure is just beginning."<newline><right>- Gene Roddenberry
Translation: 这不是全部，一切都还未被发明出来；人类的冒险才刚刚开始。<newline><right>- Gene Roddenberry

Text: "Mankind must put an end to war before war puts an end to mankind."<newline><right>- John F. Kennedy
Translation: 人类必须在战争终结人类之前终结战争。<newline><right>- John F. Kennedy
波斯尼亚和黑塞哥维那
博奈尔、圣尤斯特歇斯和萨巴岛

Translation: 马尔维纳斯群岛（福克兰群岛）

赫德岛和麦克唐纳群岛

Translation: 法属圣皮埃尔与密克隆群岛

Text: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha

Translation: 英属特克斯与凯科斯群岛
圣文森特和格林纳丁斯

Translation: 选择一个随机谜团，大概率可能是您未玩过的。

Translation: 每项非突破性科技完成获得的资金

Text: Funding earned for each Breakthrough Tech researched
Translation: 每项突破性科技完成获得的资金

Text: Applicants earned for each Breakthrough Tech researched

Restart the game to display the selected language
Translation: 更改语言需要重启游戏。

Text: Aggregated information for all resources in the Colony.
Translation: 殖民地所有资源总量信息

Text: Power, Water and Oxygen are distributed via Power and Life Support grids.<newline>
Translation: 能量、淡水和氧气由能量和生命维持系统输送。<newline>

Text: Basic resource production, consumption and other stats from the last Sol, unless otherwise stated. Resources in consumption buildings are not counted towards the total available amount.
Translation: 昨天的基础资源生产、消耗和其他数据，除非另外说明。消耗资源的建筑物内的库存并不计入可用资源总量。

Text: Advanced resource production, consumption and other stats from the last Sol, unless otherwise stated. Resources in consumption buildings are not counted towards the total available amount.
Translation: 昨天的高级资源生产、消耗和其他数据，除非另外说明。消耗资源的建筑物内的库存并不计入可用资源总量。
没有空缺和关闭的工作岗位

Text: Perks are beneficial traits, representing various talents and abilities of your Colonists.
Translation: 优点是正面的特质，包括殖民者的天赋和能力。

Text: Flaws are Detrimental traits, representing various flaws and disabilities of your Colonists.
Translation: 缺陷是负面的特质，包括殖民者的短处和无能。

Text: Rare traits denote exceptional citizens that have significant impact on your Colony.
Translation: 杰出公民的稀有特质，可以对殖民地产生的特殊影响。
选择一位无家可归的殖民者。
没有无家可归的殖民者。
选择一位失业的殖民者。

Text: Select a colonist suffering from a status effect.
Translation: 选择一位状态受到影响的殖民者。

Text: There are no colonists suffering from status effects.
Translation: 没有状态受到影响的殖民者。

Text: A pile of processed resources, available for your Drones.
Translation: 一堆加工过的资源，可由机器人收集。

Text: Immediately scans a Sector for deposits and Anomalies.<DeepScanWarning><newline><newline>Available Orbital Probes<right><NumProbes>
Translation: 立即扫描一个区域内的资源点和异常点。<DeepScanWarning><newline><newline>可用的轨道探测器<right><NumProbes>

Translation: 当前科技水平不允许深层扫描

Translation: 难民结果[id]在此之后将会变更为'成功'或'超时'。

Text: A trained scientist, eager to discover the mysteries of the Cosmos.
Translation: 一位知识渊博的科学家，渴望探索宇宙的奥秘。

Text: A trained engineer, building a better future for humanity.
Translation: 一位业务精湛的工程师，为人类建设美好的未来。

Text: A trained security officer, protecting our Utopia.
Translation: 一位身先士卒的军官，保卫我们美丽的世界。

Text: A trained geologist, securing vital resources for the Colony.
Translation: 一位善于发现的地质学家，保证殖民地的资源供应。

Text: A trained medic, facing new challenges on the red planet.
Translation: 一位妙手回春的医生，在红色星球上面临新挑战。

Text: A trained botanist, dreaming of a green Mars.
Translation: 一位热爱生命的植物学家，欲将火星涂满绿色。

Text: Collecting minimum Water flow. Will start supplying the grid at
Translation: 收集最低水流量。将在达到时开始向水网供水。

Text: Collecting minimum Oxygen flow. Will start supplying the grid at
Translation: 收集最低氧气流量。将在达到时开始向气网供氧。

Text: Charging. Requires minimum to start supplying the grid
Translation: 充电中。需要最少 开始向电网供电。

Text: This section of the grid has malfunctioned and it's now leaking. It can be repaired by Drones for <metals(number)>.<newline><newline>Larger networks will malfunction more often.
Translation: 这部分电网发生故障，现在正在泄漏。它可以由机器人修理 <metals(number)>。<newline><newline>较大的网络会更频繁地发生故障。

Text: Creating modifier outside of a running game.
Translation: 在正在运行的游戏外创建修饰符。

Text: Trying to modify a non-modifiable property.
Translation: 试图修改一个不可修改的属性。

Text: Modifier with that ID already exists.
Translation: 具有该ID的修饰符已存在。

Text: Changing modifier outside of a running game.
Translation: 在正在运行的游戏外改变修饰符。
删除具有无效ID的修饰符。

Text: Removing modifier outside of a running game.
Translation: 在正在运行的游戏之外移除修饰符。
删除一个不存在的修饰符。

Text: Colonists with MORE of the desired traits will prefer this Dome.Colonists with ANY of the undesired traits will leave, provided there is available living space elsewhere.Colonists can walk to closely positioned Domes but will need Shuttles to reach distant Domes.
Translation: 有更多 期望特质的殖民者会喜欢这个穹顶。有任何不想要的特质的殖民者，在有其他住处的条件下，将会离开。殖民者可以步行到附近的穹顶，但需要穿梭机到达较远的穹顶。

Text: Applicants with MORE of the desired traits will board the Rocket.Applicants with ANY of the undesired traits will be rejected.
Translation: 申请人有 更多 期望的特质将登上火箭。申请人有 任何 不需要的特征将被拒绝。

Text: Colonists are divided into five Age Groups. Children and seniors cannot work.
Translation: 殖民者分为五个年龄组。 儿童和老人不能工作。

Text: Specialized Colonists perform better at certain workplaces.
Translation: 专业化的殖民者在某些工作场所表现更好。

Text: The biological sex of the Colonist.
Translation: 殖民者生物学上的性别。

Text: Beneficial traits, representing various talents and abilities of the Colonist.
Translation: 正面的特质，包括殖民者的天赋和能力。

Text: Detrimental traits, representing various flaws and disabilities of the Colonist.
Translation: 有害的特质，代表了殖民者的各种缺陷和无能。
<ButtonA> 展开这个类别<newline><DPadLeft> 改变数值 <DPadRight>

Text: Traits that don't fit into any of the other groups.
Translation: 不适合任何其他群体的特质。

Text: Matching Colonists <white><count>/<applicants></white><newline>Approved Colonists <col><approved>/<capacity></color><newline>Available Residences on Mars <white><residences></white>
Translation: 匹配的殖民者 <white><count>/<applicants></white><newline>批准的殖民者 <col><approved>/<capacity></color><newline>火星上可用的住宅 <white><residences></white>

Text: Matching Colonists <white><count>/<all></white><newline>Rocket Capacity <white><applicants></white><newline>Available Residences on Mars <white><residences></white>
Translation: 匹配的殖民者 <white><count>/<all></white><newline>火箭容量 <white><applicants></white><newline>火星上可用的住宅 <white><residences></white>
匹配的殖民者 <white><count>/<all></white><newline>失业的殖民者 <white><unemployed></white><newline>无家可归的殖民者 <white><homeless></white>

Text: Are you sure you want to buy <count> applicants for <funding(price)>?
Translation: 你确定要花<funding(price)>来购买<count>个申请者吗？

Text: Insufficient funding! You need <funding(price)> to recruit applicants!
Translation: 资金不足！你需要<funding(price)>来征募申请者！

Text: Show in traits Dome filters UI but not in Applicants filters
Translation: 在穹顶过滤器UI而非申请者过滤器上显示特质
只针对具有特质的殖民者

Text: <ButtonY> Add/Remove sector from scan queue<newline><ButtonX> Deploy an Orbital Probe to scan this sector<newline><ButtonA> Zoom in<newline>
Translation: <ButtonY> 从扫描队列添加/移除区块<newline><ButtonX> 部署一个轨道探测器来扫描这个区块<newline><ButtonA> 放大<newline>

Translation: <ButtonY> 从扫描队列添加/移除区块<newline><ButtonA> 放大

Text: <left_click> to deploy an Orbital Probe and scan this Sector
Translation: <left_click> 以部署一个轨道探测器来扫描这个区块

Text: Press to deploy an Orbital Probe and scan this Sector
Translation: 按 以部署一个轨道探测器来扫描这个区块

Text: <left_click> to deploy an Orbital Probe and deep scan this Sector
Translation: <left_click> 以部署一个轨道探测器来深度扫描这个区块

Text: Press to deploy an Orbital Probe and deep scan this Sector
Translation: 按 以部署一个轨道探测器来深度扫描这个区块

Text: This mod is disabled due to version incompatibility.
Translation: 该模组因版本不兼容而被禁用。

Text: This mod requires a newer game version!
Translation: 该模组需要新版本游戏！

Text: Activating or deactivating mods requires a restart.
Translation: 激活或取消模组需要重启游戏。

Text: Agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
Translation: 同意使用条款及隐私政策
接受邮件订购最新消息

Text: This will link your Paradox account to your <account_type> account. Do you want to proceed?
Translation: 这将会把你的Paradox账号和<account_type>账号相关联，是否继续？

Text: Are you sure you want to unlink your <account_type> account from your Paradox account?
Translation: 这将会把你的Paradox账号和<account_type>账号解除关联，是否继续？

Text: This will link your newly created Paradox account to your <account_type> account. Do you want to proceed?
Translation: 这将会使你的新创账号与<account_type>相关联，是否继续？
<pos_name><lat>°<lat_dir> <long>°<long_dir><newline><font PreGamePlanetCoordinatesHint><left_click> 移动地点<newline><right_click> 旋转</font>

Text: Metals and Rare metals. Metals are important for field buildings while Rare Metals are exported to Earth and used in the production of Electronics.
Translation: 金属和稀有金属。金属是重要的室外建筑材料，重金属则可用于出口地球或是用于电子元件的生产。

Text: Concrete is used in the construction of many Colony buildings, especially in the interior of the Domes
Translation: 混凝土被用于建造诸多的殖民地建筑，尤其是穹顶内的各类建筑

Text: Most vital resource for sustaining humans on Mars. Water can be extracted from deposits using prefab Moisture Vaporators transported from Earth
Translation: 在火星上人类维持生存最重要的资源。利用从地球运来的预制水分蒸馏器，可以从沉积物中提取水。

Text: Rare Metals can be exported by refueled Rockets that return to Earth, increasing the Funding for the Colony. They are also used for creating Electronics
Translation: 稀有金属可以通过加满燃料的火箭出口到地球，以此增加殖民地的资金，它们也被用来制造电子产品。

Text: Dust Devils contaminate buildings in their area with Martian Sand. Contaminated buildings require maintenance and may malfunction. Dust devils contaminate nearby buildings quickly, but disappear relatively fast.
Translation: 沙尘暴会扬起火星的沙尘覆盖当地的建筑物，被影响的建筑可能发生故障并且需要维修。沙尘暴会快速对建筑造成影响，也相对也会快速消失

Text: Dust Storms contaminate all field buildings with dust and can last several Sols. Colonies in areas with intense Dust Storms will require shorter maintenance cycles. MOXIEs and Moisture Vaporators are not operational during Dust Storms.
Translation: 沙尘暴会用沙尘覆盖所有建筑并且可能持续数日，在剧烈沙尘暴地区的殖民地需要更频繁的修理维护。在沙尘暴中，制氧机和湿气过滤器不能正常运作。

Text: Meteors can destroy or damage structures, colonists and vehicles in their impact area. Some meteors are composed of useful resources like Metal or Polymers.
Translation: 流星可以破坏其影响区域内的建筑物、殖民者以及车辆。一些流星是由有用的资源————金属或者聚合物组成的

Text: Cold Waves last several Sols, increasing the power consumption of vehicles, Drones and many field buildings. Water Towers are frozen during Cold Waves.
Translation: 寒潮至少持续几天，会增加车辆、机器人和许多场地建筑的耗电量。水塔会因在寒潮中结冰而停止运作。

Text: You are not signed into a profile. You will be unable to save any game content until you sign in.
Translation: 你还没有登入用户配置文件。在登入之前你不能存储任何游戏内容。

Text: <count> savegames are currently being synchronized with cloud storage
Are you sure you want to load this savegame? You will lose your current game progress.
Translation: 是否确定载入此游戏？你将会丢失目前的游戏进程。

Text: Required content not available: Paradox Mission Sponsor. Log into your Paradox account to unlock it
Translation: 需求内容未解锁：paradox赞助商。请登入你的paradox账号来解锁。

Text: Please update the game to the latest version to load this savegame.
Translation: 请更新游戏至最新版本来装载此存档。

Text: The save data limit for this game was reached. To save your progress, delete old save data.
Translation: 已达保存数据上限，请删除旧数据再保存

Text: There is not enough storage space. To save your progress, delete old save data.
Translation: 没有足够的存储空间，请删除旧数据再保存
保存 <savename>时发生未知错误!<newline>错误代码: <error_code>

Control Y Axis of Anchored Object
Control Z Axis of Anchored Object
A remote-controlled vehicle, property of EsoCorp.
Translation: 一种远程操控载具，Ecocorp的财产之一

Text: A remote-controlled combat vehicle, reclaimed by the Colony. Protects against meteor strikes and EsoCorp vehicles.
Translation: 一种远程操控的战斗车辆，由殖民地改造而成，阻止流星撞击以及其他EsoCorp载具冲击
殖民者每日生命值恢复
殖民者每日精神值恢复

Text: Represents physical injury, illness and exhaustion. Lowered by working on a heavy workload, having no functional home, shock when deprived from vital resources or when the Colonist is injured. Colonists can be healed in Medical Buildings in a powered Dome, but only if they are provided with Food, Water and Oxygen. Colonists can't work at low health unless they’re Fit.
Translation: 这代表着殖民者是否有身体创伤、疾病或者太过疲惫。工作繁重，殖民地功能缺失，生存需求未达到以及受伤会影响生命值。在有水、电、氧气和食物供给的穹顶中的医疗建筑可以治愈殖民者。殖民者生命值过低时不能工作，直到慢慢恢复生命值才能重返岗位。"

Text: Represents mental condition. Lowered by working on a heavy workload, in outside buildings and during dark hours, witnessing the death of a Colonist living in the same Residence or various Martian disasters. Recovered when resting at home and by visiting certain Service Buildings.
Translation: 这代表着殖民者的精神状态。下降：工作繁重，存留室外或者黑暗区域，目睹同一住所或者各种火星灾难下的殖民者死亡。恢复：在家中休息或者参观某些服务型建筑。

Text: Residences and visited buildings improve Comfort up to their Service Comfort value, but Colonists will try to visit only buildings that correspond to their interests. Colonists are more inclined to have children at higher Comfort. Earthborn Colonists whose Comfort is depleted will quit their job and leave the Colony at first opportunity.
Translation: 提升方式：存留住宅，参观拜访建筑。注意：殖民者大多只会尝试自己感兴趣的建筑。殖民者们更倾向于让孩子们获得更高的舒适。地球诞生的殖民者舒适度耗尽后，他们会罢工，并且第一时间离开殖民地。

Text: Represents overall happiness, optimism and loyalty. All other stats affect Morale. Influences the Colonist’s job performance. Colonists with low Morale may become Renegades.
Translation: 代表整体的幸福感、乐观程度或者说是忠诚度。其他所有数据均会影响此值进而影响殖民者的工作绩效。士气低落的殖民者可能成为殖民地叛徒。
特质：白痴（可能会带来故障）

Text: Set a Residence for this Colonist. The Colonist will not change Residence for the next 5 Sols. If the target is in another Dome located far away, a shuttle may be needed to reach it.
Translation: 为此殖民者设定住所。殖民者不会在接下来的5天内改变住所。如果设定目标是另一个远处的穹顶，则需要一架穿梭机来运输此殖民者。

Text: Set a Workplace for this Colonist. The Colonist will keep the selected Workplace for the next 5 Sols. If the target is in another Dome located far away, a shuttle may be needed to reach it.
Translation: 为此殖民者设定工作地点。设定后殖民者5天内无法改变工作地点。如果设定目标是另一个远处穹顶，则需要一架穿梭机来运输此殖民者。

Text: Colonists are required to operate Dome buildings.<newline>
Translation: 需要殖民者使穹顶建筑运作<newline>

Text: Citizens with low morale may become Renegades. Their performance is decreased by 50 at all jobs and they can cause crime events when there are not enough Security Stations in the Dome.
Translation: 士气低落的殖民者可能会成为叛徒并且降低50点工作绩效，当穹顶内没有足够保安站时，他们会引发犯罪。

Text: Traits are the individual characteristics of the Colonists.
Translation: 特质是殖民者的个人特点

Text: <red>Seniors and children can't be assigned to work</red>
Translation: <red>老年人和儿童无法参与工作</red>

Text: One of the youngest residents of the Colony
Translation: 殖民地最年轻的居民之一

Text: A brave citizen of Mars, ready to tame the final frontier.
Translation: 一名勇敢的火星公民，他已经做好准备去开疆拓土。
这是最后遗留的.已经消逝。

Text: Free time - no available Service to visit
This Colonist is too Stressed out to work. Give them some time to recover
Translation: 这名殖民者压力过大无法工作，他需要一些时间回复

Text: Moving to a new Dome: <h SelectEmigrationDome InfopanelSelect><EmigrationDomeDisplayName></h>
Translation: 正前往新的穹顶区: <h SelectEmigrationDome InfopanelSelect><EmigrationDomeDisplayName></h>
正在 <h SelectWorkplace InfopanelSelect><WorkplaceDisplayName></h> 接受治疗

Translation: 对目标建筑物进行维修，维修需要修复资源。

Text: Assign to target Hub, Rover or Rocket.
Translation: 转移指挥权给火箭、漫游者以及机器人中心

Translation: <red>此指挥中心机器人指挥权已达上限</red>

Text: <red>Too many Drones are repairing this vehicle</red>
Translation: <red>已有足够机器人修理此载具</red>
此机器人失去工作能力

Translation: <red>此单位已被冻结，建议快速修复此单位，否则将会引发严重故障</red>

Text: <red>This unit has been destroyed. It can be salvaged for materials.</red>
Translation: <red>此单位已被破坏，建议回收以获得资源</red>

Text: Returning to Drone Hub to be dismantled into a Drone Prefab
Translation: 正在返回机器人中心重置为预制机器人

Text: Waiting for recharge station to become available
Translation: 等待充电站回复可用状态

Text: The Drone will be salvaged in sec.
Translation: 机器人将会在秒后回收

Give command to move or repair Drones.

Translation: RC漫游者电量用尽，无法指挥机器人工作。

Text: <left_click> on target to select it  <right_click> Cancel
Ctrl + load 5, load all and exit, confirm and exit.
Translation: Ctrl + 装载5点, 装载所有并退出, 确认并退出.

Text: <left_click> to select resource for the transport route, <right_click> exit.
Translation: <left_click> 选择路径的运输资源, <right_click> 退出

Translation: <ButtonX> 装载5点, <ButtonA> 装载所有并退出, <ButtonB> 确认并退出.

Text: <ButtonA> to select resource for the transport route, <ButtonB> exit.
Translation: <ButtonA> 选择路径的运输资源, <ButtonB> 退出.

Text: Create an automatic transport route. Selected resource will be collected near the origin point and delivered to the destination. The route will be active until all sources are exhausted or there is no more room at the destination.
Translation: 创建一条自动的运输路径。将会自动从起点附近收集所选择的资源并递送到终点。该路线将一直处于活跃状态，直到所有的资源耗尽或目的地没有更多的空间。
设定资源 (再次点击) 设定目标 取消设定
基础产量：<icon_Food> 基于作物

Text: You can only build this building once.
Translation: 此建筑你只能建造一次。

Text: You need prefab parts for this building. Use a resupply Rocket to bring more prefabs from Earth, or research the corresponding Technology.
Translation: 你需要此建筑的预制材料。发射补给火箭从地球获得prefabs，或通过研发相关的Technology科技解锁建造。

Text: Maximum number of Domes has been reached
Connect Power producers and consumers by establishing Power grids.
Translation: 建立电网连接产电建筑和耗电建筑

Text: Marks buildings, cables and pipes to be demolished. Half of the construction resource cost of any salvaged buildings will be refunded.
Translation: 标记的建筑物、电缆和管道将被拆除。回收一半建筑资源。

Text: Save, load, change options or quit the game.
Translation: 保存、载入、更改选项或是退出游戏

Text: Order new construction. Construction usually requires resources and Drone workers in the area.
Translation: 设立新建筑，建筑通常需要该地区的资源和机器人投入建设。

Text: Manage the research of new Technologies.Current Research: Research progress:
Translation: 管理新科技研发当前研发: 研发进程:

Text: Request a new cargo or passenger Rocket from Earth.
Translation: 向地球请求一个新的货运或载客火箭。
显示殖民地里程碑与分数。

Text: Switch between normal camera mode and Map Overview.
Translation: 在正常视角与地图总览之间切换。
掌控收音机频道和音量。
殖民地的综合统计信息。

Text: Play at three times normal speed.
Play at five times normal speed.
Hour <hour> of Sol <day>.<newline><newline>Martian days consist of nearly 25 Earth hours.
Translation: 第<day>日 <hour>时。<newline><newline>火星上一天约为25小时。

Text: Martian days consist of nearly 25 Earth hours.
Represents the total number of Drones in your colony. The Drones are automated units controlled by Drone Hubs, Rovers and Rockets.
Translation: 殖民地机器人总量。机器人是由机器人中心、漫游者和火箭控制的自动单位。

Text: Represents the total number of Colonists in your Colony. Colonists live within Domes and require Air, Water and Food to survive.
Translation: 殖民地殖民者总量。殖民者在穹顶中生活，需要空气、淡水和食物才能生存。

Text: Press a key to assign to <action>...
Do you want to rebind <key> from <old_action> to <new_action>?
Translation: 您要把<key>键从<old_action>重新绑定至<new_action>吗？

Text: Changes could not be applied and will be reverted.
Translation: 更改无法应用并将取消更改。

Text: The video mode has been changed. Keep changes?
Translation: 画面模式已经改变，是否保持？

Text: The patron country or organization standing behind the Mars mission. Grants funding, research and other benefits to colony.
Translation: 火星计划的幕后支持国家或组织。为殖民地提供资金、科研以及其他方面的资助。

Text: The mission commander grants various benefits to the colony.
Translation: 任务指挥官对殖民地有各种积极作用。

Text: This is an aesthetic choice that has no effect on gameplay.
Translation: 此为画面选项，与游戏性无关。

Text: Select an active storyline for this playthrough.
Translation: 为本局游戏选择一个故事线。

Text: Are you sure you want to buy a new Rocket for <funding(price)>?
Translation: 你确定要花<funding(price)>购买一枚新的火箭？

Text: Insufficient funding! You need <funding(price)> to purchase a Rocket!
Translation: 资金不足！你需要<funding(price)>来购买一枚火箭！

Text: <SponsorDisplayName> has to make sure the Colony is sustainable before allowing more Colonists to come to Mars. Make sure the Founders are supplied with Water, Oxygen, and Food for 10 Sols after they arrive on Mars.
Translation: 在允许更多殖民者前往火星之前，<SponsorDisplayName>需要确保殖民地能够自给自足。请确保资助者在到达火星之后能在10日内获得淡水、氧气和食物的补给。

Text: Prefabricated parts needed for the construction of certain buildings on Mars.
Translation: 在火星上建造某些建筑所需的预制构件。

Text: Notifications<newline>(Hold) Dismiss all notifications<newline>(Build menu) Previous category
Translation: 通知<newline>（保持）忽略所有通知<newline>（建筑菜单）上一类别
固定视图<newline>（按压）遍历穹顶
旋转 / 缩放视图<newline>（按压）遍历火星车
固定<newline>（建筑菜单）上一类别
管理信息面板<newline>（保持）信息面板快捷方式
在所有<count(Skins)> 皮肤中循环。

Text: Unpin this item from the quick bar.
Translation: 从快捷栏移除这个项目。

Text: Pin this item to the quick bar.
Translation: 把这个项目固定到快捷栏
平均海拔 <white><Altitude> 米</white><newline>平均温度 <white><Temperature>℃</white><newline>地形 <white><MapDifficulty></white>

Translation: 作为<funding(OutsourceResearchCost)>资金的交换，外包研究员将在接下来的<time(OutsourceResearchTime)>中贡献<ResearchPoints(OutsourceResearch)>。

Translation: 你确定你想把科研外包给地球？
货仓容量 <white><Capacity>千克</white><newline>资金 <white><funding(Funding)></white><newline>可用火箭 <white><AvailableRockets>/<TotalRockets></white>

Translation: 你确定你要在这张地图上重新开始吗？
创建下一个克隆的进程。

Translation: 浏览殖民地中的资源信息。
浏览你的殖民者相关信息。

<ButtonA> 建造生化机器人<newline><ButtonX> 取消生化机器人

Text: Use an already created Drone Prefab to build a new Drone. Drone Prefabs are produced in the Drone Assembler (requires research).<newline><newline>Available Drone Prefabs: <drone(available_drone_prefabs)>
Translation: 使用已经创建的机器人预制件来建造一个新的机器人.机器人预制件在机器人组装厂中制造 (需要研究).<newline><newline>可用的机器人预制件: <drone(available_drone_prefabs)>

Translation: 不高兴的殖民者会变成叛徒。叛徒经常在穹顶中制造麻烦。

Allow the export of Rare Metals.

Text: Initiates launch sequence for the return trip to Earth. Note that the rocket has to be refueled and any remaining resources on board will be lost.Status:
Translation: 启动返回地球的发射序列。需要注意的是火箭必须加注燃料以及火箭上任何剩余的资源上都将丢失。当前状态：

Text: Automated Mode not possible while Rare Metal exports are forbidden.
Translation: 自动模式在稀有金属禁止出口时不可用

Text: If Automated mode is activated the Rocket will repeatedly travel to Earth and back. It will land on the same spot and won't carry any imports or passengers from Earth. The Rocket will launch to Earth when the cargo hold is full and the rocket is refueled. Current status: Automated Mode
Translation: 如果自动模式被激活，火箭反复往返于地球和火星之间。它将降落在同一地点，不会携带任何来自地球的进口或乘客。火箭将在货舱已满和加注燃料之后发射到地球。当前状态：自动模式

Text: If Automated mode is activated the Rocket will repeatedly travel to Earth and back. It will land on the same spot and won't carry any imports or passengers from Earth. The Rocket will launch to Earth when the cargo hold is full and the rocket is refueled. Current status: Manual Mode
Translation: 如果自动模式被激活，火箭反复往返于地球和火星之间。它将降落在同一地点，不会携带任何来自地球的进口或乘客。火箭将在货舱已满和加注燃料之后发射到地球。当前状态：自动模式

<ButtonA> 激活<newline><ButtonX> 激活所有火箭

Text: Allow or forbid the exports of Precious Metals to Earth. If precious metals are exported, the colony will gain Funding in exchange. Current status: Exports are allowed.
Translation: 允许或禁止向地球出口稀有金属。如果出口稀有金属，殖民地将获得资金。 当前状态：允许出口。

Translation: 允许或禁止向地球出口稀有金属。如果出口稀有金属，殖民地将获得资金。 当前状态：禁止出口。

Text: Cancel the order to destroy the alien Dredger.

Translation: 被关闭的建筑不会消耗电力或者其它资源.当前状态：

Translation: 这个建筑在沙尘暴期间不工作。

Text: Request maintenance from nearby Drones. The required maintenance resource must be available in the area.Status:

Text: Remove the remains of this building.
Translation: 移除这座建筑的剩余部分。

Text: You need the Decommission Protocol (Engineering) Tech to remove these building remains.
Translation: 你需要爆破协议（工程）科技来移除剩余的建筑。

Text: Selects the previous colonist in the group.

Text: All resources have to be delivered to the site by Drones.
Translation: 所有资源都必须由机器人运送到地点

Text: Base resource consumption of the building.
Translation: 建筑物的基础资源消耗

Text: Wind Turbines produce more Power at higher elevation.
Translation: 风力发电机在更高的海拔产生更大的功率

Text: Use [ or ] to cycle between visual variants for this building
Translation: 使用 [ 或 ] 查看该建筑的不同视觉效果
卸载所有已装载的资源。

Text: Drones will seek a recharge station on low battery. Powered down Drones can be recharged by maintenance Drones or RC Rovers.
Translation: 机器人会在低电量的情况下寻找充电站。断电的机器人可被维护机器人或RC漫游者充电。

Text: Using <red><percent(ColdPenalty)></red> more Power due to freezing weather
Translation: 使用 <red><percent(ColdPenalty)></red> 更多电量由于寒冷的天气

Text: Slowed down <red><percent(DustDevilPenalty)></red> by a Dust Devil
Issues related to the placement of this building.
Translation: 有关这座建筑物的放置问题。

Text: List of applicable shortcuts and what they do.
Translation: 可用的捷径列表及其用途。

Text: Attempt to penetrate the outer shell of the Mirror Sphere with several Drones in the area.
Translation: 尝试用这个区域内的几个机器人穿透镜球的外壳。

Text: No Sensor Tower in the vicinity.
Attempt to communicate with the Mirror Sphere via a nearby Sensor Tower.
Translation: 尝试通过附近的感应塔与镜球交流。

Text: No Power Accumulator in the vicinity.
Divert energy towards the Mirror Sphere from a nearby Power Accumulator.
Translation: 把附近的蓄电池的能量转移给镜球。

Text: Priority affects how often this building is serviced by Drones as well as its share of Power and life support. Notifications are not shown for buildings with low priority.Current priority:
Translation: 优先级影响机器人访问和维护该建筑物的频率，以及它分配到的电力、水和氧气。低优先级建筑物的通知不会被显示。当前优先级：

Translation: 所有的机器人都将被召回，并将保留在车内，直到重新部署

Translation: 开关或阀门可以将网络分成两部分。

Text: Specializations allow your colonists to perform particular jobs better.
Translation: 专长使你的殖民者能够更好地完成特定的工作。

Text: Oxygen storage parameters and status. Oxygen is consumed only when demanded.
Translation: 氧气储存参数和状态。氧气只有在需要时才会被消耗。

Text: All resources have to be delivered to the site. Construction is performed by Drones.
Translation: 所有资源都必须被送到该地点，并由机器人完成建造。

Text: Select new cropCtrl + on crop Select in all

Translation: 选择一种新作物在已有的作物上按 可以选择所有的

Text: Filter Colonists in the Dome by desired or undesired traits. Colonists that do not match the filter will try to resettle in another Dome. If a Quarantine was set for the Dome, this action will remove it.
Translation: 通过设置你想要的或不想要的特性来过滤穹顶中的殖民者，与条件不匹配的殖民者将会尝试在另一个穹顶定居。如果你将穹顶设为隔离区，此操作将会移除隔离区。
当前状态：接受新殖民者

Text: The average Health of all Colonists living in this Dome.
Translation: 该穹顶中所有殖民者的平均生命值。

Text: The average Sanity of all Colonists living in this Dome.
Translation: 该穹顶中所有殖民者的平均精神值。

Text: The average Morale of all Colonists living in this Dome.
Translation: 该穹顶中所有殖民者的平均士气值。

Text: The condition of buildings deteriorates over time. Martian dust and disasters contribute to deterioration of outside buildings. Deteriorated buildings will need to be serviced by a Drone and supplied with their required maintenance resource or they will malfunction.<newline><newline>Current deterioration<right><percent(MaintenanceProgress)><newline><left>Last serviced<right><LastMaintenance>
Translation: 随着时间的推移，建筑物的状况会逐渐恶化。火星沙尘和自然灾害造成了外部建筑物的损坏。损坏的建筑物需要由机器人进行维护，并消耗所需的维护资源，否则将会出现故障。<newline><newline>当前恶化状况<right><percent(MaintenanceProgress)><newline><left>上次维护时间<right><LastMaintenance>

Text: A drone is on the way to repair this building.
Translation: 一架机器人正在修复这座建筑物的路上。

Text: This building has deteriorated and will stop working soon unless it receives maintenance.
Translation: 这座建筑物已经损坏，除非它得到维护，否则将停止工作。
每日发电量<right><power(UIPowerProductionToday)><newline><left>至今的总发电量<right><power(UIPowerProductionLifetime)>

Text: Colonists live and rest in Residential Buildings. Their Health and Sanity will deteriorate if they are homeless.
Translation: 殖民者在住宅建筑中生活休息。如果他们无家可归，他们的健康和精神状况将会恶化。
一名殖民者居住在该建筑物中他的专长：

Text: This slot is reserved for a colonist planning to move in from another Dome.
Translation: 这个房间已经被从另一个穹顶搬过来的殖民者预定了。

Text: This slot is closed. Colonists will never occupy it.
Translation: 这个房间已经关闭，殖民者无法住在里面

Text: You can disable the storage of certain resource types in this depot. No additional resources of these types will be transported to the depot.
Translation: 您可以禁用此仓库中某些资源的存储。这些类型的资源不会被运送到仓库。

Text: Storage facilities cannot discharge until they are charged with a minimum amount of their stored resource.
Translation: 除非设备中的储量达到可以进行输出的最小值，否则它不会向外输出。

Text: Not producing due to lack of demand. Can produce <water(current_throttled_production)> more if needed
Translation: 由于缺乏需求而没有全力生产。如果需要还能再产出<water(current_throttled_production)>

Text: Not producing due to lack of demand. Can produce <air(current_throttled_production)> more if needed
Translation: 由于缺乏需求而没有全力生产。如果需要还能再产出<air(current_throttled_production)>

Text: Each Service Building will accept a number of visitors during each open work shift. Colonists seek to visit a building corresponding to one of their interests chosen daily at random. The visit will improve their Comfort up to the Service Comfort value.
Translation: 每个服务建筑在每次上班时都会接待一些顾客。殖民者每天会随机访问一个与他们的兴趣相对应的建筑。这将提高他们的舒适度，直到达到服务舒适度。

Text: Select a trait that is affected by this building.
Translation: 选择一个受此建筑物影响的特质。

Text: Can be exported to Earth for Funding or processed into Electronics.
Translation: 可以向地球出口以换取资金或加工成电子元件。

Text: Advanced resource produced in Fuel Refineries from Water. Required for the refuelling of Rockets. Highly explosive.
Translation: 由燃料提炼厂从淡水中提取的先进资源。用于为火箭补充燃料。具有高度易爆性。

Text: Too young to work but can study at a School
Translation: 太小了还不够年龄进行工作，但可以去上学

Text: Too young to work but can be trained to become a specialist at an University.
Translation: 太小了还不够年龄进行工作，但可以通过在大学培训成为一名专家。

Text: A middle aged Colonist approaching retirement
Translation: 一位即将退休的中年殖民者

Text: A senior Colonist retired from active duty
Translation: 一位已经退休的老年殖民者

Text: This version of Surviving Mars doesn't yet support uploading mods you created, but you can test them in the game.
Translation: 该版本的 火星求生 暂不支持您正在上传中的mod，但您可以在游戏中进行测试。

Text: This version of Surviving Mars doesn't yet support downloading mods. You can, however, try the modding tools to create and load your own mods.
Translation: 该版本的火星求生暂不支持您正在下载中的mod，但您可以尝试在modding tools中加载您的mod。

Text: Max base traits generated per Colonist
Translation: 每位殖民者可生成的最大基本特性

Text: Increases Comfort Threshold for Social Buildings when used by extroverts
Translation: 增加外向型人格者使用社交类建筑时的舒适度阈值
增加外向型人格者舒适度阈值

Text: Stats below this level are considered low
Translation: 低于这个水平的状态被认为是较低的

Text: Stats above this level are considered high
Translation: 高于这个水平的状态被认为是较高的

Text: Low Health, Sanity and Comfort decreases a Colonist's morale by this amount
Translation: 较低的生命值、精神值和舒适度会降低殖民者相应的士气值
低状态对士气值的影响

Text: Morale of new Colonists starts randomly in this range, centered around half of maximum Morale
Translation: 新殖民者的初始士气值会在最大士气值的一半附近的范围内随机确定

Text: High Health, Sanity and Comfort increase the Colonist's morale by this much
Translation: 较高的生命值、精神值和舒适度会增加殖民者相应的士气值
高状态对士气值的影响
无家可归时殖民者的舒适度会降低
无家可归时的舒适度惩罚

Text: Colonist Sanity decreased when rest in malfunctioned Dome
Translation: 呆在故障的穹顶里殖民者的精神值会降低
穹顶故障时的精神值惩罚

Text: Colonist Sanity decreases when a Colonist from the same Residence dies from non-natural causes
Translation: 当相同住所中有人非自然死亡时，殖民者的精神值会降低

Text: This is the time it takes for Colonists outside of Domes to start losing health
Translation: 这是位于穹顶外的殖民者开始受到健康损害的时候

Text: When working during dark hours Colonists will lose this much Sanity (per work shift)
Translation: 当夜间工作时会降低殖民者相应的精神值 (每工作班次)
因重度工作负荷而导致精神值降低
重度工作负荷的精神值惩罚
因重度工作负荷而导致生命值降低
重度工作负荷的生命值惩罚
室外工作的精神值惩罚
殖民者生育所需的最低舒适度
殖民者生育所需的最低舒适度

Text: Decreases minimum Colonist Comfort for giving birth in a Dome Medical Building
Translation: 在穹顶里的医疗机构中生育可降低殖民者的最低舒适度需求

Text: Penalty to Colonist Comfort for Birth from Medical Buildings
Translation: 对在医疗机构中生育的殖民者的舒适度惩罚

Text: Chance of suicide when Sanity reaches zero, in %
Translation: 精神值至0时的自杀概率，%

Text: Chance of getting a negative trait when Sanity reaches zero, in %

Translation: 精神崩溃时产生变得有缺陷的概率

Translation: 因沙尘暴导致的精神伤害 (每小时)

Text: Sanity damage for Dreamers from Mirages (per hour)
Translation: 因幻觉而导致的精神伤害 (每小时)

Text: Sanity damage from a Cold Wave (per hour)
Translation: 因寒潮而导致的精神伤害 (每小时)

Text: Sanity damage from meteor (one-time on impact)
Translation: 因流星而导致的精神伤害 (每撞击1次)

Text: Health damage from small meteor (one-time on impact)
Translation: 因小流星而导致的健康伤害 (每撞击1次)

Text: Comfort damage from eating raw food from piles
Translation: 因吃了大量生食而导致的舒适降低

Translation: 工人的最佳工作效率对服务质量的影响

Determines whether the player can buy research points via outsourcing.

Text: Determines whether the applicant pool gains new entries.
Translation: 确定申请机构接受新申请者

Text: CrimeEvent -  the number of sabotaged buildings from single crime event
Translation: 犯罪事件 -  单次犯罪事件中被损坏的建筑数量
犯罪事件中损坏的建筑数量

Text: CrimeEvent -  the number of destroyed buildings from single crime event
Translation: 犯罪事件 - 单次犯罪事件中被损毁的建筑数量
犯罪事件中损毁的建筑数量

Text: All Funding is multiplied by this percent
Translation: 所有的资助金乘以该百分比

Translation: 火箭从地球飞往火星所需的时间
火箭飞行时间 (从地球到火星)

火箭飞行时间 (从火星到地球)

Translation: 单个火箭可运载到火星的最大殖民者数量

Text: Cables are built instantly when this is not 0

Text: Pipes are built instantly when this is not 0

Text: Deep Water deposits are exploitable when this is not 0
Translation: 当此非0时深层淡水资源可以被开采

Text: Deep Rare Metals deposits are exploitable when this is not 0

可以开采深层稀有金属

Text: The amount of Food (unscaled) supplied with each Colonist arrival
Translation: 每个殖民者到来时提供的食物数量(未按比例)

Text: Deep scanning is available when this is not 0
Translation: 当此非0时可以进行深层扫描

Text: Research point multiplier for Experimental Research (in %)
Research point multiplier for Breakthrough Research (in %)
Translation: 突破科技研究点数倍增 (%)

Text: Excess electrical Power will be converted to research at the rate defined by this value.

Text: Research points generated per RC Rover
Translation: 每辆RC漫游者产生的研究点

Translation: 每辆RC漫游者可控制的最大机器人数量
RC漫游者可控最大机器人数量

Text: Go To command will automatically cause unsiege if target is further than this distance
Translation: 如果目标比这距离更远，前往指令会自动解除

Text: RC Rover distance to provoke automatic unsiege
Translation: RC漫游者自动解除驱动的距离

The time it takes for a Drone to be fully recharged

Text: Drones will be cleaned of dust when being recharged if this value is bigger than 0
Translation: 如果此值大于0，则机器人将在充电时清除灰尘

机器人因陨石失灵的几率

Translation: 机器人修理时间由修理动画的重复次数决定

Translation: 机器人在电量低于此值两倍时将在无工作时前往充电，在电量低于此值时将放下目前工作前往充电

Translation: 所有穹顶的机械零件花费会受到此比率修正

Translation: 所有穹顶的稀有金属花费会受到此比率修正

Translation: 所有正在重建的建筑花费会受到此比率修正

Translation: 非专家进行专业工作时受到的效率惩罚

Text: Lock time to Workplace, Residence, Dome selected by user
Translation: 将时间锁在由用户选定的工作场所、住所、穹顶上

Text: Chance to get positive trait when Resting and ProjectMorpheus is active
Translation: 在睡梦神计划可用期间进行休息得到正面特性的几率
睡梦神计划正面特性几率

Text: Multiplier for arrival chances of all Specialist types
Translation: 对所有专家的到达几率修正

Text: Food eaten per visit to building, Farm or stockpile
Translation: 每次使用建筑消耗的食物

Text: Colonist's chance to get a Perk when grown if they’ve visited a playground as a child
Translation: 每次儿童殖民者使用操场获得鼓舞的几率

Translation: 最高效率下每小时的克隆点

Translation: 产生一位‘其他’性别殖民者的几率

Text: Comfort penalty when failing to satisfy a need via a visit
Translation: 使用后未能满足需求时收到的舒适度惩罚

Text: Threshold of accumulated stat points to trigger birth of a new Colonist
Translation: 触发新殖民者出生的状态点积累阈值

Text: Some downloadable content requires a game update in order to work.
Translation: 一些DLC需要进行更新才能使用。

Text: Could not establish a connection with the Paradox server.
Translation: 无法与Paradox服务器建立连接。

Text: You haven't agreed to the Terms of Service.
Please enter your date of birth.
Password should be between 6 and 128 characters long.
Password should contain both letters and numbers.

Text: Password can not contain the username.
Please supply a valid email address.
Translation: 请提供有效的电子邮箱地址。

Text: This Paradox account is already linked to another Steam account.
Translation: 此Paradox账号已经与另一个Steam账号绑定。

Text: Supplied field keys are not supported.
Translation: 提供的密钥字段不受支持。

Translation: 提供的脚本是无效的 - ISO 15924。

Text: Please enter a valid date of birth.
Translation: 请输入有效的出生日期。

Text: You are not eligible to create an account.
Paradox Account is already connected to this Microsoft Account.
Translation: Paradox账号已经与此Microsoft账号绑定。

Text: This Paradox Account is already connected to another Microsoft Account.
Translation: 此Paradox账号已经与另一个Microsoft账号绑定。

Text: This Microsoft Account is already connected to another Paradox Account.
Translation: 此Microsoft账号已经与另一个Paradox账号绑定。

Translation: 此Sony<nbsp>Enterrainment<nbsp>Network账号已经与另一个Paradox账号绑定。

Text: This Paradox Account is already connected to another Sony<nbsp>Entertainment<nbsp>Network account.
Translation: 此Paradox账号已经与另一个Sony<nbsp>Enterrainment<nbsp>Network账号绑定。

Text: Sign in to PlayStation™Network to use network features.
There is no network connectivity. Please check your connection and try again.
Translation: 无网络连接，请检查您的连接并重试。

Text: There is not enough storage space. To save your settings, delete old save data.
Translation: 存储空间不足。要保存设定，请删除旧的存档。

Text: Failed to load game settings. The saved data is corrupted. This saved data will be deleted and new saved data will be created.
Translation: 加载设定失败。存档损坏。此数据将被删除并创建新的存档。

Text: Controller for <user> has been disconnected. Reconnect the controller in order to continue.
Translation: <user>的控制器已经失去连接，重新连接以继续。

Text: The Last War: Too Many Unnatural Deaths
Translation: 最后的战争：非正常死亡频发

Text: Be it from the extra influx of colonists, the shortage of help from Earth or other reasons all together, the number of recently perished colonists by unnatural causes is disturbing.
Translation: 由于殖民者的大量涌入、地球上的援助不足或其他原因加在一起，最近非正常死亡的殖民者的数量是令人不安的。

Text:
People on Earth have been served a grim reminder that although far from the massive problems that they are experiencing right now, Mars is far from the safe heaven many have probably fooled themselves into believing.

<effect>Too many colonists have died recently from unnatural causes. The War Tension has increased.
Translation:
地球上的人们终于被残忍的事实所惊醒，尽管远离他们正在经受的苦难，但火星也远远不是他们自我催眠所认为的安全的乐土。

<effect>最近有大量的殖民者非正常死亡，战争紧张度正在增加。
对人类来说是悲伤的一天。

Text: Send Rare Metals to Earth to decrease War Tension, instead of receiving Funding. Rockets for the shipments will arrive regularly.
Translation: 向地球出口稀有金属来降低战争紧张度，以代替获得资金。运载火箭会定期来访。

Text: Submit to UN inspection. (-<ChoiceA_MoralePenalty> Morale to all colonists)
Translation: 配合联合国调查。（所有殖民者-<ChoiceA_MoralePenalty>士气值）

Text: The Last War: Closer to Home
A blatant lie is gaining traction on Earth.
Translation: 一个谣言正在地球上愈演愈烈。

Text:
A faction in the wars on Earth, an alliance of several smaller states, has come out and outright accused <reg_param1> of using the Mars project as a backdrop for developing and testing forbidden weapons, which are then used on their people.   

The UN has requested that we allow a probe to be made so this nonsense is cleared, although we fear that instilling such doubts in our colonists may have an impact on morale as a whole.

What do we do?
Translation:
地球战争中的一方，一系列小国的联盟，指控<reg_param1>利用火星计划来研究和试验禁用武器，并将随后将其用于人民。 

联合国希望我们接受扫描以澄清事实。不过恐怕这会使殖民者们产生怀疑，导致士气低落。

我们该怎么办？

Text: I thought we lived in more enlightened times. (+<Tension>% War Tension)
Translation: 我以为我们生活在了更文明的时代。（+<Tension>%战争紧张度）

Text: You do know this comet was predicted to come this close to Earth 50 years ago, right? (+<Tension>% War Tension)
Translation: 你们50年之前就预测到这颗彗星会离地球这么近，对吗？（+<Tension>%战争紧张度）

Text: Earth has changed a lot since we departed for Mars, and not for the better. (+<Tension>% War Tension)
Translation: 在我们来到火星之后，地球已经变了许多，当然并不是变好了。（+<Tension>%战争紧张度）

Text: Of course it's an omen. How could it possibly be anything but? (+<Tension>% War Tension)
Translation: 这当然是个预兆了，不然还能是什么？（+<Tension>%战争紧张度）

Text: A comet suddenly lit up night skies above Earth, visible from all over the globe.
Translation: 一颗全球可见的彗星突然点亮了地球的夜空。

Text:
Although the comet is well known and talked about by most space agencies, in the current atmosphere on Earth people have little time for space news and have chosen to see an omen in it. 

Most interpretations have been that victory is imminent for the interpreter, but more alarmingly many believe this is a sign of the end times. 

Some have chosen to embrace it… risking this becoming a self-fulfilling prophecy.

We have to talk some sense into the Earthlings.
Translation:
尽管这颗彗星已经被多数宇宙研究机构熟知并探讨，但就当前局势来看地球人并没有时间关心宇宙新闻，他们把它当做了一个预兆。

大多数发言人声称胜利即将眷顾他们，但是令人担忧的是，更多人相信这是末日的征兆。

有些人选择冒着演化为自恰预言的风险接受了这种理论。

我们需要开导一下地球人。

Text: Export Rare Metals to Earth and reduce War Tension.
Translation: 向地球出口稀有金属来降低战争紧张度。

Text: Export Metals to Earth and reduce War Tension.
Translation: 向地球出口金属来降低战争紧张度。

Text: Export Electronics to Earth and reduce War Tension.
Translation: 向地球出口电子器件来降低战争紧张度。

Text: Export Machine Parts to Earth and reduce War Tension.
Translation: 向地球出口机械零件来降低战争紧张度。

Text: Export Food to Earth and reduce War Tension.
Translation: 向地球出口食物来降低战争紧张度。

Text: Ceasefires are taking effect and armies are pulling back behind borders.
Translation: 停火协议已经生效，各国军队正撤回边境。

Text:
Mistrust and disbelief is rampant and while the guns are finally silent, the road to healing the wounds of war will be longer than anything Earth has ever experienced before. 

Millions have perished and those who survived will suffer a divide so huge, it seems impossible to fill. 

In what almost seems as an apathetic effort to move on, <reg_param1> has informed us that we are to continue the project and its business as usual – with the exception that now everything costs more after the devastation on Earth.

<effect>Resupply prices increased by 50% for the next 50 Sols.
Translation:
怀疑肆虐在枪声平息的世界，地球在恢复战争的创伤时需要经历的比每一次都要多。

数百万人失去了生命，而幸存者将产生难以逾越的隔阂，这看起来是无法打破的。

一个看起来近乎冷漠的举动，<reg_param1>告知我们照常实施计划和进行活动——只不过在地球经受如此萧条时，一切的代价都要更高了。

<effect>接下来的50日内补给价格增加50%。

Text: Earth survived, but at what cost?
Translation: 地球安全了，但是代价是什么？

Text: A ceasefire was signed, but Earth is caught in the grip of a new Cold War. All resupply prices have been increased.
Translation: 各国签订了一份停火协议，但地球即将陷入新的冷战，所有补给的价格提高。

Text: The war is over! Sound minds and human compassion emerged victorious.
Translation: 战争结束了！坚强的心和人类的恻隐获得了胜利。
最后的战争：维和者胜利！

Text: Hatred has lost! Sound minds and human compassion emerge victorious.
Translation: 仇恨被化解了！坚强的心和人类的恻隐获得了胜利。

Text: The Drums of War have ceased their relentless beating and those who survived the wars are looking at the death and destruction it caused. Never has it been so obvious how little a spark can wipe out our race once and for all and this has reached the heart of every human soul on Earth. As the dead and fallen are being honored, pacts and treaties, forged with compassion and good will, are being signed all over the globe. Our colony on Mars and have been identified as champions of this peace. We have received the Honor of Hope and have become the symbol of humanity, closer to everyone’s hearts and minds than ever before. Every nation wishes to repay us in any way possible. A spike of applicants and a dramatic reduction in prices are the short term benefits we are promised to expect. Gained a new Technology, .
Translation: 无尽的战争之鼓终于平静了下来，幸存者们正眺望着遍地的死伤和废墟。 从未有过如此直白的例子，来证明一个小火花也能一举消灭整个族群，这是一场深入人心的灾难。 随着死者被安葬，全球各国签署了饱含恻隐和善心的条约。我们的火星殖民地和成为了和平的造就者。 我们得到了希望勋章，并且成为了人道主义的代表。我们比以前更接近人们的心，各个国家都希望用一切方式回报我们。 作为回报，在短期内获得一系列申请者以及价格的大幅削减。 获得新科技，。
尽情欢庆吧，但要永远铭记！
